content: Thaus chivkeeb Vaajtswv tsim lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb.
Lub nplajteb tsi tau muaj dlaabtsi hab nyob dlo dlus, tsaus ntuj nti thoob plawg sau nplaim dlej havtxwv, hab Vaajtswv tug ntsujnplig  yuj moog yuj lug sau nplaim dlej.
Vaajtswv has tas, “Ca le muaj qhov pum kev,” ces txawm pum kev kaaj nrig tuaj.
Vaajtswv txaus sab heev rua qhov pum kev ntawd. Ces Vaajtswv txhaj muab qhov pum kev cais tawm ntawm qhov tsaus ntuj,
Vaajtswv tis npe rua qhov pum kev hu ua “Nruab nub” hab qhov tsaus ntuj hu ua “Mo ntuj.” Muaj caij tsaus ntuj hab muaj caij kaaj ntug, yog nub ib.

Vaajtswv has tas, “Ca le muaj lub ntuj lug quas dlej hab muab cais kuas nyag nyob muaj nyag chaw.” Yog le ntawd, Vaajtswv txhaj tsim lub ntuj, hab muab tej dlej nyob huv qaab ntuj hab tej dlej sau nruab ntug cais nyag nyob nyag. Ces txawm muaj le Vaajtswv has.
Vaajtswv tis npe txheej sau hu ua “Ntuj.” Muaj caij tsaus ntuj hab muaj caij kaaj ntug, yog nub ob.
Vaajtswv has tas, “Tej dlej kws nyob huv qaab ntuj ca le sis sau lug nyob ib qhov chaw ua ke, kuas aav tawm tuaj,” ces txawm muaj le Vaajtswv has.
Vaajtswv tis npe cov aav hu ua “Nplajteb,” hab cov dlej kws lug sis sau ua ke ntawd, hu ua “Havtxwv.” Hab Vaajtswv pum tej kws nwg tsim tau lug ntawd nwg txaus sab heev.
Ces Vaajtswv has tas, “Lub nplajteb ca le tuaj txhua yaam nroj tsuag, qoobloo, hab tej xyoob ntoo, kuas tawg paaj txi txiv lawv le nyag yaam,” ces txawm muaj lawv le Vaajtswv has.
Yog le ntawd, lub nplajteb txhaj muaj txhua yaam xyoob ntoo nroj tsuag, hab qoobloo kws txawj tawg paaj txi txiv. Vaajtswv pum tej kws nwg tsim tau lug ntawd, mas nwg txaus sab heev.
Muaj caij tsaus ntuj hab muaj caij kaaj ntug, yog nub peb.
Vaajtswv has tas, “Ca le muaj tej lub ci ci tshwm rua sau ntuj, quas nruab nub hab mo ntuj, hab quas caij nyoog, nub, hli, hab xyoo;
tej ntawd yuav ci sau ntuj tuaj rua huv nplajteb nuav kuas pum kev,” ces txawm muaj le Vaajtswv has.
Yog le ntawd, Vaajtswv txhaj tsim dlua ob lub ci ci kws luj heev. Lub kws ci tshaaj ca kaav nruab nub hab lub ci tsi heev ca kaav mo ntuj; nwg tsim tej nubqub huv tuabsi.
Vaajtswv muab tej lub ci ci ntawd teeb rua sau ntuj kuas pum kev ci ntsaa ab tuaj rua huv nplajteb,
kuas kaav nruab nub hab mo ntuj, hab muab qhov kaaj cais tawm ntawm qhov tsaus. Hab Vaajtswv pum tej kws nwg tsim tau lug ntawd, nwg txaus sab heev.
Muaj caij tsaus ntuj hab muaj caij kaaj ntug, yog nub plaub.
Vaajtswv has tas, “Ca le muaj txhua yaam tsaj muaj sa nyob huv nruab dleg, hab ca le muaj noog yaa kuas puv sau nruab ntug.”

Yog le ntawd, Vaajtswv txhaj tsim tej tsaj kws luj tshaaj plawg nyob huv havtxwv, hab tsim txhua yaam tsaj nyob huv nruab dleg, hab txhua yaam noog huv tuabsi. Hab Vaajtswv pum tej kws nwg tsim ntawd, nwg txaus sab heev.
Vaajtswv txhaj foom koob moov rua tej tsaj ntawd hab has rua tej tsaj kws nyob huv nruab dleg kuas ca le fuamvaam moog puv havtxwv, hab nwg has tej noog kuas fuamvaam puv nplajteb.
Muaj caij tsaus ntuj hab muaj caij kaaj ntug, yog nub tsib.
Vaajtswv has tas, “Ca le muaj txhua yaam tsaj txhu: tsaj nyeg, tsaj qus, tsaj luj, tsaj miv, naab, qaav, kaab hab ntsaum lawv le nyag yaam,” ces txawm muaj lawv le Vaajtswv has.
Vaajtswv tsim tej tsaj nyeg, tsaj qus, tsaj luj, tsaj miv, naab, qaav, kaab hab ntsaum lawv le nyag yaam, hab Vaajtswv pum tej kws nwg tsim tau lug ntawd, nwg txaus sab heev.

Vaajtswv has tas, “Nwgnuav peb yuav tsim tuabneeg kuas muaj yaam ntxwv zoo le peb; hab puab yuav muaj fwjchim kaav taagnrho tej ntseg huv havtxwv, tej noog sau nruab ntug, tej tsaj nyeg, tsaj qus, tsaj luj tsaj miv, hab kaav thoob plawg lub nplajteb nuav.”
Yog le ntawd, Vaajtswv txhaj tsim tuabneeg kuas puab muaj yaam ntxwv zoo le Vaajtswv ntaag. Nwg tsim muaj tug quasyawg hab tug quaspuj.

Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua obtug hab has tas, “Meb ca le muaj tub muaj ki kuas coob, meb tej xeebntxwv yuav fuamvaam moog nyob thoob plawg txhua qhov chaw kuas puv nplajteb hab puab yuav kaav taagnrho lub nplajteb. Kuv tsaa meb kaav tej ntseg huv havtxwv, tej noog kws yaa sau nruab ntug, hab txhua tsaav yaam tsaj kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav.
Kuv tsim kuas muaj txhua yaam qoobloo hab txhua yaam txiv ntoo rua meb tau noj,
tabsis kuv tsim tej nroj tsuag xyoob ntoo, ua zaub rua tej noog hab tej tsaj kws muaj sa nyob huv lub nplajteb nuav tau noj.” Ces txawm muaj lawv le Vaajtswv has.
Vaajtswv saib ib puas tsaav yaam kws nwg tsim ntawd, hab ua rua nwg txaus sab heev. Muaj caij tsaus ntuj hab muaj caij kaaj ntug, yog nub rau.
Lub ntuj, hab lub nplajteb, hab ib puas tsaav yaam yeej tsim tav taag lawm.
Vaajtswv tub tsim txhua tsaav yaam tav taag lawm, nub xyaa nwg txhaj su hab tsi ua ib yaam num dlaabtsi le.
Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua nub xyaa hab teem nub ntawd ua nub tseemceeb, rua qhov ib puas tsaav yaam kws nwg tsim tub tav taag rua nub ntawd lawm,  nwg txhaj su tsi ua num dlaabtsi.
Vaajtswv tsim lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb lawv le tau has taag lug sau nuav lawm. Thaus tug TSWV  kws yog Vaajtswv tsim lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb,
lub nplajteb tseem tsi tau muaj nroj tsuag xyoob ntoo hab tsi muaj ib yaam noob tuaj taug kaug le, rua qhov nwg tseem tsi tau tso naag lug, hab tseem tsi tau muaj tuabneeg tawm moog ua laj ua teb;
tabsis dlej ca le txa huv nruab tivtxwv tuaj ntxaum dlaim aav nplajteb noo quas zaws thoob plawg.
Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv muab aav lug puab tau ib tug txivneej,  hab tshuab sav tshuab paa rua tug txivneej ntawd lub qhovntswg, ces tug txivneej ntawd txawm caj sa.
Ces tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv tsim tau ib lub vaaj nyob rua saab nubtuaj huv Edees, hab nwg muab tug txivneej kws nwg puab lug nyob rua huv lub vaaj ntawd.

Vaajtswv tsim txhua yaam ntoo tuaj zoo nkauj kawg nkaus rua huv hab txi txiv zoo kawg le. Nyob rua huv plawv vaaj muaj ib tsob ntoo kws cawm txujsa hab muaj ib tsob ntoo kws ua rua paub qhov phem hab qhov zoo.
Muaj ib tug dlej txhawv huv Edees hab ndlwg moog ntxooj lub vaaj ntawd; tug dlej ntawd ncau ua plaub ceg ndlwg tawm huv Edees moog lawm.
Ceg ib hu ua Pixoos, ceg dlej nuav ndlwg moog vij lub tebchaws Havilas.
(Lub tebchaws ntawd muaj tej tseem kub, muaj tej roj ntoo tsw qaab hab muaj tej hlaws muaj nqes.)
Ceg ob hu ua Kihoos, ceg dlej nuav ndlwg moog vij lub tebchaws Kuses.
Ceg peb hu ua Tikis, ceg dlej nuav ndlwg moog rua saab nubtuaj kws npuab rua lub tebchaws Axilias, hab ceg dlej plaub hu ua Efalates.
Ces tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv coj tug txivneej kws nwg tsim lug nyob huv lub Vaaj Edees, kuas nwg zuv hab tu lub vaaj ntawd.
Vaajtswv has rua nwg has tas, “Kuv pub koj noj txhua yaam txiv ntoo kws nyob huv lub vaaj nuav,
tabsis kuv tsi pub koj noj tsob txiv ntoo kws ua rua paub qhov phem hab qhov zoo xwb. Koj yuavtsum tsi xob noj tsob ntoo ntawd cov txiv; yog koj noj nub twg, koj yuav tuag nub ntawd.”
Ces tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv has tas, “Tsi tsimnyog ca tug txivneej nuav nyob tuab leeg. Kuv yuav tsim dlua ib tug lug nrug nwg nyob ua txwj nkawm paab nwg.”

Yog le ntawd, Vaajtswv txhaj muab aav lug puab ua txhua yaam tsaj hab txhua yaam noog. Vaajtswv txhaj coj taagnrho tej tsaj hab tej noog lug rua tug txivneej ntawd tis npe; mas tej tsaj hab tej noog ntawd nyag txhaj muaj nyag npe lawv le tug txivneej ntawd tis rua.
Nwg tis npe rua tej tsaj nyeg, tsaj qus, hab tej noog taag lawm, tabsis tej tsaj ntawd yeej tsi muaj ib tug kws paab tau nwg hab yuav nrug nwg ua tau txwj nkawm le.

Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv txhaj ua kuas tug txivneej ntawd tsaug zug heev, thaus nwg tsaug zug lawm, Vaajtswv txhaj muab nwg ib tug txhaa taav rhu tawm lug hab muab lub qhov nqaj ntawd foob nqawm rov zoo le qub.
Vaajtswv muab tug taav ntawd lug tsim ua ib tug quaspuj hab coj tug quaspuj ntawd moog cob rua tug txivneej.

Ces tug txivneej ntawd has tas, “Nwgnuav, muaj ib tug zoo le peb lawm hab lauj, tug nuav tej txhaa yog kuv txhaa, hab tej nqaj yog kuv nqaj. Nwg lub npe hu ua ‘quaspuj’, rua qhov yog rhu nwg tawm ntawm txivneej lug.”
Tub yog vim le nuav tug quasyawg txhaj tso nwg nam nwg txiv tseg, hab moog nrug nwg tug quaspuj nyob, hab obtug yuav koom ua ib lub cev.
Tug txivneej hab tug quaspuj, obtug ob leeg puavleej labqaab, tabsis obtug ib leeg tsi paub txaajmuag rua ib leeg.

Naab yog ib tug kws ntse tshaaj txhua yaam tsaj qus kws tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv tau tsim huv tuabsi. Naab txhaj nug tug quaspuj has tas, “Vaajtswv yeej txwv kuas meb tsi xob noj txhua yaam txiv ntoo kws nyob huv lub vaaj nuav tag los?”
Tug quaspuj teb has tas, “Wb yeej noj tau txhua yaam txiv ntoo kws nyob huv lub vaaj nuav,
tsuas yog tshwj tsob txiv ntoo huv plawv vaaj txhaj tsi noj xwb. Vaajtswv yeej txwv tsi pub wb noj tsob ntoo ntawd tej txiv lossis tsi pub kov tsob ntoo ntawd; yog wb noj, wb yuav tuag.”
Naab teb tug quaspuj has tas, “Tej lug ntawd tsi tseeb, meb yuav tsi tuag ib zag le.
Vaajtswv has le ntawd, rua qhov nwg paub has tas thaus twg meb noj tsob txiv ntoo ntawd, meb yuav zoo le Vaajtswv  hab meb yuav paub qhov phem hab qhov zoo.”

Tug quaspuj pum has tas, tsob ntoo ntawd zoo nkauj hab tej txiv ntxim qaab kawg le, tsi yog le ntawd xwb, nwg xaav has tas, tej txiv ntoo ntawd tseem yuav ua rua nwg muaj tswvyim hab. Ces nwg txawm cev teg moog dle cov txiv lug noj. Nwg muab rua nwg tug quasyawg noj hab.
Thaus obtug noj taag lawm, obtug txawm pum tseeb hab paub has tas obtug labqaab, obtug txhaj moog dle nplooj txiv ncuav pas lug xaws naav.
Thaus yuav tsaus ntuj obtug nov tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv moog kev huv lub vaaj, obtug txhaj tsiv moog nkaum rua huv cov ntoo lawm.
Tabsis tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv hu tug quasyawg has tas, “Koj nyob qhov twg?”
Nwg teb has tas, “Kuv nov koj lug rua huv lub vaaj nuav, kuv ntshai koj heev kuv txhaj tsiv moog nkaum lawm, rua qhov kuv labqaab.”
Vaajtswv nug has tas, “Leejtwg has rua koj tas koj labqaab? Tsi yog koj noj tsob txiv ntoo kws kuv txwv tsi pub koj noj lawm los?”
Tug quasyawg teb has tas, “Tub yog tug quaspuj kws koj muab rua kuv, nwg muab cov txiv ntoo ntawd cev rua kuv noj, kuv txhaj le tau noj lawm.”
Vaajtswv nug tug quaspuj has tas, “Vim le caag koj txhaj ua le ko?” Nwg teb has tas, “Naab ntxag kuv noj!”

Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv txhaj has rua naab has tas, “Koj yuav raug txim, vim qhov kws koj ntxag tug quaspuj nuav ua txhum. Taagnrho tej tsaj huv tuabsi, koj yog tug kws yuav tau ris lu lug foom tsi zoo nuav: txij nub nua moog, koj yuav muab koj lub plaab ndlaug sau npoo aav moog le hab noj moov aav moog taag koj lub neej.

Kuv yuav ua kuas koj hab tug quaspuj nuav ua yeebncuab, nwg tug xeebntxwv hab koj tug xeebntxwv los yuav ua yeebncuab moog le. Nwg tug xeebntxwv yuav tsoo koj taubhau kuas ntsoog, hab koj yuav tum nwg  lub laujtaws.”

Vaajtswv has rua tug quaspuj ntawd tas, “Kuv yuav tsub kev txomnyem rua koj thaus koj suab mivnyuas hab tsub kev mob rua koj thaus koj yug mivnyuas. Txawm yog le ntawd los koj tseem xaav nrug koj tug quasyawg ua txwj nkawm, tabsis nwg yuav tswjfwm koj.”

Vaajtswv has rua Adaas has tas, “Tub yog vim koj noog koj tug quaspuj lug hab noj cov txiv ntoo kws kuv txwv tsi pub koj noj. Vim koj tau ua le ntawd aav txhaj raug foom tsi zoo. Koj yuav tau siv zug khwv moog taag simneej koj txhaj tau noj tau haus.
Aav yuav tuaj nroj hab tuaj xuavpaug, hab koj yuav dle nroj tsuag tom tej teb lug ua zaub noj.
Koj yuav ua teb khwv lub fws nrug, koj txhaj tau noj moog txug thaus koj rov moog rua huv cov aav kws koj tawm lug. Kuv muab aav lug puab koj, hab koj yuav rov moog ua aav dlua.”
Adaas  tis nwg tug quaspuj npe hu ua Evas,  rua qhov Evas yog txhua tsaav tuabneeg leej nam.
Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv txawm muab tawv tsaj lug ua rig tsho rua Adaas hab nwg tug quaspuj, hab muab rua obtug naav.

Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv has tas, “Nwgnuav tug txivneej nuav zoo le peb hab nwg paub qhov phem hab qhov zoo.  Yuav tsi pub nwg moog dle tsob txiv ntoo cawm tau txujsa lug noj, nyob tsaam nwg yuav muaj sa nyob moog ibtxhis.”
Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv txhaj ntab Adaas tsiv tawm huv lub Vaaj Edees hab kuas nwg moog khawb aav ua noj ua haus ntawm cov aav kws Vaajtswv muab coj lug puab nwg.

Thaus Vaajtswv muab tug txivneej ntawd ntab tawm lawm, Vaajtswv tso ib cov qhelunpees  tuav ib raab ntaaj nplaim tawg kws tig tau moog rua txhua phaab lug zuv lub Vaaj Edees saab nubtuaj, tsi pub leejtwg moog ze tsob txiv ntoo kws cawm tau txujsa.

Adaas nrug Evas kws yog nwg quaspuj pw, ces Evas txawm xeeb tub. Evas yug tau ib tug tub hab nwg has tas “Vim tug TSWV paab kuv, kuv txhaj tau ib tug tub.” Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tis tug tub ntawd npe hu ua Ka-ees.
Tom qaab ntawd nwg rov yug tau ib tug tub, hab nwg tis npe hu ua Anpees. Anpees yog ib tug tub yug yaaj, tabsis Ka-ees yog ib tug tub ua qoobloo.
Muaj ib nub Ka-ees nqaa tej qoobloo kws nwg sau tau lug coj tuaj fij rua tug TSWV.
Ces Anpees kuj muab nwg tej mivnyuas yaaj kws yog thawj tug, coj tuaj tua, hab nwg xaiv tej nqaj zoo coj tuaj fij rua Vaajtswv. Tug TSWV txaus sab heev rua Anpees hab nwg tej khoom fij,
tabsis Ka-ees hab nwg tej khoom fij tsi hum Vaajtswv sab. Yog le ntawd, Ka-ees txhaj chim hab ua ntsejmuag npautawg vog.
Ces tug TSWV has rua Ka-ees has tas, “Vim le caag koj yuav chim ua luaj le? Vim le caag koj ua ntsejmuag npautawg vog le ko?”

Yog koj yeej ua qhov zoo,  kuv yuav txais koj tej khoom fij, tabsis yog koj ua phem, txujkev txhum zuv rawv ntawm koj qhovrooj yuav tum koj. Txujkev txhum xaav ua tug kaav koj, tabsis koj yuavtsum ua kuas koj kovyeej nwg.

Tom qaab ntawd, Ka-ees has rua nwg tug kwv Anpees has tas, “Wb tawm moog yos ua si nraag teb.”  Thaus obtug moog txug nraag teb lawm, Ka-ees txawm ntxeev sab rua nwg tug kwv hab muab nwg tug kwv tua tuag lawm.
Tug TSWV nug Ka-ees has tas, “Koj tug kwv Anpees moog rua qhov twg lawm?” Nwg teb has tas, “Kuv tsi paub. Kuv yog tug kws tsomkwm kuv tug kwv los?”
Ces tug TSWV has tas, “Vim le caag koj yuav ua nruj ua tsiv le ko? Koj tug kwv cov ntshaav kws ndlwg rua huv aav tub quaj hu kuv, thov kuas kuv ua pauj rua koj ntaag.
Nwgnuav koj raug lu lug foom tsi zoo hab raug ntab tawm tsiv ntawm thaaj aav kws nqug koj tug kwv kws koj muab tua cov ntshaav.
Txawm yog koj khwv cog qoobloo ntau npaum le caag los tej aav ntawd yuav ua rua koj tej qoobloo hlub tsi taug. Koj yuav ua tuabneeg lajlees moog thoob qaab ntuj tsi muaj vaaj tsi muaj tsev nyob.”
Ka-ees has rua tug TSWV has tas, “Koj rau txim rua kuv nyaav tshaaj qhov kuv yuav ris taug lawm.

Koj ntab kuv tawm ntawm thaaj aav nuav hab tawm ntawm koj lub xubndlag moog. Kuv yuav ua tuabneeg lajlees moog thoob qaab ntuj tsi muaj vaaj tsi muaj tsev nyob, hab leejtwg ntsib kuv los yuav tua kuv povtseg.”

Tabsis tug TSWV teb has tas, “Yeej tsi tau le, yog leejtwg tua Ka-ees povtseg, mas tug ntawd yuav raug txim xyaa npaug ntxiv.” Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV txhaj ntaus cim rua Ka-ees lub cev kuas leejtwg pum los tsi xob tua Ka-ees povtseg.
Ces Ka-ees txhaj tsiv ntawm tug TSWV lub xubndlag hab moog nyob rua ib lub tebchaws hu ua “Ncig Moog Ncig Lug” kws yog nyob ntawm lub Vaaj Edees saab nubtuaj.
Ka-ees hab nwg tug quaspuj yug tau ib tug tub, obtug tis nwg lub npe hu ua Enauj. Ka-ees rhawv tau ib lub nroog hab nwg muab lub nroog ntawd tis npe hu ua Enauj lawv le nwg tug tub lub npe.
Enauj muaj ib tug tub hu ua Iladis, nwg yog Mehuya-ees txiv, Mehuya-ees muaj ib tug tub npe hu ua Methuxa-ees, hab Methuxa-ees muaj ib tug tub hu ua Lamej.
Lamej yuav ob tug quaspuj, ib tug hu ua Adahes hab ib tug hu ua Xilas.
Adahes yug tau ib tug tub hu ua Yanpales, Yanpales yog yawmkoob ntawm cov tuabneeg kws yug tsaj txhu hab nyob tsevntaub.
Yanpales muaj ib tug kwv hu ua Yunpas, Yunpas yog yawmkoob ntawm cov tuabneeg kws txawj ntaus nkauj nogncaas hab tshuab raaj.
Xilas yug tau ib tug tub hu ua Tunpas Ka-ees, nwg txawj ntaus txhua yaam cuabyeej  kws yog muab tooj muab hlau ntaus. Tunpas Ka-ees tug muam hu ua Na-amas.
Lamej has rua nwg ob tug quaspuj tas, “Adahes hab Xilas, meb ca le noog kuv has: kuv tau tua ib tug txivneej povtseg vim nwg ua rua kuv raug mob, kuv tua ib tug tub hluas povtseg vim nwg ntaus kuv.
Yog leejtwg tua Ka-ees nwg yuav raug txim xyaa npaug, yog leejtwg tua kuv tug ntawd yuav raug txim xyaa caum xyaa npaug.”

Adaas rov nrug nwg tug quaspuj pw, Evas txhaj rov yug tau ib tug tub, Evas has tas, “Vaajtswv pub kuv muaj dlua ib tug tub lug sawv Anpees tug kws Ka-ees muab tua lawm chaw.” Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tis tug tub ntawd npe hu ua Xej.
Xej muaj ib tug tub, hab Xej muab tis npe hu ua Enauses. Txij thaus ntawd lug tuabneeg txawm pib tuav tug TSWV lub npe pehawm tug TSWV.
Ntawm nuav moog yog has txug Adaas tej xeebntxwv. (Thaus Vaajtswv tsim tuabneeg, nwg tsim zoo le nwg tug yaam ntxwv ntaag.
Vaajtswv tsim tau ib tug txivneej hab ib tug quaspuj. Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua obtug, tis npe rua obtug hab hu obtug ua “Noobneej.”)
Thaus Adaas muaj ib puas peb caug xyoo lawm, nwg muaj dlua ib tug tub zoo le nwg, hab nwg tis npe hu ua Xej.
Dlhau ntawd lug, Adaas tseem ua neej nyob tau yim pua xyoo, hab nwg tseem muaj mivnyuas coob leej ntxiv
nwg tuag rua thaus nwg noobnyoog muaj cuaj pua peb caug xyoo.
Thaus Xej noobnyoog muaj ib puas tsib xyoos, nwg muaj ib tug tub hu ua Enauses,
dlhau ntawd lug nwg tseem ua neej nyob tau yim pua xyaa xyoo hab nwg tseem muaj mivnyuas coob leej ntxiv,
nwg tuag rua thaus nwg noobnyoog muaj cuaj pua nkaum ob xyoos.
Thaus Enauses noobnyoog muaj cuaj caum xyoo, nwg muaj ib tug tub hu ua Kenaas,
dlhau ntawd lug nwg tseem ua neej nyob tau yim pua kaum tsib xyoos, hab nwg tseem muaj mivnyuas coob leej ntxiv;
nwg tuag rua thaus nwg noobnyoog muaj cuaj pua tsib xyoos.
Thaus Kenaas noobnyoog muaj xyaa caum xyoo, nwg muaj ib tug tub hu ua Mahalalees,
dlhau ntawd lug nwg tseem ua neej nyob tau yim pua plaub caug xyoo, hab nwg tseem muaj mivnyuas coob leej ntxiv.
Nwg tuag rua thaus nwg noobnyoog muaj cuaj pua kaum xyoo.
Thaus Mahalalees noobnyoog muaj rau caum tsib xyoos, nwg muaj ib tug tub hu ua Yales,
dlhau ntawd lug nwg tseem ua neej nyob tau yim pua peb caug xyoo, hab nwg tseem muaj mivnyuas coob leej ntxiv.
Nwg tuag rua thaus nwg noobnyoog muaj yim pua cuaj caum tsib xyoos.
Thaus Yales noobnyoog muaj ib puas rau caum ob xyoos, nwg muaj ib tug tub hu ua Enauj,
dlhau ntawd lug nwg tseem ua neej nyob tau yim pua xyoo, hab nwg tseem muaj mivnyuas coob leej ntxiv.
Nwg tuag rua thaus nwg noobnyoog muaj cuaj pua rau caum ob xyoos.
Thaus Enauj noobnyoog muaj rau caum tsib xyoos, nwg muaj ib tug tub hu ua Methuxelas.
Dlhau ntawd lug, nwg tseem ua neej nyob fwm hab pehawm Vaajtswv tau peb puas xyoo, hab nwg tseem muaj mivnyuas coob leej ntxiv.
Nwg ua neej nyob tau peb puas rau caum tsib xyoos.
Enauj ua nwg lub neej nrug Vaajtswv sis raug zoo, ces nwg txawm ca le pluj lawm, rua qhov Vaajtswv coj nwg moog lawm.
Thaus Methuxelas noobnyoog muaj ib puas yim caum xyaa xyoo, nwg muaj ib tug tub hu ua Lamej,
dlhau ntawd lug nwg tseem ua neej nyob tau xyaa pua yim caum ob xyoo, hab nwg tseem muaj mivnyuas coob leej ntxiv.
Nwg tuag rua thaus nwg noobnyoog muaj cuaj pua rau caum cuaj xyoos.
Thaus Lamej noobnyoog muaj ib puas yim caum ob xyoos, nwg muaj ib tug tub,
Lamej muab tis npe hu ua Nau-es,  Lamej has tas, “Tug mivnyuas nuav yuav paab peb ris lub nraa nyaav ntawm thaaj aav kws raug Vaajtswv foom tsi zoo lawm kuas sib.”
Dlhau ntawd lug Lamej tseem ua neej nyob tau tsib puas cuaj caum tsib xyoos, hab nwg tseem muaj mivnyuas coob leej ntxiv.
Nwg tuag rua thaus nwg noobnyoog muaj xyaa pua xyaa caum xyaa xyoo.
Thaus Nau-es noobnyoog muaj tsib puas xyoo lawm, nwg maam le muaj peb tug tub, Xees, Haas, hab Yafej.
Thaus tuabneeg fuamvaam moog nyob puv nplajteb, hab yug tau tej ntxhais coob,
muaj ib cov timtswv qaum ntuj  pum cov ntxhais ntawd zoo nkauj heev, yog le ntawd puab txawm tuaj yuav cov ntxhais kws puab nyam ua quaspuj.

Ces tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav tsi pub tuabneeg muaj sa nyob ntev moog ibtxhis, rua qhov puab yog tuabneeg kws txawj tuag. Txij nuav moog puab tsuas muaj sa nyob ntev le ib puas neeg nkaum xyoo lawm xwb.”

Tam ntawd hab tam tom qaab nuav, muaj cov tuabneeg luj heev nyob huv nplajteb nuav, puab yog xeebntxwv ntawm tuabneeg nplajteb tej ntxhais kws yuav cov timtswv qaum ntuj. Puab yog cov tuabneeg kws ua tau heev hab muaj koob meej nyob txheej thaus u lug lawm.
Thaus tug TSWV pum txhua tug tuabneeg kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav, muaj lub sab ua phem ua qas hab xaav phem txhua lub sijhawm,
tug TSWV tu sab hab khauvxwm qhov kws nwg tsim tuabneeg lug nyob huv lub nplajteb nuav. Nwg tu sab kawg le.

Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV txhaj has tas, “Kuv yuav muab cov tuabneeg kws kuv tau tsim nuav hab tej tsaj luj tsaj miv, tej noog kws yaa sau nruab ntug ua kuas puamtsuaj huv tuabsi moog. Kuv tu sab heev, vim kuv tau tsim puab lug.”
Tabsis tug TSWV txaus sab heev rua Nau-es.

Zaaj nuav yog has txug Nau-es lub neej. Nau-es muaj peb leeg tub, Xees, Haas hab Yafej. Nau-es yog ib tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg hab nwg yeej ibtxwm ua zoo taag nwg simneej. Nwg ua neej lawv le Vaajtswv sab nyam,
tabsis dlua le lwm tug, Vaajtswv pum has tas suavdlawg puavleej ua txhum huv tuabsi, hab pheej ua kev phem kev qas heev zuj zug moog thoob plawg txhua qhov chaw.
Vaajtswv saib lub nplajteb, nwg pum kev phem kev qas puv nkaus, rua qhov tej tuabneeg puavleej ua phem kawg le.

Vaajtswv txhaj has rua Nau-es has tas, “Kuv txav txim sab yuav ua kuas tuabneeg tuag tu noob. Kuv yuav ua kuas puab raug kev puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi moog, rua qhov lub nplajteb nuav puv nkaus puab txujkev ua nruj ua tsiv xwb.
Koj ca le moog muab cov ntoo kubtwg lug txua ua ib lub nkoj, ua kuas muaj ntau chaav rua huv lub nkoj ntawd hab muab roj ntoos lug leem kuas thoob plawg saab huv hab saab nrau huv tuabsi.
Txua lub nkoj ntawd qhov ntev kuas muaj peb puas tshim, qhov dlaav kuas muaj tsib caug tshim, hab qhov sab kuas muaj peb caug tshim.
Muab vuag  vuv lub nkoj ntawd rua hab tseg le ib tshim thoob plawg, tsi xob xov kuas ti rua sau cov vuag. Lub nkoj ntawd ua kuas muaj peb tshooj hab ua lub qhovrooj rua ib saab.
Kuv yuav tso dlej lug nyaab lub nplajteb nuav kuas txhua tsaav yaam kws muaj sa nyob raug puamtsuaj moog. Txhua yaam kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav yuav tuag taag huv tuabsi.
Tabsis kuv yuav coglug rua koj. Koj ca le coj koj tug quaspuj, koj cov tub, hab koj cov nyaab moog nyob huv lub nkoj.
Coj txhua yaam tsaj ib yaam ib nkawg hab txhua yaam noog ib yaam ib nkawg nrug koj moog nyob huv lub nkoj, kuas tej tsaj ntawd txhaj tsi tuag.
Npaaj txhua yaam zaub mov coj moog rua koj tsev tuabneeg hab tej tsaj tau noj nyob huv lub nkoj.”
Nau-es txhaj ua txhua yaam lawv le Vaajtswv tau has.

Vaajtswv has rua Nau-es has tas, “Koj hab koj tsev tuabneeg ca le moog nyob huv lub nkoj. Taagnrho tej tuabneeg kws nyob huv nplajteb tam nuav, kuv pum koj tuab leeg xwb txhaj le ua lub neej ncaaj nceeg.
Coj tej tsaj kws huv ib yaam xyaa nkawm, tabsis cov tsaj kws tsi huv, coj ib yaam ib nkawg nrug koj moog nyob huv lub nkoj.
Dlua le ntawd, coj tej noog ib yaam xyaa nkawm moog hab. Ua le nuav kuas txhua yaam tsaj hab tej noog txhaj yuav muaj sa nyob hab fuamvaam rua huv lub nplajteb nuav dlua ntxiv.
Xyaa nub sau nuav kuv yuav tso naag lug plaub caug nub plaub caug mo rua huv nplajteb nuav, kuas txhua yaam muaj sa kws kuv tsim tseg lawm kuas raug puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi moog.”
Nau-es ua txhua yaam lawv le Vaajtswv tau saamfwm rua nwg lawm.
Thaus dlej nyaab nplajteb Nau-es noobnyoog muaj rau pua xyoo.
Nau-es hab nwg quaspuj, nwg cov tub, hab cov nyaab puavleej moog nyob rua huv lub nkoj kuas tsi raug dlej nyaab.
Txhua yaam tsaj hab noog, tej maum tej txiv, tej puj tej lauv, tsi has cov kws huv lossis tsi huv,
puavleej nrug Nau-es moog huv tuabsi rua huv lub nkoj, lawv le Vaajtswv saamfwm lawm.
Xyaa nub tom qaab dlej naag txawm laub quas lug lug nyaab nplajteb.

Thaus Nau-es noobnyoog muaj rau pua xyoo, txwm nkaus rua nub kaum xyaa lub ob hlis ntuj, nub ntawd ntuj ca le tsaus dlub ncab, naag laub quas lug sau ntuj lug rua huv nplajteb, hab tej qhovdlej txhawv ntawm tej hauv haav phwj yog huv aav tuaj,
hab naag lug rua huv nplajteb nuav tau plaub caug nub plaub caug mo.
Tuab nub ntawd Nau-es hab nwg quaspuj coj obtug peb tug tub: Xees, Haas, Yafej hab peb tug nyaab nrug obtug moog nyob rua huv lub nkoj.
Txhua yaam tsaj, tsi has tsaj nyeg hab tsaj qus, tsaj luj tsaj miv, naab, qaav, kaab, ntsaum, hab txhua yaam noog puavleej nrug puab moog rua huv lub nkoj huv tuabsi.
Txhua tsaav yaam tsaj kws muaj sa, puavleej nrug Nau-es moog nyob huv lub nkoj,
lawv le Vaajtswv tau saamfwm rua Nau-es lawm. Ces tug TSWV maam le kaw lub qhovrooj nkoj rua.
Naag yeej lug tsi tu le tau plaub caug nub, hab dlej fuam sab zuj zug ua rua lub nkoj nqaa hlo ntaab yeeg lawm.
Dlej txhaj nyaab sab heev tuaj, hab ntsawj lub nkoj ntaab yeeg sau nplaim dlej.
Dlej nyaab sab zuj zug moog vuv taagnrho tej hauv roob sab huv tuabsi,
hab dlej tseem nyaab dlhau tej hauv roob sab ntawd rua sau kaum tsib tshim lawm hab.
Txhua yaam kws muaj sa nyob huv nplajteb nuav tuag taag, tsi has naag noog, kaab, ntsaum, tsaj nyeg, tsaj qus, hab tej tuabneeg yeej tsi seem hlo le.
Txhua yaam kws txawj ua paa nyob huv nplajteb nuav tuag taag huv tuabsi.

Tug TSWV ua rua ib puas tsaav yaam kws muaj sa nyob huv nplajteb nuav, tuabneeg, tsaj hab noog tuag tu noob nrho. Tsuas tshuav Nau-es hab cov kws nrug nwg moog nyob huv lub nkoj txhaj seem muaj sa nyob xwb.
Dlej yeej tsi nqeg le tau ib puas tsib caug nub.
Vaajtswv yeej ncu ntsoov Nau-es hab txhua yaam tsaj kws nrug nwg nyob huv lub nkoj, nwg txhaj ua kuas cua ntsawj, hab dlej pib nqeg zuj zug moog.
Tej qhovdlej txhawv huv nplajteb txawm txhaws hab rooj ntug txawm kaw. Naag ca le tu,
hab dlej pib nqeg zuj zug tau ib puas tsib caug nub.
Ces nub kaum xyaa lub xyaa hli ntuj lub nkoj txhaj lug khuab rua sau lub hauv roob Alalaj.
Dlej pheej nqeg zuj zug lawm, hab nub xab ib lub kaum hli ntuj txhaj pum tej hauv roob tshwm tuaj.
Tom qaab plaub caug nub, Nau-es txhaj qheb qhovrais nkoj
tso ib tug uab laag yaa tawm moog, tug uab laag ntawd yaa yuj moog yuj lug txug thaus dlej nqhuab taag.
Tom qaab ntawd, Nau-es rov tso dlua ib tug nquab yaa tawm moog saib dlej nqeg taag lawm los tsi tau,

tug nquab nrhav tsi tau chaw tsaws le, rua qhovdlej tseem nyaab puv nkaus huv nplajteb nuav. Tug nquab txhaj yaa rov lug tsaws ntawm lub nkoj, hab Nau-es cev teg moog muab tug nquab lug rua huv lub nkoj.
Nwg tog tau xyaa nub ntxiv hab rov tso dlua ib tug nquab yaa tawm moog saib.

Thaus yuav tsaus ntuj tug nquab txhaj kwv tau ib rev nplooj txiv ntoo roj ntawm nwg tug kaug ncauj yaa rov qaab lug cuag Nau-es. Thaus Nau-es pum le ntawd, nwg txhaj paub has tas dlej nqeg ti aav lawm.
Ces nwg rov tog tau xyaa nub hab tso dlua ib tug nquab yaa moog saib dlua ib zag ntxiv, tabsis zag nuav tug nquab tsi yaa rov lug lawm.

Nau-es noobnyoog muaj rau pua ib xyoos, rua lub ib hlis ntuj nub xab ib, nub ntawd dlej nqhuab taagnrho huv tuabsi lawm. Nau-es yaws tej vuag kws vuv lub nkoj, tsaa qhovmuag saib ibncig ntawd, hab pum aav tub pib qhuav lawm.
Ces nub neeg nkaum xyaa lub ob hlis ntuj lub nplajteb nuav qhuav taagnrho.
Vaajtswv has rua Nau-es has tas,
“Koj hab koj quaspuj, koj cov tub, hab koj cov nyaab ca le tawm huv lub nkoj nuav moog.
Mej coj taagnrho tej tsaj tsi has tsaj nyeg, tsaj qus, naab, qaav, hab noog huv tuabsi nrug koj moog, kuas tej tsaj ntawd fuamvaam moog puv nplajteb.”
Yog le ntawd, Nau-es txhaj coj nwg quaspuj, nwg cov tub, hab cov nyaab tawm huv lub nkoj moog.
Taagnrho tej tsaj luj tsaj miv kws nyob sau npoo aav, tej noog kws yaa sau nruab ntug, nyag ua nyag ib paab tawm huv lub nkoj lug ua tsheej paab tsheej pawg lawv le nyag yaam tsaj rua saab nrau.
Nau-es teeb tau ib lub thaaj rua tug TSWV, nwg muab tej tsaj huv hab tej noog ib yaam ib tug coj lug tua hab muab hlawv taagnrho fij rua Vaajtswv sau lub thaaj ntawd.

Tej paa khoom fij ntawd tsw qaab ntxag ua rua tug TSWV txaus sab heev, hab tug TSWV xaav has tas, “Kuv yuav tsi foom phem rua lub nplajteb ib zag ntxiv, vim tej kws tuabneeg ua ntawd le lawm, kuv paub tuabneeg yeej ibtxwm xaav phem thaus yau lug. Kuv yuav tsi ua rua txhua yaam kws muaj sa kuas raug puamtsuaj le kws kuv tau ua taag lug nuav lawm.

Yog lub nplajteb nuav tseem muaj nyob, yuav muaj caij cog qoobloo hab muaj caij sau qoobloo, muaj caij ntuj kub ntuj no, muaj caij ntuj qhua hab caij ntuj naag, muaj nruab nub hab mo ntuj moog ibtxhis tsi kawg.”
Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua Nau-es hab nwg cov tub has tas, “Mej yuav muaj tub muaj ki coob, kuas mej txhaj muaj xeebntxwv fuamvaam moog nyob puv nplajteb.
Txhua yaam tsaj, tsi has tsaj nyeg, tsaj qus, naab, qaav, naag noog, hab tej ntseg puavleej ntshai mej. Kuv yuav muab tej tsaj ntawd tso rua mej kaav.
Txij nuav moog kuv pub txhua yaam tsaj, noog, hab ntseg rua mej noj, ib yaam le tej zaub kws kuv tub pub rua mej noj lawm.
Tabsis mej tsi xob noj tej nqaj kws txhaam ntshaav, rua qhov ntshaav yog yaam kws ua kuas muaj txujsa.
Yog leejtwg tua tuabneeg, kuv yuav rau txim tuag rua tug ntawd. Yog tej tsaj tum tuabneeg tuag, kuv yuav rau txim tuag rua tej tsaj ntawd ib yaam nkaus.
Yog leejtwg tua tuabneeg, mas lwm tug yuav muab tug ntawd tua ib yaam nkaus, rua qhov Vaajtswv tsim tuabneeg muaj tug yaam ntxwv zoo le Vaajtswv.
“Mej yuav muaj tubki coob, kuas mej tej xeebntxwv fuamvaam moog nyob puv lub nplajteb.”
Vaajtswv has rua Nau-es hab nwg cov tub tas,
“Txij nuav moog kuv coglug tseg rua koj hab koj cov xeebntxwv,
hab txhua yaam kws muaj sa, txhua yaam noog, hab txhua yaam tsaj kws nrug mej tawm huv lub nkoj lug.
Kuv coglug tseg rua mej has tas: kuv yuav tsi tso dlej lug nyaab txhua yaam kws muaj sa kuas puamtsuaj le zag nuav, hab dlej yuav tsi nyaab lub nplajteb kuas puamtsuaj le nuav ib zag ntxiv lawm.
Lub cim kws kuv coglug tseg moog ibtxhis rua mej hab txhua yaam kws muaj sa,
mas yog kuv yuav ua kuas muaj ib tug dluab zaaj sawv rua sau cov fuab. Tug dluab zaaj ntawd yog lub cim kws kuv coglug tseg nrug tuabneeg nplajteb.
Thaus twg kuv ua kuas muaj fuab roog sau nruab ntug, ces tug dluab zaaj ntawd yuav tshwm tuaj rua sau cov fuab.
Kuv yuav ncu ntsoov tej lug kws kuv cog tseg rua mej hab txhua yaam tsaj, mas kuv yuav tsi tso dlej lug nyaab txhua yaam kws muaj sa kuas puamtsuaj ib zag ntxiv le lawm.
Thaus tug dluab zaaj sawv tshwm sau cov fuab, kuv pum tug dluab zaaj ntawd, kuv yuav ncu txug tej lug kws kuv tau cog tseg moog ibtxhis rua mej hab txhua yaam kws muaj sa nyob huv nplajteb nuav.
Tug dluab zaaj nuav yog lub cim kws kuv coglug tseg rua txhua yaam kws muaj sa nyob huv nplajteb.”
Nau-es cov tub kws tawm huv lub nkoj lug yog: Xees, Haas hab Yafej. (Haas yog Kana-aas txiv.)
Nau-es peb leeg tub nuav yog txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav cov yawmkoob.
Nau-es yog tuabneeg ua laj ua teb, nwg yog thawj tug kws xub cog txiv maab ntaag.
Thaus nwg haus kua txiv maab, ua rua nwg qaug heev, hab nwg ca le hle rig tsho pw labqaab huv tsevntaub.
Thaus Haas kws yog Kana-aas txiv, pum nwg txiv pw labqaab le ntawd, nwg txawm tawm moog has qha rua nwg ob tug tijlaug.

Ces Xees hab Yafej txhaj moog muab tau ib lub tsho ntev nthuav kag rua nrau obtug nrausqaum hab muab khuam rua sau obtug xubpwg. Obtug txhaj kwv thaub qaab moog rua huv lub tsevntaub coj moog npug obtug txiv, obtug tig ntsejmuag rua ib caag vim obtug tsi xaav pum obtug txiv labqaab le ntawd.
Thaus Nau-es zoo cawv tsim lug nwg paub tej kws nwg tug tub ntxawg ua rua nwg,
Nau-es txhaj has tas, “Kana-aas raug foom tsi zoo lawm! Nwg yuav ua nwg ob tug tijlaug qhev.
Ca le ua tug TSWV kws yog Xees tug Vaajtswv tsaug! Kana-aas yuav ua Xees qhev moog le.
Thov kuas Vaajtswv ua rua Yafej caajceg fuamvaam! Thov Vaajtswv ca Yafej tej xeebntxwv nrug Xees tsaav tuabneeg nyob ua ke. Kana-aas yuav ua Yafej qhev.”
Tom qaab dlej nyaab nplajteb taag lawm, Nau-es tseem ua neej nyob tau peb puas tsib caug xyoo ntxiv,
hab nwg tuag rua thaus nwg noobnyoog muaj cuaj pua tsib caug xyoo.
Tom qaab kws dlej nyaab nplajteb taag lawm, Nau-es peb tug tub: Xees, Haas hab Yafej maam muaj tubki; cov nraag qaab nuav yog puab cov xeebntxwv.
Yafej cov tub, Kumeles, Makus, Madais, Yavaas, Tunpas, Mesekis hab Tilas. Puab cov nuav yog yawmkoob ntawm cov tuabneeg kws tseem ris puab lub xeem.
Tsaav tuabneeg Akenas, Lifas hab Taunkamas yog Kumeles cov xeebntxwv.
Yavaas cov xeebntxwv yog Elisas, Xapees, Kilipulus hab Ludes,

puab yog yawmkoob ntawm cov tuabneeg kws moog nyob lawv tej koog povtxwv hab lawv tej ntug havtxwv. Cov nuav yog Yafej cov xeebntxwv, puab nyag moog nyob nyag ib lub tebchaws lawv le nyag xeem hab nyag paab kws has nyag yaam lug.
Haas cov tub yog Kuses, Iziv, Linpias, hab Kana-aas, puab cov nuav yog yawmkoob ntawm cov tuabneeg kws ris puab lub xeem.
Kuses cov xeebntxwv yog Senpas, Havilas, Satas, La-amas, hab Satekas. La-amas cov xeebntxwv yog cov tuabneeg Senpas hab cov Dedaas.
Kuses muaj ib tug tub hu ua Nimelus, nwg yog thawj tug tuabneeg kws muaj fwjchim kaav tebchaws nyob huv nplajteb nuav.

Vaajtswv paab nwg, nwg txhaj ua tau ib tug tuabneeg tua nqaj kws nto npe heev, vim le nuav tej tuabneeg txhaj pheej has tas, “Thov tug TSWV ua rua koj kuas koj yog ib tug tuabneeg tua nqaj kws nyob nto npe ib yaam le Nimelus!”
Lub nroog Npanpiloos, lub nroog Elekhas hab lub nroog Akas, yog thawj cov nroog kws nwg xub kaav, peb lub nroog nuav puavleej nyob huv tebchaws Npanpiloos.
Nwg tau tawm huv lub tebchaws ntawd moog rua huv tebchaws Axilias hab moog tsim lub nroog Nineves, lub nroog Lehaunpaus Iles, lub nroog Khalas
hab lub nroog Lesees kws nyob huv ntu nruab nraab ntawm lub nroog Nineves hab lub tuamceeb nroog Kalas.
Iziv cov xeebntxwv, mas yog cov Lidias, cov Anas, cov Lehas, cov Nafetus,
cov Pathelus, cov Kaselus hab Keletes; cov tuabneeg Filitees yog cov tuabneeg kws has lug sau nuav tej xeebntxwv.
Kana-aas tug tub hlub yog Xidoos, hab Hethas yog yawmkoob ntawm cov tuabneeg kws tseem ris obtug lub xeem.
Kana-aas yog yawmkoob ntawm cov Yenpus, cov Amaules, cov Kilekasis,
cov Hivis, cov Alikis, cov Xinis,
cov Alevas, cov Xemalis hab cov Hamathis. Cov Kana-aas muab faib ua tej xeem tso tawm nyag moog nyob nyag,

ua rua cov Kana-aas tug nrimteb kws pib ntawm Xidoos saab qaabteb moog txug ndlua rua Kelas kws ze rua ntawd Nkaxas, hab saab nubtuaj moog txug rua ntawm Xaudoos, Kaumaulas, Amas hab Xenpauyees kws nyob ze rua Lasas.
Ntawm nuav yog Haas cov xeebntxwv kws muab faib ua tej xeem hab tso nyag moog nyob muaj nyag ib lub tebchaws, nyag paab kws has nyag yaam lug.
Xees kws yog Yafej tug tijlaug, nwg yog yawmkoob ntawm cov tuabneeg Henplais.
Xees cov tub kws yog Elames, Asus, Apakesas, Lus, hab Alaas, puab puavleej yog yawmkoob ntawm cov tuabneeg kws ris puab lub xeem.
Alaas cov xeebntxwv yog cov Uxes, cov Hus, cov Nkethes hab cov Mesej.
Apakesas yog Selas txiv hab Selas yog Enpes txiv.
Enpes muaj ob tug tub: muaj ib tug hu ua Pelej,  rua qhov tam kws nwg ua neej nyob ntawd cov tuabneeg huv nplajteb nuav tau sis faib lawm, hab dlua le ib tug hu ua Yauketaas.
Yauketaas cov xeebntxwv yog cov Alamudas, cov Selefas, cov Haxemaves, cov Yelas,
cov Hadaulaas, cov Uxales, cov Nikelas,
cov Aunpales, cov Anpimales, cov Senpas,
cov Aufilis, cov Havilas hab cov Yaunpas. Taagnrho cov nuav puavleej yog Yauketaas cov xeebntxwv.
Lub tebchaws kws puab nyob mas txij ndlua ntawm Masas moog txug rua ntawm Sefalas kws nyob tim lub laaj roob saab nubtuaj.
Cov nuav yog Xees cov xeebntxwv puab nyag moog nyob nyag ib lub tebchaws lawv le nyag xeem hab nyag paab kws has nyag yaam lug.

Taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws has taag lug nuav puavleej yog Nau-es cov xeebntxwv, ib tam dlhau rua ib tam lawv le puab tej tsaav tuabneeg. Tom qaab kws dlej nyaab nplajteb txhaj muaj ntau tsaav tuabneeg tawm moog nyob puv lub nplajteb nuav, puab yog Nau-es cov tub tej xeebntxwv.
Thaus chivkeeb tej tuabneeg kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav puavleej paub ib yaam lug hab has ib yaam lug xwb.
Thaus puab tsiv moog rua saab nubtuaj, puab txhaj moog txug rua ntawm lub taj nraag Npanpiloos hab puab txawm ua zej ua zog nyob rua ntawm lub taj nraag ntawd.

Puab ib leeg has rua ib leeg tas, “Ca le tuaj! Peb yuav khawb aav lug puab ua thwvcib hab coj moog hlawv kuas tawv.” Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj muab cov thwvcib ntawd hab roj aav nplaum lu ua ke kuas ruaj khov.

Puab has tas, “Nwgnuav peb ca le tsim ua ib lub nroog hab puab ib tug pemthuam kuas sab nto ntuj, peb txhaj muaj koob muaj npe nyob nto moo lug hab tsi tawg tsiv moog nyob ua saab ua sua thoob nplajteb.”
Ces tug TSWV txhaj lug saib lub nroog hab tug pemthuam kws cov tuabneeg ntawd puab.
Hab tug TSWV has tas, “Nwgnuav puab yog ib paab hab has ib yaam lug; qhov nuav yog tej kws puab nyavnyuas pib ua xwb. Tsi ntev ntshai puab yuav ua tau txhua yaam lawv le puab xaav ua!
Peb ca le moog ua kuas puab tej lug sis txawv hab nyag has nyag ib yaam lug, ib leeg tsi totaub ib leeg.”
Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV txhaj lug ua rua puab tawg moog nyob ri sua thoob plawg lub nplajteb, hab puab txhaj tso tseg tsi tsim lub nroog ntawd ntxiv lawm.

Yog le ntawd, txhaj muab lub nroog ntawd hu ua Npanpiloos,  rua qhov tug TSWV ua rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg nyag has nyag ib yaam lug, hab nwg ua rua puab tawg ri sua ntawm qhov chaw ntawd moog nyob thoob plawg huv lub nplajteb nuav.
Ntawm nuav moog yog Xees cov xeebntxwv. Tom qaab kws dlej nyaab nplajteb taag tau ob xyoos, Xees muaj noobnyoog ib puas xyoo, nwg muaj ib tug tub hu ua Apakhesas;
dlhau ntawd, nwg tseem ua neej nyob tau tsib puas xyoo hab muaj mivnyuas coob leej ntxiv.
Thaus Apakesas noobnyoog muaj peb caug tsib xyoos, nwg muaj ib tug tub hu ua Selas,
dlhau ntawd, nwg tseem ua neej nyob tau plaub puas peb xyoos hab muaj mivnyuas coob leej ntxiv.
Thaus Selas noobnyoog muaj peb caug xyoo, nwg muaj ib tug tub hu ua Enpes;
dlhau ntawd, nwg tseem ua neej nyob tau plaub puas peb xyoos hab muaj mivnyuas coob leej ntxiv.
Thaus Enpes noobnyoog muaj peb caug plaub xyoos, nwg muaj ib tug tub hu ua Pelej;
dlhau ntawd, nwg tseem ua neej nyob tau plaub puas peb caug xyoo hab muaj mivnyuas coob leej ntxiv.
Thaus Pelej noobnyoog muaj peb caug xyoo, nwg muaj ib tug tub hu ua Le-us;
dlhau ntawd, nwg tseem ua neej nyob tau ob puas cuaj xyoos hab muaj mivnyuas coob leej ntxiv.
Thaus Le-us noobnyoog muaj peb caug ob xyoos, nwg muaj ib tug tub hu ua Selus;
dlhau ntawd, nwg tseem ua neej nyob tau ob puas xyaa xyoo hab muaj mivnyuas coob leej ntxiv.
Thaus Selus noobnyoog muaj peb caug xyoo, nwg muaj ib tug tub hu ua Nahaus;
dlhau ntawd, nwg tseem ua neej nyob tau ob puas xyoo hab muaj mivnyuas coob leej ntxiv.
Thaus Nahaus noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum cuaj xyoos, nwg muaj ib tug tub hu ua Telas;
dlhau ntawd, nwg tseem ua neej nyob tau ib puas kaum cuaj xyoos hab muaj mivnyuas coob leej ntxiv.
Tom qaab kws Telas noobnyoog muaj xyaa caum xyoo, nwg maam le muaj peb tug tub kws yog: Anplaas, Nahaus hab Halaas.
Ntawm nuav moog yog Telas cov xeebntxwv. Telas cov tub yog Anplaas, Nahaus, hab Halaas. Halaas yog Lauj txiv,
Halaas tuag ua ntej nwg txiv thaus tseem nyob huv lub nroog Ules huv tebchaws Npanpiloos kws yug nwg lawm.
Anplaas yuav Xalais ua quaspuj, hab Nahaus yuav Halaas kws yog Ixakhas txiv tug ntxhais Milekas lug ua quaspuj.
Xalais yeej ibtxwm xeeb tsi taug tub.

Telas coj nwg tug tub Anplaas, nwg tug xeebntxwv Lauj kws yog Halaas tug tub, hab nwg tug nyaab Xalais kws yog Anplaas tug quaspuj, tsiv tawm huv lub nroog Ules huv tebchaws Npanpiloos moog nyob rua tebchaws Kana-aas. Tabsis thaus puab tsiv lug txug ntawm Halaas, puab txawm lug nyob rua qhov ntawd.
Telas tuag rua huv lub nroog ntawd, thaus nwg noobnyoog muaj ob puas tsib xyoos.
Vaajtswv has rua Anplaas has tas, “Koj ca le tso koj lub tebchaws, koj cov kwvtij neejtsaa, hab koj txiv lub tsev tseg, hab sawv kev moog rua nraag lub tebchaws kws kuv yuav qha rua koj.

Kuv yuav pub koj muaj xeebntxwv coob, hab puab yuav ua ib tsaav tuabneeg tseemceeb. Kuv yuav foom koob moov rua koj, kuas koj lub koob lub npe nyob nto moo lug, hab koj yuav ua rua lwm leej lwm tug tau txais koob moov.

Kuv yuav foom koob moov rua tug kws ua zoo rua koj, Tabsis kuv yuav foom tsi zoo rua tug kws ua phem rua koj. Hab kuv yuav foom koob moov ntawm koj moog rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob thoob plawg nplajteb.”
Thaus Anplaas noobnyoog muaj xyaa caum tsib xyoos, nwg txawm tsiv tawm huv lub nroog Halaas lawv le tug TSWV tau has rua nwg lawm, hab Lauj nrug nwg moog.

Anplaas coj Xalais kws yog nwg tug quaspuj, nwg tug kwv Halaas tug tub Lauj, hab taagnrho obtug tej cuabtaam, obtug tej tubqhe hab ntxhais qhev kws nyob huv lub nroog Halaas, hab puab txawm sawv kev moog rua nraag tebchaws Kana-aas lawm. Thaus puab tsiv moog txug rua huv tebchaws Kana-aas lawm,

Anplaas taug kev huv lub tebchaws ntawd lug txug rua ntawm tsob ntoo xeeb huv Maules kws yog qhov chaw tseemceeb huv lub nroog Sekhees. (Thaus lub sijhawm ntawd cov tuabneeg Kana-aas tseem nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd.)

Tug TSWV tshwm rua Anplaas pum hab has rua nwg tas, “Lub tebchaws nuav yog lub kws kuv yuav muab pub rua koj cov xeebntxwv nyob.” Ces Anplaas txhaj teeb tau ib lub thaaj rua ntawm qhov chaw ntawd rua tug TSWV kws tau lug tshwm rua nwg pum.

Dlhau ntawd, Anplaas txhaj txaav chaw moog rua yaav qaabteb ntawm lub laaj roob kws nyob ntawm lub nroog Npethees saab nubtuaj hab nwg tsaa tsevntaub nyob rua ntawd. Lub nroog Npethees nyob saab nubpoob hab lub nroog A-is nyob saab nubtuaj. Thaus Anplaas nyob qhov ntawd, nwg teeb tau ib lub thaaj rua tug TSWV hab pehawm tug TSWV.
Ces nwg tsiv ib qho rua ib qho, nwg txhaj tsiv moog nyob rua tebchaws Kana-aas yaav qaabteb lawm.
Lub sijhawm ntawd muaj kev tshaib nqhes nyob huv tebchaws Kana-aas, Anplaas txhaj tsiv moog nyob rua nraag tebchaws Iziv tau ib ntus.
Thaus nwg taabtom moog yuav txug ntawm tug nrimteb moog rua huv tebchaws Iziv, nwg has rua nwg tug quaspuj tas, “Kuv paub koj yog ib tug quaspuj kws zoo nkauj heev.
Thaus cov Iziv pum koj, puab yuav has tas, koj yog kuv tug quaspuj. Ces puab yuav tua kuv povtseg hab tseg koj ca.
Koj ca le has rua puab tas, koj yog kuv tug muam xwb; yog vim muaj koj puab txhaj yuav tseg kuv txujsa hab ua zoo rua kuv.”
Thaus Anplaas moog dlhau plawg nrimteb rua huv tebchaws Iziv lawm, cov Iziv pum nwg tug quaspuj zoo nkauj heev.
Muaj qee leej numtswv pum Xalais zoo nkauj heev, puab txhaj moog pav qha rua Falaus, yog le ntawd, luas txhaj tuaj coj Xalais moog rua huv Falaus lub loog.
Vim muaj Xalais, Falaus txhaj ua zoo heev rua Anplaas hab muab yaaj, tshis, nyuj, neeg luav, qhev hab ntxhuav pub rua Anplaas.
Tabsis vim Falaus tau coj Xalais moog, tug TSWV txhaj tso tej kaab mob phem lug raug Falaus hab cov tuabneeg huv nwg lub loog nyaav heev.
Falaus txhaj tso tuabneeg moog cuag Anplaas hab nug nwg has tas, “Vim le caag koj ua le nuav rua kuv? Ua le caag koj tsi qha ncaaj rua kuv paub tas, Xalais yog koj tug quaspuj?
Vim le caag koj txhaj has tas, nwg yog koj tug muam, hab ca kuv coj nwg moog yuav ua kuv tug quaspuj? Koj tug quaspuj nyob ntawm nuav, ca le coj nwg hab tsiv tawm moog!”
Falaus saamfwm rua nwg cov tubkhai, puab txhaj ntab Anplaas tawm huv puab lub tebchaws, nrug nwg tug quaspuj hab coj txhua yaam kws yog nwg tug huv tuabsi moog.
Anplaas txhaj coj nwg tug quaspuj hab txhua tsaav yaam kws yog nwg tug, hab Lauj nrug nwg tawm huv tebchaws Iziv moog txug rua peg Nenkes huv tebchaws Kana-aas saab qaabteb.
Anplaas yog ib tug tuabneeg muaj txag npluanuj, muaj yaaj, muaj tshis, muaj nyuj, muaj nyaj hab muaj kub ntau heev.

Ces Anplaas tawm ntawm qhov chaw ntawd hab nwg tsiv ib qho dlhau rua ib qho, rov lug rua huv Npethees. Nwg lug txug rua ntawm qhov chaw kws nyob nruab nraab ntawm Npethees hab A-is kws yaav thaus nwg tau lug tsuam chaw nyob ib ntus
hab nwg tau teeb ib lub thaaj. Nwg txhaj pehawm tug TSWV nyob qhov ntawd.
Lauj tug kws nrug Anplaas tsiv ua ke, kuj muaj yaaj, muaj tshis, muaj nyuj, muaj cuab muaj yig hab muaj tubqhe huv tuabsi.
Yog le ntawd, txhaj tsi muaj tshaav zaub txaus rua obtug nyob ua ke, rua qhov obtug muaj tsaj txhu coob heev.

Ces Anplaas cov tub yug tsaj hab Lauj cov tub yug tsaj txhaj sis caav sis tshe nyob tsi taug ua ke. (Lub sijhawm ntawd cov tuabneeg Kana-aas hab cov tuabneeg Pelixes tseem nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd.)
Anplaas txhaj has rua Lauj tas, “Wb yog kwvtij txiv tub tsi tsimnyog ca koj cov tuabneeg hab kuv cov tuabneeg sis caav sis tshe le nuav.

Wb ca le sis faib nyag moog nyob nyag. Xaiv saib koj nyam thaaj chaw twg. Yog koj moog nyob saab txhumphem, kuv maam moog nyob saab xis, yog koj moog nyob saab xis, kuv maam moog nyob saab txhumphem.”

Lauj tig saib ibncig ntawd hab pum taagnrho lub Haav Yauladees moog thoob plawg rua ntawm Xau-as, mas muaj dlej txhawv txhua qhov, ib yaam le tug TSWV lub Vaaj  lossis zoo ib yaam le lub tebchaws Iziv ntaag. (Lub sijhawm ntawd yog ua ntej tug TSWV hlawv lub nroog Xaudoos hab lub nroog Kaumaulas.)
Yog le ntawd, Lauj txhaj hom taagnrho lub Haav Yauladees hab nwg txhaj tsiv moog nyob rua saab nubtuaj lawm. Qhov kws obtug tau sis ncaim yog le ntawd.
Anplaas nyob rua saab tebchaws Kana-aas, hab Lauj moog nyob huv tej nroog kws nyob lawv haav hab moog tsaa tsevntaub nyob ze lub nroog Xaudoos.
Cov tuabneeg Xaudoos ua phem ua qas hab ua txhum tawmtsaam tug TSWV luj kawg le.
Tom qaab kws Lauj ncaim lawm, tug TSWV has rua Anplaas has tas, “Koj tuaj ntawm qhov chaw kws koj nyob ko, tsaa qhovmuag ua tuab zoo saib moog rua saab qaabteb hab qaumteb, nubtuaj hab nubpoob.
Kuv yuav muab taagnrho lub tebchaws kws koj qhovmuag pum pub rua koj hab koj cov xeebntxwv, hab lub tebchaws ntawd yuav yog koj tug moog ibtxhis le.
Kuv yuav pub kuas koj muaj xeebntxwv coob heev kws tsi muaj leejtwg yuav suav txheeb le, yog leejtwg suav txheeb tej moov aav huv nplajteb nuav, mas txhaj yuav suav txheeb koj cov xeebntxwv!
Nwgnuav, koj ca le sawv kev moog kuas thoob plawg lub tebchaws nuav, rua qhov kuv yuav muab taagnrho lub tebchaws nuav pub rua koj.”

Yog le ntawd, Anplaas txhaj le tsiv tawm ntawm thaaj chaw ntawd hab moog tsaa tsevntaub nyob ze tsob ntoo xeeb ntawm thaaj chaw Maales huv lub nroog Henploos, hab thaus nyob ntawd nwg teeb tau ib lub thaaj ua chaw fij khoom rua tug TSWV.

Muaj plaub tug vaajntxwv kws yog: Alafees tug kws kaav lub nroog Npanpiloos, Ali-aus tug kws kaav lub nroog Elasas, Khedaule-aumes tug kws kaav lub nroog Elames, hab Tidas tug kws kaav lub nroog Nkauyees,

tau tawm moog ua rog rua tsib tug vaajntxwv kws yog Npelas tug kws kaav lub nroog Xaudoos, Npisas tug kws kaav lub nroog Kaumaulas, Sinaj tug kws kaav lub nroog Amaas, Semenpes tug kws kaav lub nroog Xenpauyees, hab tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub nroog Npelas, (lossis yog Xau-as).
Tsib tug vaajntxwv nuav txhaj koom sab ua ke tuaj ib tog hab txhij tubrog moog nyob rua huv lub Haav Xidees kws taamsim nuav yog lub paag dlej Havtxwv Tuag ntaag.
Puab poob moog ua Khedaule-aumes pejxeem tau kaum ob xyoos, tabsis xyoo kaum peb puab rov tig ntxeev sab sawv tawmtsaam nwg.

Ces xyoo kaum plaub Khedaule-aumes hab cov vaajntxwv kws tuaj nwg tog nrug puab cov tubrog tuaj tua yeej cov Lefayees kws nyob huv lub nroog Atelaus Kalenais, cov Xuximes kws nyob huv lub nroog Hames, cov Emis kws nyob huv lub taj nraag Kili-athayees,
hab cov Haulis kws nyob sau cov laaj roob Edoos, puab txhaj muab cov tuabneeg nuav caum tua moog ti nkaus rua ntawm ntug nroog Epalas kws nyob tom taj zeb suabpuam.

Ces puab txawm tig rov qaab lug txug huv lub nroog Kades (lossis yog Emisapas). Puab ntaus tau taagnrho saab tebchaws Amalej hab puab tua yeej cov tuabneeg Amaules kws nyob rua huv lub nroog Haxaxoos Tamaj.
Ces cov vaajntxwv kws kaav lub nroog Xaudoos, Kaumaulas, Amaas, Xenpauyees hab Npelas (lossis Xau-as), txhaj tau txhij puab cov tubrog tuaj ntaus rog rua huv lub Haav Xidees hab tua

Khedaule-aumes kws yog vaajntxwv kaav lub nroog Elames, Tidas kws yog vaajntxwv kaav lub nroog Nkauyees, Alafees kws yog vaajntxwv kaav lub nroog Sinas, hab Ali-aus kws yog vaajntxwv kaav lub nroog Elasas; tsib tug vaajntxwv nuav ua rog rua plaub tug vaajntxwv.

Lub taj ntawd muaj qhov roj aav nplaum ntau heev, ces thaus tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub nroog Xaudoos hab tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub nroog Kaumaulas nrhav kev tsiv tawm huv tshaav rog, obtug txhaj poob cov qhov roj aav nplaum ntawd, tabsis dlua le peb tug vaajntxwv tsiv dlim nce moog rua peg roob lawm.
Ces plaub tug vaajntxwv ntawd txhaj muab txhua yaam kws muaj nyob huv lub nroog Xaudoos hab Kaumaulas, hab tej zaub mov huv tuabsi, coj tsiv moog lawm.
Lauj kws yog Anplaas tug kwv Halaas tug tub, nwg nyob huv lub nroog Xaudoos, puab txhaj nteg tau nwg hab fuab nwg tej cuabtaam coj moog lawm dlu lug.

Tabsis muaj ib tug txivneej tsiv dlim huv tshaav rog lug has txhua yaam rua Anplaas kws yog tuabneeg Henplais kws nyob ze rua ntawm Maales tug kws yog tuabneeg Amaules cov ntoo xeeb. Maales hab nwg ob tug tijlaug, Esekaus hab Aneles puavleej koom teg tuaj Anplaas tog.

Thaus Anplaas nov dlheev has tas yeebncuab nteg tau nwg tug kwv Halaas tug tub Lauj lawm, nwg txhaj hu taagnrho peb puas kaum yim leej tubrog huv nwg lub yeej tawm moog caum tua plaub tug vaajntxwv ntawd moog txug ndlua huv lub nroog Daas.

Thaus tsaus ntuj lawm nwg txhaj muab nwg cov tubrog faib ua tej paab moog tua cov yeebncuab, plaub tug vaajntxwv ntawd txhaj swb tawg tsiv taag. Anplaas puab tseem caum tua moog txug ndlua peg lub nroog Haunpas kws nyob ntawm Damaxes saab qaumteb,

Anplaas txeeb tau txhua yaam kws luas coj moog lawm rov qaab lug huv tuabsi. Hab nwg tseem coj tau nwg tug kwv Halaas tug tub Lauj hab Lauj tej cuabtaam, cov quaspuj hab tej tuabneeg kws raug luas nteg tau lawm rov lug taagnrho huv tuabsi.

Thaus Anplaas moog tua yeej vaajntxwv Khedaule-aumes hab peb tug vaajntxwv kws tuaj Khedaule-aumes tog rov qaab lug, tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub nroog Xaudoos txhaj tuaj tog Anplaas ntawm lub Haav Saves (lossis hu ua lub Haav Vaajntxwv).
Mekhixedes kws ua vaajntxwv kaav lub nroog Xalees hab ua ib tug povthawj rua Vaajtswv tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, txhaj coj ncuav hab cawv txiv maab tuaj pub rua Anplaas,
hab foom koob moov rua nwg has tas, “Thov kuas Vaajtswv tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, tug kws tsim lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb foom koob moov rua Anplaas!

Thov kuas Vaajtswv tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus kws tau paab koj ntaus yeej koj cov yeebncuab, tau txais koob meej!” Hab Anplaas muab tej khoom kws nwg moog txeeb tau rov qaab lug ntawd ib feem kaum pub rua Mekhixedes.
Tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub nroog Xaudoos has rua Anplaas tas, “Koj yuav txhua yaam khoom huv tuabsi, tabsis thov muab kuv cov pejxeem rov qaab rua kuv xwb.”
Anplaas teb has tas, “Kuv tau tsaa teg coglug taabmeeg tug TSWV, Vaajtswv tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, tug kws tsim lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb has tas,

kuv tsi yuav ib yaam dlaabtsi kws yog koj tug. Txawm yog ib txuj xuv lossis ib txuj nyuas hlua khau khab, kuv tub tsi yuav. Koj txhaj yuav khaav tsi tau has tas, ‘Kuv yog tug kws tsaa Anplaas npluanuj ntaag.’

Kuv yuav tsi nqaa ib yaam dlaabtsi moog rua kuv yuav le. Kuv tsuas leeg yuav tej zaub mov kws kuv cov tubrog muab noj taag lawm xwb. Tabsis cov kws koom teg paab kuv, Aneles, Esekaus, hab Maales, ca puab yuav tej kws yog puab tug.”
Tom qaab ntawd Anplaas ua ywgtoog hab nov tug TSWV has rua nwg tas, “Anplaas, koj tsi xob ntshai. Kuv yuav ua dlaim hlau thaiv koj hab kuv yuav muab tej nqe zug kws zoo heev rua koj.”

Tabsis Anplaas teb has tas, “Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, kuv yeej ibtxwm tsi muaj tub, koj yuav muab nqe zug zoo rua kuv ua dlaabtsi? Tug kws yuav tuav kuv tej qubtxeeg qubteg, ces yog Eli-exes kws yog tuabneeg Damaxes  nkaus xwb.
Koj tub tsi pub mivnyuas rua kuv, ntshai yuav kawg kuv muab kuv tej qubtxeeg qubteg tso rua kuv ib tug tubqhe kws yug huv kuv tsev ua tug tuav.”

Ces dlhau ntawd lug, nwg rov qaab nov tug TSWV has rua nwg ib zag ntxiv tas: “Tug tubqhe Eli-exes yuav tsi tau ua tug tuav koj tej qubtxeeg qubteg, koj tug tub kws koj yug txhaj yog tug kws yuav tuav koj tej qubtxeeg qubteg.”

Vaajtswv coj Anplaas tawm moog rua nrau zoov hab has rua nwg tas, “Koj tsaa qhovmuag saib sau ntuj hab suav cov nubqub sau saib koj suav puas txheeb, koj yuav muaj xeebntxwv coob npaum le tej nubqub ntawd ntaag.”
Anplaas txhaj ca sab ntsoov rua tug TSWV tej lug. Vim nwg muaj kev ca sab, tug TSWV txhaj txaus sab heev rua nwg hab suav has tas nwg yog ib tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg.
Ces tug TSWV has rua nwg tas, “Kuv yog tug TSWV kws coj koj kev tawm huv lub nroog Ules kws nyob huv tebchaws Npanpiloos lug, hab kuv yuav muab lub tebchaws nuav pub rua koj ua koj tug moog le.”
Tabsis Anplaas nug has tas, “tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, yuav ua le caag kuv txhaj paub has tas, lub tebchaws nuav yog kuv tug tag?”

Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Koj ca le coj ib tug nyuj, ib tug tshis hab ib tug laug yaaj, mas peb tug tsaj nuav ib tug twg yuavtsum muaj noobnyoog peb xyoos, ib tug nquab dlawb hab ib tug nquab nyeg tuaj fij rua kuv.”
Anplaas coj tej tsaj nuav tuaj tua fij rua Vaajtswv, hab muab tej tsaj ntawd phua ua ob saab, muab ib saab tso rua ib qho ua ob leej sis ncaag zog, tabsis nwg tsi phua ob tug noog.
Thaus dlaav npoj yaa lug tsaws rua sau cov nqaj ntawd, nwg txawm muab tej dlaav ntawd lawv yaa huv tuabsi lawm.
Thaus kws lub nub yuav poob qho, Anplaas txawm tsaug zug heev, hab muaj ib qho tsaus nti lug roog nkaus nwg ua rua nwg ntshai kawg le.

Tug TSWV has rua nwg tas, “Koj tej xeebntxwv yuav moog nrug cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws nyob, puab yuav moog ua luas qhev nyob lub tebchaws ntawd hab yuav raug kev quab yuam tsimtxom moog txug plaub puas xyoo.
Tabsis kuv yuav rau txim rua tsaav tuabneeg kws quab yuam puab ua qhev ntawd, hab thaus puab tawm huv lub tebchaws ntawd lug, puab yuav nqaa nyaj txag txhua yaam ntau heev nrug puab lug.
Tabsis koj yuav ua neej nyob laug nkoog, kaaj sab lug moog txug nub tuag, hab koj tej xeebntxwv yuav coj koj lub cev moog log.

Tom qaab kws dlhau plaub tam tuabneeg lawm, koj cov xeebntxwv yuav tau rov qaab lug rua ntawm nuav, rua qhov kuv yuav tsi ntab cov tuabneeg Amaules tawm moog txug thaus puab ua kev phem kev qas kuas txaus kuv rau txim rua puab tsaiv.”

Thaus nub poob qho hab tsaus ntuj kag lawm, taamsim ntawd txawm muaj ib cubtawg nchu paa auv nab hab ib teg tsau cig laam lug tshwm lug phua plhawv kem nruab nraab ntawm cov nqaj tsaj ntawd moog lawm.

Nub ntawd tug TSWV txawm coglug tseg rua Anplaas has tas, “Kuv yuav muab taagnrho lub tebchaws nuav pub rua koj cov xeebntxwv, txij ndlua ntawm Iziv nrimteb lug moog txug ndlua rua ntawm tug Dlej Efalates,
dlua le ntawd, kuv tseem muab cov Kenis, cov Kenixis, cov Kamoos,
cov Hitis, cov Pelixes, cov Lefayees,
cov Amaules, cov Kana-aas, cov Kikasis hab cov Yenpus tej tebchaws pub rua koj cov xeebntxwv huv tuabsi.”
Xalais kws yog Anplaas tug quaspuj yeej ibtxwm xeeb tsi taug tub le. Tabsis nwg muaj ib tug ntxhais qhev kws yog tuabneeg Iziv hu ua Hankas,

ces Xalais txawm has rua Anplaas tas, “Tug TSWV tseem tsi tau pub kuv muaj mivnyuas. Koj ca le moog nrug kuv tug ntxhais qhev pw, tej zag nwg yuav muaj taug mivnyuas rua kuv.” Anplaas pum zoo ua lawv le Xalais has ntawd.
Yog le ntawd, Xalais txhaj muab Hankas rua Anplaas ua nam yau. (Qhov nuav yog tom qaab kws Anplaas tub lug nyob rua huv tebchaws Kana-aas tau kaum xyoo lawm.)
Anplaas moog nrug Hankas pw, ces Hankas txawm xeeb tub. Thaus Hankas paub tas nwg xeeb tub lawm, nwg txawm khaavtheeb heev hab saib tsi taug Xalais.

Ces Xalais has rua Anplaas has tas, “Tub yog vim koj ntaag Hankas txhaj le saib tsi taug kuv.  Kuv yog tug kws muab nwg rua koj, tabsis txij thaus nwg paub has tas nwg xeeb tub lawm, nwg txawm ca le saib tsi taug kuv. Thov kuas tug TSWV txav txim rua wb, saib yog koj ua txhum lossis yog kuv ua txhum!”
Anplaas teb has tas, “Nwg yog koj tug ntxhais qhev kws koj tswjfwm, koj ca le ua rua nwg lawv le koj pum zoo.” Ces Xalais txhaj le tsimtxom Hankas heev, Hankas txhaj le tsiv lawm.
Tug TSWV tug timtswv lug ntsib Hankas rua ntawm ib tug dlej txhawv kws nyob huv taj suabpuam ntawm txujkev kws moog rua huv lub nroog Sules
hab nug has tas, “Hankas kws yog Xalais tug ntxhais qhev, koj tuaj dlaabtsi ntawm nuav hab koj yuav moog qhov twg?” Hankas teb has tas, “Tub yog kuv tsiv Xalais kws yog kuv tug tswv.”
Tug timtswv has tas, “Koj ca le rov qaab moog cuag Xalais, hab ua nwg tug ntxhais qhev xwb.”
Ces tug timtswv rov has ntxiv tas “Kuv yuav pub rua koj muaj xeebntxwv coob heev, kuas tsi muaj leejtwg yuav suav txheeb le.
Koj yuav yug tau ib tug tub, hab koj yuav tis nwg lub npe hu ua Yisamayees,  rua qhov tug TSWV tub nov koj lub suab quaj vim koj txujkev txomnyem sab lawm.

Tabsis koj tug tub yuav ua lub neej le tug neeg luav qus, nwg yuav tawmtsaam txhua leej txhua tug, hab txhua leej txhua tug yuav tawmtsaam nwg. Nwg yuav ua tuabneeg twmzeej tsi nrug kwvtij nyob ua ke.”
Hankas xaav has tas, “Puas yog kuv pum Vaajtswv tag, hab kuv tseem muaj sa nyob qha txug zaaj nuav?”  Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tis npe rua tug TSWV kws nrug nwg has lug ntawd tas, “Tug TSWV kws Pum.”
Vim le ntawd tuabneeg txhaj hu lub qhov tshij kws nyob nruab nraab ntawm Kades hab Npeledis has tas, “Tug kws Pum Kuv hab tug kws Muaj Sa Nyob lub Qhov Tshij.”
Hankas yug tau ib tug tub rua Anplaas, hab Anplaas tis tug tub ntawd lub npe hu ua Yisamayees.
Lub sijhawm ntawd Anplaas noobnyoog muaj yim caum rau xyoo.

Thaus Anplaas noobnyoog muaj cuaj caum cuaj xyoos, tug TSWV tau rov lug tshwm rua nwg pum hab has tas, “Kuv yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus. Koj ca le noog kuv lug hab ua lub neej ncaaj nceeg moog kuas taag koj simneej.
Kuv yuav coglug tseg rua koj hab yuav pub kuas koj muaj xeebntxwv coob heev.”
Anplaas txawm txhus caug ndlua nyo hau ua ntsejmuag ti nkaus aav, hab Vaajtswv has tas,
“Tej lug kws kuv cog tseg rua koj muaj le nuav: Koj yuav tau ua ntau tsaav tuabneeg tug yawmkoob.
Koj lub npe yuav tsi hu ua Anplaas ntxiv lawm, tabsis yuav hu ua Anplahaas,  rua qhov kuv tsaa koj ua ntau tsaav tuabneeg tug yawmkoob.
Kuv yuav pub kuas koj muaj xeebntxwv fuamvaam coob heev. Koj tej xeebntxwv yuav moog ua ntau tsaav tuabneeg, hab muaj qee leej yuav ua vaajntxwv.

“Kuv yuav ceev kuv tej lug cog tseg rua koj hab koj tej xeebntxwv moog lawm yaav tom ntej ib tam dlhau rua ib tam kws yog cov lug cog tseg moog ibtxhis tsi kawg le. Kuv yuav yog koj tug Vaajtswv hab koj tej xeebntxwv tug Vaajtswv.

Kuv yuav muab lub tebchaws kws taamsim nuav koj tseem ua tuabneeg poob tebchaws nyob nuav pub rua koj hab koj tej xeebntxwv. Taagnrho lub tebchaws Kana-aas nuav yuav yog koj tej xeebntxwv le moog ibtxhis, hab kuv yuav yog puab tug Vaajtswv.”
Vaajtswv has rua Anplahaas has tas, “Koj yuavtsum ceev cov lug cog tseg nuav, rua koj hab koj tej xeebntxwv ib tam dlhau rua ib tam moog ibtxhis le.
Koj hab koj tej xeebntxwv yuavtsum ua kevcai txav tawv rua txhua tug txivneej.

Txij nub nua moog lawm yaav tom ntej koj yuavtsum muab txhua tug mivnyuas tub ua kevcai txav tawv thaus nwg noobnyoog muaj yim nub, tsi has tej tubqhe kws yug huv mej tsev hab tej tubqhe kws mej yuav ntawm lwm tsaav tuabneeg lug ua kevcai txav huv tuabsi. Txuj kevcai nuav yog lub cim tseemceeb ntawm lu lug cog tseg rua koj hab kuv.
Txhua tug yuavtsum tau ua kevcai txav tawv, hab txuj kevcai txav ntawm nqaj tawv nuav txhaj ua lub cim qha has tas, kuv cov lug cog tseg rua mej yeej nyob moog ibtxhis.
Txhua tug txivneej kws nwg tsi tau ua kevcai txav tawv yuav tau muab nwg rhu tawm huv kuv tsaav tuabneeg, rua qhov nwg tsi ceev lu lug cog tseg ntawd.”
Vaajtswv has rua Anplahaas tas, “Koj tsi xob hu koj tug quaspuj ua Xalais lawm, txij nub nua moog koj yuavtsum hu nwg lub npe ua Xalas lawm xwb.

Kuv yuav foom koob moov rua nwg hab kuv yuav pub nwg muaj ib tug tub rua koj. Kuv yuav foom koob moov rua nwg hab nwg yuav tau ua ntau tsaav tuabneeg leej nam, hab nwg tej xeebntxwv yuav muaj qee leej sawv ua vaajntxwv.”

Anplahaas txawm txhus caug ndlua nyo hau ua ntsejmuag ti nkaus aav, tabsis tseem luag tuabywv huv sab thaus nwg xaav txug has tas, “Yuav ua le caag tug tuabneeg kws noobnyoog muaj ib puas xyoo lawm tseem muaj taug mivnyuas? Xalas tub muaj cuaj caum xyoo lawm, nwg tseem yuav xeeb taug tub hab los?”
Anplahaas has rua Vaajtswv has tas, “Thov koj ca le foom koob moov rua Yisamayees xwb.”

Ces Vaajtswv has tas, “Tsi yog le ntawd, Xalas kws yog koj tug quaspuj yuav yug ib tug tub rua koj hab koj yuavtsum tis nwg lub npe hu ua Ixaj.  Kuv yuav ceev kuv tej lug cog tseg nrug nwg hab nwg cov xeebntxwv moog ibtxhis. Yog lu lug cog tseg kws nyob moog ibtxhis tsi kawg le.

Kuv nov tej lug kws koj tau thov kuv has txug Yisamayees, yog le ntawd, kuv yuav foom koob moov rua nwg hab pub kuas nwg muaj tubki hab xeebntxwv coob heev. Nwg yuav ua kaum ob tug vaajntxwv leej txiv, hab kuv yuav pub kuas nwg tej xeebntxwv ua ib tsaav tuabneeg tseemceeb.
Tabsis kuv yuav ceev kuv tej lug cog tseg nrug koj tug tub Ixaj, yog tug kws lwm xyoo rov txug lub caij nuav Xalas yuav yug rua koj.”
Thaus Vaajtswv has taag rua Anplahaas lawm, nwg txawm ncaim Anplahaas moog lawm.

Anplahaas ua lawv le Vaajtswv has, tuab nub ntawd xwb nwg txawm ua kevcai txav tawv rua nwg tug tub Yisamayees hab lwm tug txivneej kws nyob huv nwg lub tsev, taagnrho tej tubqhe kws yug huv nwg tsev hab tej tubqhe kws muab nyaj yuav lug huv tuabsi.
Anplahaas ua kevcai txav tawv thaus nwg muaj noobnyoog cuaj caum cuaj xyoos,
hab nwg tug tub Yisamayees ua thaus muaj kaum peb xyoos.
Obtug puavleej ua kevcai txav rua tuab nub ntawd,
hab tuab txhij nrug Anplahaas cov tubqhe txhua tug huv tuabsi.
Tug TSWV lug tshwm rua Anplahaas pum ntawm cov ntoo xeeb huv thaaj chaw Maales. Nub ntawd tshaav ntuj kub heev nwg txhaj tawm tuaj nyob ntawm nwg lub qhovrooj tsevntaub,
nwg tsaa qhovmuag saib pum peb tug txivneej sawv nreg nreeg tod. Thaus nwg pum dlheev puab, nwg txawm sawv tseeg moog cuag puab. Nwg txhus caug ndlua nyo ua ntsejmuag ti nkaus aav,
nwg has tas, “Kuv tug tswv, yog mej txaus sab rua kuv, thov tsi xob dlhau ntawm mej tug tubkhai nuav moog; kuv nyob ntawm nuav yuav tu mej.
Ca kuv moog nqaa mivntsiv dlej tuaj rua mej ntxuav kutaw tsaiv, thov mej su huv qaab tsob ntoo nuav kuas lug sav.

Kuv tseem yuav moog nqaa mivntsiv zaub mov tuaj rua mej noj, mej txhaj yuav muaj zug taug kev moog ntxiv. Mej tub tuaj txug ntawm kuv tsev nuav lawm, thov ca kuv tu mej tsaiv.” Puab teb has tas, “Koj ca le moog ua lawv le koj has.”
Anplahaas maaj ceev nrooj rov moog rua huv tsevntaub hab has rua Xalas has tas, “Kawgkag, koj ca le moog muab ib naab moov nplej kws zoo tshaaj plawg, lug puab ua ncuav hab muab cub.”
Ces Anplahaas txawm dlha loo moog rua nraag paab tsaj hab nteg tau ib tug mivnyuas nyuj tseem mog hab rog rog, coj lug rua ib tug tubkhai, kuas nwg muab tua hab ua kawgkag kuas sav.

Nwg txhaj muab mivntsiv roj mig nyuj qhuav, mivntsiv kua mig nyuj, hab cov nqaj kws hau tau sav lawm, coj moog rau kag rua ntawm cov txivneej ntawd xubndlag. Anplahaas rau zaub rau mov rua puab noj huv qaab tsob ntoo ntawd.
Ces puab nug Anplahaas has tas, “Xalas kws yog koj tug quaspuj nyob qhov twg?” Anplahaas teb has tas, “Xalas nyob huv tsevntaub.”

Puab cov ntawd muaj ib tug has rua Anplahaas has tas, “Cuaj hlis tom ntej nuav  kuv yuav rov qaab tuaj dlua, hab Xalas kws yog koj tug quaspuj yuav yug tau ib tug mivtub.” Xalas sawv saab huv lub qhovrooj tsevntaub kws ncaaj ntawm Anplahaas nrausqaum, noog puab sis thaam.
Anplahaas hab Xalas tub laug heev lawm, hab Xalas tub tseg tsi coj khaub dluag le lawm.

Yog le ntawd, Xalas txhaj luag tuabywv hab xaav has tas, “Nwgnuav kuv laug heev hab tub dlhau noobnyoog muaj mivnyuas lawm, kuv tseem yuav muaj taug kev zoo sab hab los? Kuv tug quasyawg los kuj laug lawm hab.”
Ces tug TSWV nug Anplahaas has tas, “Vim le caag Xalas luag hab has tas, ‘Kuv laug npaum le nuav lawm, kuv tseem yuav muaj taug mivnyuas hab los?’
Tug TSWV yeej ua tau ib puas tsaav yaam huv tuabsi, lawv le kuv tau has lawm, cuaj hlis tom ntej nuav kuv yuav rov tuaj dlua, hab Xalas yeej yuav yug tau ib tug mivtub.”
Xalas ntshai heev, nwg txhaj tsi leeg has tas nwg tau luag, nwg has tas, “Kuv tsi tau luag as.” Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Tseeb tag, koj tub luag tuabywv huv sab lawm.”
Tom qaab ntawd peb tug txivneej txawm sawv kev moog rua ntawm ib qhov chaw kws ntxim puab yuav saib pum lub nroog Xaudoos, Anplahaas txawm xaa puab sawv kev hab nrug puab moog.
Hab tug TSWV xaav has tas, “Kuv yuav tsi zais tej kws kuv taabtom yuav ua ntawd rua Anplahaas.
Nwg cov xeebntxwv yuav tau ua ib tsaav tuabneeg tseemceeb hab muaj fwjchim heev, hab kuv yuav foom koob moov ntawm nwg moog rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg  kws nyob thoob nplajteb.

Kuv tau xaiv nwg kuas nwg yuavtsum qha nwg cov tub hab cov xeebntxwv kuas noog kuv lug, ua zoo hab ua ncaaj ua nceeg. Yog puab ua le ntawd, mas kuv yuav ua txhua yaam rua nwg lawv le kuv tau coglug tseg ca lawm.”
Ces tug TSWV has rua Anplahaas has tas, “Muaj lug tsi zoo tuaj tawmtsaam lub nroog Xaudoos hab lub nroog Kaumaulas, ob lub nroog ntawd tej kev txhum luj kawg le.
Kuv txhaj lug saib, saib puas muaj tseeb lawv le tej lug kws kuv nov ntawd.”
Ces ob tug txivneej txawm sawv kev moog rua huv lub nroog Xaudoos lawm, tabsis tug TSWV tseem nrug Anplahaas nyob.
Anplahaas txaav zog moog ze rua ntawm tug TSWV hab nug has tas, “Koj yuav ua kuas cov tuabneeg tsi muaj txim nrug cov tuabneeg muaj txim raug kev puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi los?

Yog muaj tsib caug leej kws yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg nyob huv lub nroog ntawd, koj puas yuav ua kuas lub nroog ntawd raug kev puamtsuaj? Koj txawm yuav tsi tseg lub nroog ntawd nyob kuas tsib caug leej kws ncaaj nceeg ntawd dlim los?

Tseeb tag, koj yeej tsi muab cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tua nrug cov tuabneeg txhum ib zag le. Yog koj ua le ntawd, cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav raug txim nrug cov tuabneeg txhum ua ke. Koj yeej yuav tsi ua le ntawd. Tug kws txav txim rua tej tuabneeg nplajteb taagnrho yeej yog tug kws txav txim ncaaj nceeg xwb.”

Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Yog kuv pum muaj txug tsib caug leej kws ncaaj nceeg nyob huv lub nroog Xaudoos, kuv yuav tseg tsi tua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog vim tsib caug leej kws ncaaj nceeg ntawd.”

Anplahaas rov has ntxiv tas, “Tug TSWV, thov koj zaam txim rua kuv qhov kws kuv muaj lub sab tawv rov has koj dlua ib zag ntxiv, tug TSWV, kuv yog tuabneeg xwb, tub tsi tsimnyog kuv has ib yaam dlaabtsi rua koj le.

Tabsis yog has tas muaj txug plaub caug tsib leeg kws ncaaj nceeg, yog tsi muaj txug tsib caug leej ne, koj yeej yuav ua kuas lub nroog ntawd puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi, vim tu tsib leeg ntawd xwb los?” Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Yog kuv pum muaj plaub caug tsib leeg kws ncaaj nceeg nyob rua huv, kuv yuav tsi ua kuas lub nroog ntawd puamtsuaj.”

Anplahaas rov has dlua ntxiv has tas, “Yog muaj txug plaub caug leej nyob rua huv xwb ne?” Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Yog kuv pum muaj plaub caug leej nyob rua huv, kuv yuav tsi ua kuas lub nroog ntawd puamtsuaj.”

Anplahaas rov has dlua tas, “Tug TSWV, thov koj tsi xob chim, rua qhov kuv xaav rov has dlua. Yog has tas muaj txug peb caug leej nyob huv xwb ne, koj tsua yuav ua le caag rua?” Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Yog kuv pum muaj peb caug leej nyob rua huv, kuv yuav tsi ua kuas lub nroog puamtsuaj.”

Anplahaas has tas, “Thov koj zaam txim rua kuv, rua qhov kuv muaj lub sab tawv rov thov koj dlua ib zag ntxiv. Yog has tas muaj neeg nkaum leej nyob rua huv xwb ne?” Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Yog kuv pum muaj neeg nkaum leej nyob rua huv, kuv yuav tsi ua kuas lub nroog puamtsuaj.”

Anplahaas has tas, “Tug TSWV, thov koj tsi xob chim lauj, kuv thov has ib zag ntxiv xwb. Yog has tas muaj kaum leej nyob rua huv xwb ne, koj tsua yuav ua le caag rua?” Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Yog kuv pum muaj kaum leej nyob rua huv, kuv yuav tsi ua kuas lub nroog puamtsuaj.”
Tom qaab kws tug TSWV nrug Anplahaas thaam taag lawm, nwg txawm sawv kev moog, hab Anplahaas txawm rov qaab lug tsev lawm.

Thaus ob tug timtswv moog txug rua huv lub nroog Xaudoos tub yuav tsaus ntuj, Lauj tseem taabtom nyob ntawm roojvaag nroog. Thaus nwg pum dlheev obtug, nwg txawm sawv tseeg moog cuag obtug. Nwg moog txhus caug ndlua ntawm obtug xubndlag

hab has tas, “Ob tug tswv, kuv tuaj ntawm nuav yog yuav tu meb. Thov meb moog su huv kuv tsev. Meb lug ntxuav kutaw hab pw ib mos huv kuv tsev. Pigkig kaaj ntug meb maam le sawv ntxuv moog.” Tabsis obtug teb has tas, “Wb tsi moog, mo nuav wb yuav pw ntawm tshaav puam huv lub plawv nroog nuav xwb.”

Vim Lauj muaj sab caw obtug tag, obtug txhaj nrug Lauj moog su huv nwg tsev. Lauj kuas nwg cov tubkhai ci ncuav hab ua zaub ua mov qaab rua ob tug qhua ntawd noj. Thaus ua tau sav lawm obtug txhaj le noj mo.
Thaus ob tug qhua tseem tsi tau nce chaw pw, taagnrho tej txivneej kws nyob huv lub nroog Xaudoos, tsi has laug hab hluas, puavleej dlha nroo ntwg tuaj vij nkaus Lauj lub tsev.
Puab hu Lauj tawm tuaj hab nug has tas, “Ob tug txivneej kws mo nuav tuaj su huv koj tsev nyob qhov twg? Ca le coj obtug tawm tuaj rua peb, peb yuav ntxag obtug.”
Lauj tawm moog rua saab nrau hab muab qhovrooj kaw rua.
Lauj has rua puab tas, “Cov phoojywg, thov mej tsi xob ua phem le nuav lauj!

Mej noog kuv has, kuv muaj ob tug ntxhais tseem yog nkaujxwb tsi tau thaam dlua hluas nraug le. Thov ca kuv coj obtug tuaj rua mej, hab mej xaav ua le caag rua obtug los mej ca le ua lawv le mej sab nyam. Tabsis thov mej tsi xob ua le caag rua ob tug txivneej ntawd, obtug tuaj ua qhua txug huv kuv tsev, kuv yuavtsum tsomkwm obtug.”

Tabsis puab teb Lauj has tas, “Nyuas tuabneeg txawv tebchaws ko, ca le txaav kev rua peb! Koj yog leejtwg, koj muaj cai tuaj cheem peb ua dlaabtsi? Ca le txaav kev. Yog koj tsi txaav kev, peb yuav ua phem rua koj tshaaj peb ua rua obtug hab.” Puab ca le thawb ntag Lauj rov qaab hab naam zog moog tsoo kuas qhovrooj tawg.
Tabsis ob tug txivneej kws nyob huv tsev qheb hlo qhovrooj moog nqug kag Lauj rov qaab lug rua huv tsev hab muab qhovrooj kaw nkaus rua.
Ces taamsim ntawd obtug txawm ua rua cov txivneej kws nyob saab nrau dligmuag taag huv tuabsi, puab txhaj tsi pum kev nrhav lub qhovrooj.
Ob tug txivneej ntawd has rua Lauj has tas, “Yog koj tseem tshuav tej tub, tej ntxhais, tej vauv, lossis kwvtij neejtsaa kws nyob huv lub nroog nuav, kuas puab ca le tawm tsiv taamsim nuav moog,

rua qhov wb taabtom yuav ua kuas lub nroog nuav puamtsuaj moog. Tug TSWV tau nov has tas cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog nuav ua phem ua qas kawg nkaus le, nwg txhaj khaiv wb lug rhuav lub nroog Xaudoos nuav kuas puamtsuaj.”

Ces Lauj txawm moog has rua ob tug tub hluas kws qhab nwg ob tug ntxhais lawm has tas, “Meb ca le tsiv tawm huv lub nroog nuav moog, rua qhov tug TSWV taabtom yuav rhuav lub nroog nuav kuas puamtsuaj.” Tabsis obtug xaav has tas, yog Lauj laam tso dlaag xwb.

Thaus kaaj ntug txoog ob tug timtswv tub lug txhib kuas Lauj maaj nrooj ntaag. Obtug has tas, “Kawgkag maj! Ca le coj koj quaspuj hab koj ob tug ntxhais tawm taamsim nuav, mej txhaj yuav tsi tuag thaus lub nroog nuav raug kev puamtsuaj.”

Lauj tseem pheej ua xyem xyaav. Txawm le ntawd los tug TSWV tseem taabncuab Lauj heev, yog le ntawd, ob tug txivneej txhaj tuav Lauj, Lauj quaspuj hab Lauj ob tug ntxhais teg hab coj puab tawm huv lub nroog moog.
Ces ib tug timtswv txawm has tas, “Tsiv tag kuas dlim! Tsi xob tig saib rov tom qaab hab tsi xob su huv lub haav nuav. Tsiv moog kuas nto plawg sau cov ncov roob mej txhaj yuav tsi tuag.”
Tabsis Lauj teb has tas, “Tug TSWV, thov tsi xob ca peb tsiv moog rua tid.
Koj hlub kuv kawg nkaus hab tub cawm kuv txujsa dlim lug txug txij nua lawm. Tabsis cov ncov roob ntawd nyob dleb heev, ntshai tsaam kev tuag caum cuag kuv, hab kuv tuag ua ntej kuv moog txug tid.
Koj puas pum lub nyuas nroog tid? Lub nroog ntawd txhaj nyob ze dlua xwb. Thov ca kuv moog lawm tid, koj yeej pum has tas yog lub nroog miv, hab yuav cawm tau kuv txujsa.”
Nwg teb has tas, “Tau los mas, kuv pum zoo ntaag. Kuv yuav tsi ua kuas lub nroog tid puamtsuaj.
Kawgkag! Ca le moog! Kuv tog tsi ua ib yaam dlaabtsi moog txug thaus kws koj tsiv moog txug tid tsaiv.” Rua qhov Lauj hu lub nroog tid ua lub nroog miv, txhaj muab lub nroog ntawd hu ua Xau-as.
Thaus Lauj tsiv moog txug ndlua tim lub nroog Xau-as taabtom nub tawm plawg tim npoo ntuj.
Taamsim ntawd tug TSWV tso suavtawg leejfaaj poob sau ntuj lug kub lub nroog Xaudoos hab lub nroog Kaumaulas,
txhaj ua rua ob lub nroog ntawd hab taagnrho lub taj nraag, nrug tej tuabneeg kws nyob rua huv hab txhua yaam nroj tsuag qoobloo kws tuaj huv thaaj tsaam ntawd raug puamtsuaj taag.
Tabsis Lauj tug quaspuj tig saib tom qaab, nwg txawm ca le khov kag ua ib tug ncej ntsev.
Nub tom qaab, thaus sawv ntxuv Anplahaas maaj ceev nrooj moog rua tom qhov chaw kws nwg sawv tim ntsej tim muag ntawm tug TSWV.
Nwg tsaa qhovmuag saib lub nroog Xaudoos hab lub nroog Kaumaulas taagnrho rua lub taj nraag ntawd, nwg pum paa tawg nchu auv nab huv thaaj tsaam ntawd tuaj, cuag nkaus le hlawv ib dlaim teb.
Txawm yog Vaajtswv rhuav ob lub nroog huv lub taj nraag kws Lauj nyob ntawd puamtsuaj taag lawm los nwg tseem ncu ntsoov Anplahaas rua nruab sab hab tso kev rua Lauj tsiv kuas dlim txujkev puamtsuaj.
Vim qhov kws Lauj ntshai nyob huv lub nroog Xau-as, nwg hab nwg ob tug ntxhais txhaj tsiv moog nyob huv lub qhov tsua peg cov ncov roob.
Tug ntxhais hlub has rua nwg tug nam hluas tas, “Wb txiv tub laug heev lawm, hab nyob thoob plawg huv nplajteb  nuav tsi muaj txivneej tuaj yuav wb kuas wb muaj mivnyuas le lawm.
Ca le lug, wb muab cawv txiv maab rua txiv haus kuas qaug, ces wb moog nrug txiv pw kuas wb muaj mivnyuas.”
Mo ntawd obtug txawm muab cawv txiv maab rua leej txiv haus, ces tug ntxhais hlub txhaj moog nrug nwg txiv pw. Leej txiv qaug cawv heev nwg txhaj tsi paub has tas nwg tug ntxhais lug nrug nwg pw.

Nub tom qaab tug ntxhais hlub has rua nwg tug nam hluas tas, “Naag mo kuv tub moog nrug txiv pw lawm, ib chim tsaus ntuj wb rov muab cawv rua txiv haus dlua, ces koj tsua moog nrug nwg pw. Ua le ntawd wb nyag txhaj muaj nyag mivnyuas lug ntawm wb txiv.”

Yog le ntawd, obtug rov muab cawv txiv maab rua leej txiv haus dlua, ces tug ntxhais yau txhaj moog nrug leej txiv pw. Leej txiv kuj rov qaug cawv heev nwg txhaj tsi paub has tas nwg tug ntxhais lug nrug nwg pw.
Yog le ntawd, Lauj ob tug ntxhais txhaj xeeb tub lug ntawm obtug txiv.
Lauj tug ntxhais hlub txawm yug tau ib tug tub, nwg muab tis npe hu ua Mau-am.  Mau-am yog yawmkoob rua tsaav tuabneeg Mau-am lug txug naj nub nua.
Lauj tug ntxhais yau los yug tau ib tug tub hab, nwg muab tis npe hu ua Npeenamis.  Nwg txhaj yog tsaav tuabneeg Amoos tug yawmkoob lug txug naj nub nua.

Anplahaas tsiv tawm ntawm thaaj chaw Maales moog rua nraag yaav qaabteb Kana-aas hab moog nyob rua ntawm ntu nruab nraab lub nroog Kades hab Sus lawm. Thaus ntawd nwg lug nyob rua huv lub nroog Nkelas tau ib ntus,
hab nwg has tas, Xalas kws yog nwg tug quaspuj yog nwg tug muam xwb. Yog le ntawd, Vaajntxwv Anpimelej kws kaav lub nroog Nkelas txawm has kuas coj Xalas moog rua nwg.
Muaj ib mos Vaajtswv tau lug tshwm rua Vaajntxwv Anpimelej pum huv nruab npau suav hab has tas, “Koj yuav raug tua tuag, rua qhov koj tau coj tug quaspuj nuav lug, nwg tub muaj quasyawg lawm.”
Tabsis Anpimelej yeej tsi tau txaav moog ti Xalas le, nwg txhaj has tas, “Tug TSWV, kuv tub tsi tau ua txhum! Koj txawm yuav tua kuv hab kuv cov pejxeem povtseg ntaag los?
Anplahaas los yeej has tas Xalas yog nwg tug muam, hab Xalas los yeej has ib yaam nkaus le ntawd. Kuv tau ua tej nuav vim kuv tsi paub, hab kuv yeej tsi tau ua txhum le.”

Vaajtswv teb has tas, “Yog tag, kuv yeej paub koj ua tej nuav vim qhov kws koj tsi paub hab koj tsi tau ua txhum dlaabtsi, yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj tsi pub koj moog kov Xalas hab ua txhum tawmtsaam kuv.

Ca le xaa tug quaspuj ko rov qaab moog rua nwg tug quasyawg taamsim nuav. Nwg yog ib tug cevlug, nwg yuav thov Vaajtswv rua koj, koj txhaj yuav tsi tuag. Tabsis yog koj tsi xaa nwg rov qaab, kuv qha tseeb rua koj has tas, koj yeej yuav tuag moog, koj hab koj tsoom pejxeem yuav tuag taag huv tuabsi.”
Taagkig sawv ntxuv Anpimelej hu taagnrho nwg cov numtswv tuaj hab nwg qha tej kws tau tshwmsim ntawd rua puab noog, mas ua rua puab ntshai kawg le.

Ces Anpimelej txhaj hu Anplahaas tuaj hab nug has tas, “Vim le caag koj ua tej nuav rua peb? Kuv tau ua txhum dlaabtsi rua koj, koj txhaj coj tej kev puamtsuaj nuav lug rua kuv hab kuv lub tebchaws? Tej kws koj ua rua kuv nuav yeej tsi tsimnyog ua kag le.
Vim le caag koj txhaj ua le nuav?”
Anplahaas teb has tas, “Kuv xaav has tas tsi muaj ib tug tuabneeg kws fwm Vaajtswv nyob huv lub nroog nuav, nyob tsaam puab yuav tua kuv povtseg hab yuav kuv tug quaspuj.
Nwg yeej yog kuv tug muam tag le. Nwg hab kuv yeej koom ib leeg txiv, tabsis wb nyag muaj nyag nam, hab kuv yuav nwg ua kuv tug quaspuj.

Yog le ntawd, thaus Vaajtswv has kuas kuv tso kuv txiv tej vaaj tse tseg tawm moog nyob rua lwm lub tebchaws, kuv txhaj has rua nwg tas, ‘Koj yuavtsum ua ncaaj nceeg rua kuv hab qha txhua leej txhua tug paub has tas kuv yeej yog koj tug nug.’ ”
Ces Anpimelej txhaj tso Xalas rov qaab lug rua Anplahaas, hab nwg tseem muab yaaj, muab tshis, muab nyuj, muab tubqhe hab ntxhais qhev pub rua Anplahaas.
Anpimelej has rua Anplahaas has tas, “Taagnrho tej cheebtsaam aav nuav puavleej yog kuv le, koj yuav nyob qhov twg los tau taag lawv le koj sab nyam.”

Nwg tsua has rua Xalas has tas, “Kuv muab ib txheeb dlaim nyaj rua koj tug nug, ua povthawj rua txhua tug kws nrug koj nyob ua ke pum has tas, koj tsi tau ua txhum. Kuas txhua tug paub has tas koj yeej tsi tau ua txhum tag.”

Vim tej nuav tau tshwmsim lug rua Xalas kws yog Anplahaas tug quaspuj, tug TSWV txhaj ua rua txhua tug quaspuj kws nyob huv Anpimelej lub loog xeeb tsi taug tub le. Yog le ntawd, Anplahaas txhaj thov Vaajtswv rua Anpimelej, Vaajtswv paab khu Anpimelej zoo hab tseem khu Anpimelej tug quaspuj hab nwg tej ntxhais qhev zoo huv tuabsi, puab txhaj rov muaj taug mivnyuas.
Tug TSWV foom koob moov rua Xalas lawv le tej lug kws nwg tau cog tseg lawm,
Xalas txhaj xeeb tub hab yug tau ib tug tub rua Anplahaas thaus kws Anplahaas laug heev lawm. Tug tub nuav yug lawv le lub caij kws Vaajtswv teem tseg ca lawm.
Anplahaas txhaj tis tug tub ntawd lub npe hu ua Ixaj,
ces thaus Ixaj noobnyoog muaj yim nub, Anplahaas txhaj muab nwg ua kevcai txav tawv, lawv le Vaajtswv tau saamfwm tseg lawm.
Anplahaas noobnyoog muaj ib puas xyoo rua thaus yug Ixaj.
Xalas txhaj has tas, “Vaajtswv tau muab txujkev zoo sab hab lub ntsejmuag luag  ntxhi rua kuv. Txhua tug kws nov zaaj nuav puab puavleej zoo sab nrug kuv luag.”

Xalas has ntxiv tas, “Leejtwg tseem yuav has tau rua Anplahaas tas, Xalas tseem tu taug mivnyuas hab los? Txawm le ntawd los kuv tub yug tau ib tug tub rua Anplahaas thaus nwg noobnyoog laug heev lawm.”
Tug tub ntawd luj hlub zoo, hab nub kws nwg tseg tau mig lawm, Anplahaas txhaj ua ib rooj noj haus luj heev.
Muaj ib nub Hankas kws yog tuabneeg Iziv tug tub Yisamayees kws nwg yug rua Anplahaas, taabtom ua si nrug  Xalas tug tub Ixaj.

Xalas pum le ntawd, nwg txhaj moog has rua Anplahaas has tas, “Ca le ntab tug ntxhais qhev nuav hab nwg tug tub tsiv moog. Tsi tsimnyog ca tug quaspuj nuav tug tub tau koj tej qubtxeeg qubteg ib yaam le, tsuas yog kuv tug tub Ixaj xwb txhaj tsimnyog tau.”
Zaaj nuav ua rua Anplahaas ntxhuv sab kawg le, rua qhov Yisamayees los yog nwg tug tub ib yaam nkaus hab.

Tabsis Vaajtswv has rua Anplahaas has tas, “Koj tsi xob ntxhuv sab txug tug tub hab tug ntxhais qhev Hankas nuav hlo le. Ca le ua lawv nraim le Xalas has rua koj, rua qhov koj yuav muaj xeebntxwv coob lug ntawm Ixaj lawv le kuv tau coglug tseg rua koj lawm.
Kuv tseem yuav pub rua tug ntxhais qhev ntawd tug tub kuas muaj tub coob heev hab puab yuav ua tau ib tsaav tuabneeg. Nwg los yeej yog koj tug tub ib yaam nkaus.”

Nub tom qaab thaus sawv ntxuv Anplahaas ntim zaub mov hab ib naab tawv dlej muab rua Hankas kwv sau xubpwg. Anplahaas tsaws hlo tug tub rua Hankas ris rua nrau nrausqaum hab ntab obtug tsiv tawm moog. Hankas txhaj ua ib sab moog hab ncig moog ncig lug tom taj suabpuam Npesenpas.
Thaus dlej taag lawm, nwg txhaj muab tug mivnyuas tso pw rua huv ib koog ntoo,
hab nwg moog nyob nrug dleb kwvyees le ib ncua neev. Nwg txawm xaav has tas, “Kuv tsi xaav saib kuv tug tub tu sav le.” Thaus nwg moog nyob ntawd, nwg txawm tsaa suab hlo quaj.

Vaajtswv nov tug mivnyuas ntawd lub suab quaj, hab Vaajtswv tug timtswv txhaj has sau ntuj tuaj rua Hankas has tas, “Hankas, koj ntxhuv sab ua dlaabtsi? Tsi xob ntshai. Vaajtswv tub nov koj tug tub lub suab quaj lawm.
Ca le sawv tseeg moog, hab tsaws hlo nwg puag ua tuab zoo ntxag nwg. Kuv yuav pub kuas nwg muaj xeebntxwv fuamvaam coob moog ua tau ib tsaav tuabneeg.”
