Ces tug TSWV txhaj qheb Hankas lub qhovmuag, hab nwg pum ib lub qhov tshij. Nwg txhaj moog cug dlej ntim puv nkaus rua huv lub naab tawv hab muab mivntsiv rua tug tub haus.
Vaajtswv yeej nrug nraim tug tub ntawm moog txug thaus nwg luj hlub lawm, nwg nyob huv lub taj suabpuam Palaas, hab nwg yog ib tug kws txawj tua nqaj heev.
Nwg nam moog yuav tau cov tuabneeg Iziv ib tug ntxhais lug rua nwg ua quaspuj.
Thaus lub sijhawm ntawd Vaajntxwv Anpimelej nrug Fikaules, tug thawj kws saib nwg cov tubrog tuaj, hab has rua Anplahaas tas, “Vaajtswv yeej nrug nraim koj nyob hab paab koj ua txhua yaam huv tuabsi.

Yog le ntawd, kuv thov coglug tseg taabmeeg Vaajtswv has tas, koj yuav tsi dlaag kuv, kuv tej mivnyuas, lossis kuv tej xeebntxwv hlo le. Kuv tub yeej ua zoo rua koj lawm, yog le ntawd, koj yuavtsum tau coglug ua zoo rua kuv hab lub tebchaws kws koj nyob nuav.”
Anplahaas teb has tas, “Kuv txaus sab coglug le ntawd ntaag.”
Anplahaas ywg rua Anpimelej txug lub qhov tshij kws Anpimelej cov tubkhai tuaj txeeb tau lawm.
Anpimelej teb has tas, “Kuv tsi paub has tas yog leejtwg txeeb. Koj yeej tsi tau qha zaaj nuav rua kuv le, yog thawj zag kws kuv tau nov koj pav txug zaaj nuav xwb.”
Ces Anplahaas muab tug puav yaaj hab nyuj pub rua Anpimelej, ces obtug txhaj sis coglug.
Anplahaas muab xyaa tug mivnyuas yaaj cais tawm huv nwg paab tsaj,
hab Anpimelej nug has tas, “Vim le caag koj ua le ntawd?”
Anplahaas teb has tas, “Ca le txais yuav xyaa tug mivnyuas yaaj nuav moog. Qhov kws kuv ua le nuav, yog ua kuas koj nrug leeg paub has tas, kuv yog tug khawb lub qhov tshij nuav ntaag.”
Yog le ntawd, txhaj hu qhov chaw ntawd ua Npesenpas,  rua qhov obtug tau sis coglug rua ntawm thaaj chaw ntawd.
Tom qaab kws obtug coglug nyob ntawm Npesenpas taag lawm, Anpimelej hab Fikules txhaj rov qaab moog rua tebchaws Filitees lawm.
Ces Anplahaas txawm cog ib tsob ntoo tamalis rua ntawm thaaj chaw Npesenpas ntawd hab pehawm tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv tug muaj sa nyob moog ibtxhis.
Anplahaas nyob huv tebchaws Filitees tau ntev heev.
Tau ib ntus tom qaab nuav Vaajtswv txawm sim Anplahaas sab. Vaajtswv hu Anplahaas has tas, “Anplahaas!” Anplahaas teb has tas, “Kuv nyob ntawm nuav.”
Vaajtswv has tas, “Koj ca le coj koj tuab leeg tub Ixaj kws koj hlub tshaaj plawg, moog rua peg tebchaws Mauliyas. Koj ca le muab nwg tua hlawv fij pub rua kuv sau lub roob kws kuv yuav qha rua koj.”

Nub tom qaab thaus sawv ntxuv Anplahaas sawv lug txav tawg npaaj coj moog hlawv khoom fij, muab tawg nog rua nwg tug neeg luav thauj, coj Ixaj hab coj nwg ob tug tubkhai nrug nwg moog. Puab txawm sawv kev moog rua peg qhov chaw kws Vaajtswv tau qha rua Anplahaas lawm.
Thaus puab moog tau peb nub ke lawm, Anplahaas tsaa qhovmuag saib pum thaaj chaw kws Vaajtswv qha rua nwg tseem nyob dleb.
Ces nwg txawm has rua ob tug tubkhai has tas, “Meb nrug tug neeg luav nyob ntawm nuav. Kuv tug tub hab kuv yuav moog pehawm Vaajtswv nyob rua peg, thaus wb pehawm taag, wb maam rov qaab lug.”
Anplahaas muab cov tawg kws yuav hlawv khoom fij rua Ixaj kwv, Anplahaas nqaa rag hab suavtawg, ces obtug txawm moog rua peg roob lawm,

Ixaj has tas, “Txiv!” Anplahaas teb has tas, “Tub, koj has dlaabtsi?” Ixaj nug has tas, “Txiv, kuv pum koj muaj suavtawg hab muaj tawg, tabsis tug mivnyuas yaaj kws yuav coj moog tua hlawv fij nyob qhov twg?”
Anplahaas teb has tas, “Vaajtswv yuav muab ib tug mivnyuas yaaj rua wb.” Ces obtug ob txiv tub txawm ua ke taug kev moog lawm.

Thaus obtug moog txug ntawm qhov chaw kws Vaajtswv qha rua Anplahaas lawm, Anplahaas txhaj teeb tau ib lub thaaj hab muab tawg tso rua sau lub thaaj ntawd. Nwg txhaj muab nwg tug tub paav hab coj moog tso rua sau cov tawg, sau lub thaaj.
Ces Anplahaas txawm khaws nkaus rag lug yuav nkaug Ixaj.
Taamsim ntawd tug TSWV tug timtswv hu tawg ntho sau ntuj tuaj rua Anplahaas has tas, “Anplahaas, Anplahaas!” Anplahaas teb has tas, “Kuv nyob ntawm nuav.”

Tug timtswv has tas, “Tsi xob tua tug mivtub ko hab tsi xob ua le caag rua nwg hlo le, nwgnuav kuv paub has tas koj yeej noog lug hab fwm Vaajtswv heev, rua qhov koj tsi khauvxwm koj tuab leeg tub, koj zoo sab hlo coj tuaj pub rua kuv.”
Anplahaas tig hlo saib puagncig, nwg pum ib tug laug yaaj kub dlaig ntawm ib xyov maab. Anplahaas txhaj moog muab lug tua hlawv fij rua Vaajtswv hloov nwg tug tub chaw.
Anplahaas txhaj tis npe rua qhov chaw ntawm hu ua, “Tug TSWV npaaj tseg.”  Hab txawm yog naj nub nwgnuav los tuabneeg tseem pheej hu has tas, “Sau tug TSWV lub roob kws nwg npaaj tseg.”
Tug TSWV tug timtswv rov hu sau ntuj tuaj rua Anplahaas dlua zag ob has tas,

“Kuv coglug lug ntawm kuv lub npe, kuv yuav foom koob moov nplua mag rua koj, tug TSWV yog tug has le nuav. Rua qhov koj tau ua lawv le kuv has hab koj tsi khauvxwm koj tuab leeg tub kws koj muab fij rua kuv.

Kuv txhaj coglug tseg rua koj has tas, kuv yuav pub koj muaj xeebntxwv coob npaum le tej nubqub sau nruab ntug, lossis npaum le tej xuabzeb nraag ntug havtxwv. Koj cov xeebntxwv yuav ntaus yeej puab cov yeebncuab.
Hab kuv yuav foom koob moov ntawm koj cov xeebntxwv moog rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv qaab ntuj nuav, vim koj noog kuv lug.”
Anplahaas txhaj rov qaab lug rua nraag nwg ob tug tubkhai, hab puab rov lug rua nraag Npesenpas kws yog Anplahaas qhov chaw nyob lawm.
Tau tsi ntev lug tom qaab nuav muaj tuabneeg moog qha rua Anplahaas has tas, “Milekas yug tau yim leej mivnyuas rua koj tug kwv Nahaus.”
Uxes yog tug tub hlub, Npuxes yog tug kwv, Kemuyees kws yog Alaas txiv,
Khexes, Haxaus, Filedas, Yilafes, hab Npethu-ees.
Npethu-ees yog Lenpekas txiv. Milekas yug tau yim leej tub nuav rua Nahaus kws yog Anplahaas tug kwv.
Nahaus tug nam yau Lehumas, yug tau Tenpas, Nkahas, Tahases hab Ma-akas.
Xalas ua neej nyob tau ib puas neeg nkaum xyaa xyoo.
Nwg tuag rua ntawm Kiliyas Anpas (lossis yog Henploos), kws nyob huv tebchaws Kana-aas, Anplahaas quaj ntsuag vim Xalas tuag lawm.
Anplahaas tso Xalas lub cev rua ntawm qhov chaw kws nwg tuag ntawd. Anplahaas txhaj moog cuag cov tuabneeg Hitis hab has rua puab tas,
“Kuv yog tuabneeg txawv tebchaws lug nrug mej nyob huv nuav xwb, thov mej muag ib thaaj aav rua kuv log kuv tug quaspuj.”
Puab teb has tas,

“Koj noog peb has tsaiv. Koj yog ib tug thawjcoj kws muaj koob meej nyob nto moo lug rua huv peb nuav, ca le coj koj tug quaspuj moog log rua huv lub qhov tsua zoo tshaaj plawg kws peb muaj. Peb txhua tug puavleej txaus sab muab ib lub qhov tsua rua koj, koj txhaj tau chaw log koj tug quaspuj.”
Ces Anplahaas txawm txhus caug ndlua ntawm puab xubndlag
hab has tas, “Yog mej txaus sab yuav ca kuv log kuv tug quaspuj rua ntawm nuav, thov mej paab has Xauhas tug tub Efaloos,

kuas nwg muag lub Qhov Tsua Makepelas kws nyob ze rua ntawm nwg thaaj teb rua kuv. Thov kuas nwg ca le muab muag tug nqe puv ntoob rua kuv taabmeeg rua mej suavdlawg ntawm nuav, kuv txhaj tau qhov chaw log tuag ntawd lug ua kuv tug.”
Efaloos kuj nrug cov Hitis nyob ua ke ntawm qhov chaw saablaaj kws nyob ntawm roojvaag nroog hab, nwg txhaj teb taabmeeg rua cov tuabneeg kws tuaj nyob ntawd nrug nov has tas,

“Koj noog kuv has, kuv yuav muab taagnrho kuv thaaj teb hab lub qhov tsua kws nyob rua huv pub huv tuabsi rua koj. Tim ntsej tim muag ntawm kuv tsaav tuabneeg, kuv yuav muab pub rua koj, koj txhaj tau chaw log koj tug quaspuj.”
Anplahaas txawm nyo hau ntshis hawm cov Hitis

hab has rua Efaloos tas, “Thov koj noog kuv has hab kuas txhua tug nrug nov, kuv yuav taagnrho koj thaaj teb. Thov koj txais cov nyaj kws kuv them nuav moog, hab kuv yuav coj kuv tug quaspuj tuaj log rua huv.”
Efaloos teb has tas,
“Thaaj aav nuav, tug nqe yog plaub puas dlaim nyaj, ntawm koj hab kuv tsi muaj dlaabtsi lawm. Ca le coj koj tug quaspuj moog log rua huv.”

Anplahaas zoo sab hlo hab muab nyaj lug luj kuas txwm lawv le Efaloos tau has rua suavdlawg nrug nov lawm, yog plaub puas dlaim nyaj kws ntaus nqe ib yaam le tug nqe kws tej tub laag tub luam siv tom tej kab ntaag.

Tub yog vim le ntawd, Efaloos thaaj teb huv Makepelas kws nyob rua ntawm Maales saab nubtuaj kws yog xaam taagnrho thaaj teb, lub qhov tsua hab taagnrho tej ntoo kws nyob rua huv thaaj teb thoob plawg rua tej kws nyob lawv ntug teb, txhaj yog Anplahaas tug lawm.
Yog le ntawd, txhaj muab thaaj aav ntawd ua Anplahaas tug tim ntsej tim muag cov tuabneeg Hitis kws tuaj koom saablaaj ntawd.
Ces Anplahaas txhaj coj Xalas kws yog nwg tug quaspuj moog log rua huv lub qhov tsua ntawd, lub qhov tsua ntawd nyob huv tebchaws Kana-aas.
Yog le ntawd, cov tuabneeg Hitis txhaj muab thaaj teb hab lub qhov tsua kws nyob rua huv muag rua Anplahaas ua chaw log tuag.
Nwgnuav Anplahaas laug heev lawm, hab tug TSWV tau foom koob moov rua txhua yaam kws Anplahaas ua taag lug lawm.
Anplahaas has rua nwg tug tubkhai kws laug dlua lwm tug, nwg yog tug saib taagnrho Anplahaas lub cuabtaam has tas, “Koj ca le muab koj txhais teg tso rua huv kuv ceg puabtais  hab coglug rua kuv.

Kuv xaav kuas koj coglug rua kuv ntawm tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv tug kaav lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb has tas, koj yuav tsi xaiv cov tuabneeg huv tebchaws Kana-aas nuav tej ntxhais lug rua kuv tug tub yuav ua quaspuj.
Koj yuavtsum moog rua tim kuv lub qub teb qub chaw hab yuav kuv cov kwvtij ib tug ntxhais lug rua kuv tug tub Ixaj ua quaspuj.”
Tabsis tug tubkhai nug has tas, “Yog has tas tug ntxhais tsi kaam nrug kuv lug rua tebchaws nuav, kuv yuav ua le caag? Yuav ca kuv coj koj tug tub moog nyob rua tim koj lub qub teb qub chaw los?”
Anplahaas teb has tas, “Koj ncu ntsoov tsi xob coj kuv tug tub moog nyob rua tid le.

Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv tug kws nyob sau ntuj, tub coj kuv tawm huv kuv txiv lub tsev hab huv kuv cov kwvtij lub tebchaws lug, hab nwg yuav muab lub tebchaws nuav pub rua kuv cov xeebntxwv lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg rua kuv lawm. Nwg yuav tso nwg tug timtswv ua koj ntej moog, kuas koj moog nrhav tau quaspuj rua kuv tug tub.
Yog tug ntxhais ntawd tsi kaam nrug koj lug, koj txhaj dlim ntawm kuv tej lug cog tseg nuav. Tabsis txwv tu nrho tsi pub koj coj kuv tug tub moog tid le.”
Yog le ntawd, tug tubkhai txhaj muab nwg txhais teg tso rua huv Anplahaas kws yog nwg tug tswv ceg puabtais, hab coglug ua lawv le Anplahaas tau has rua nwg lawm.

Tug tubkhai kws yog tug saib taagnrho Anplahaas lub cuabtaam, txhaj caab nwg tug tswv kaum tug ntxhuav thauj tej khoom muaj nqes, hab moog rua huv lub nroog kws Nahaus nyob peg tebchaws Mexuputamias saab qaumteb.

Thaus nwg moog txug peg lawm, nwg kuas cov ntxhuav txhus caug rua ntawm lub qhov tshij kws nyob rua ntawm saab ntug nroog. Thaus ntawd taabtom yuav tsaus ntuj, yog lub caij kws cov quaspuj tawm tuaj nqaa dlej.
Nwg thov Vaajtswv has tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug tswv Anplahaas tug Vaajtswv, thov koj paab kuv kuas kuv teg num tav nub nua, hab ua lawv le tej lug kws koj tau cog tseg rua kuv tug tswv lawm.
Kuv taabtom nyob ntawm lub qhov tshij kws yog qhov chaw cov hluas nkauj huv lub nroog nuav tuaj nqaa dlej.

Thaus kuv has rua cov hluas nkauj ntawd ib tug tas, ‘Thov txu koj lub hub dlej hab pub mivntsiv dlej rua kuv haus.’ Yog nwg teb has tas, ‘Haus mas, kuv tseem yuav ntaus dlej rua koj cov ntxhuav txhua tug haus hab,’ ces thov kuas tug ntawd yog tug kws koj xaiv rua koj tug tubkhai Ixaj ntaag. Yog qhov nuav tshwmsim, kuv txhaj yuav paub has tas, koj ua lawv le koj tau coglug tseg rua kuv tug tswv lawm tag.”

Thaus kws tug tubkhai thov Vaajtswv tsi tau xaus, Lenpekas txawm kwv ib lub hub dlej sau xubpwg tuaj txug ndlua ntawd. Lenpekas yog Npethu-ees tug ntxhais, Npethu-ees yog Anplahaas tug kwv Nahaus hab Melikas obtug tug tub.
Lenpekas yog ib tug ntxhais kws zoo nkauj heev, hab nwg tseem yog nkaujxwb. Lenpekas txhaj nqeg moog rua nraag lub qhov tshij, ntaus dlej puv nkaus rua huv nwg lub hub, hab rov qaab lug.
Tug tubkhai txhaj dlha loo moog cuag Lenpekas hab has tas, “Kuv thov haus koj cov dlej mivntsiv.”
Lenpekas teb has tas, “Kuv tug tswv, koj ca le haus,” Lenpekas txhaj txu plhuav lub hub sau nwg xubpwg lug tuav rua tug tubkhai ntawd haus.
Thaus nwg haus taag lawm, Lenpekas has tas, “Kuv yuav ntaus dlej lug rua koj cov ntxhuav haus kuas txaus.”
Nwg muab lub hub laub kag rua huv dlaab dlej rua cov tsaj ntawd haus taagnrho hab rov loo moog ntaus dlej lug ntxiv rua, nwg ua le ntawd rua tug tubkhai cov ntxhuav tau dlej haus txhua tug le.
Anplahaas tug tubkhai sawv ib caag saib, saib puas yog tug TSWV pub kuas nwg teg num tav los tsi yog.

Thaus kws Lenpekas ntaus dlej rua cov ntxhuav haus txaus lawm, tug tubkhai ntawd txhaj muab tau ib lub kauj ntswg kub nyaav ob txag hab ntaus nqe ntau heev, lug khawm rua Lenpekas qhovntswg hab muab ob lub paugteg kub nyaav kaum txaj rua Lenpekas coj ntawm ncej npaab.
Tug tubkhai txawm nug has tas, “Thov qha rua kuv saib koj txiv yog leejtwg. Huv nwg lub tsev puas muaj chaw txaus rua kuv cov tuabneeg hab kuv moog su mo nuav?”
Lenpekas teb has tas, “Kuv txiv yog Npethuyees kws yog Nahaus hab Milekas obtug tug tub ntaag.
Tom peb tsev muaj quavnyaab hab nyom qhuav ntau, hab nyob tod muaj chaw rua koj su huv tuabsi.”
Ces tug tubkhai ntawd txawm txhus caug ndlua hab pehawm tug TSWV.

Nwg has tas, “Ua tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug tswv Anplahaas tug Vaajtswv tsaug, Vaajtswv yog tug ncaaj nceeg hab ua lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg rua kuv tug tswv lawm tag. Tug TSWV yeej coj kuv kev ncaaj nraim tuaj rua ntawm kuv tug tswv cov kwvtij.”
Tug ntxhais ntawd txhaj rov qaab moog tsev hab pav zaaj nuav qha rua nwg nam hab nwg tsev tuabneeg noog.
Lenpekas muaj ib tug nug hu ua Lanpaas. Ces Lanpaas txawm tawm plawg rua nrau zoov hab dlha ncaaj nraim moog rua tom lub qhov tshij kws Anplahaas tug tubkhai nyob.

Thaus Lanpaas pum lub kauj ntswg hab ob lub paugteg kws nwg tug muam coj hab nov tej lug kws Lenpekas pav qha rua leej nam has tas, yog tug txivneej ntawd has rua nwg, Lanpaas txhaj le moog cuag Anplahaas tug tubkhai kws sawv nrug nwg cov ntxhuav nyob ze ntawm lub qhov tshij,

hab has tas, “Koj ca le nrug kuv moog tom tsev. Koj yog tug kws tau txais tug TSWV txuj koob moov lawm. Vim le caag koj tseem yuav sawv ntawm nuav ua dlaabtsi? Kuv tub tu tau txaaj chaw rua koj su tom kuv tsev, hab nyob tod yeej muaj chaw rua koj cov ntxhuav huv tuabsi.”

Yog le ntawd, tug tubkhai ntawd txhaj moog rua tom Lanpaas tsev, hab Lanpaas txhaj tsaws tej nraa ntxhuav ca, muab quavnyaab hab nyom qhuav rua cov ntxhuav noj. Ces nwg nqaa dlej lug rua Anplahaas tug tubkhai hab nwg cov tuabneeg ntxuav kutaw.

Thaus rau tau mo lawm, tug tubkhai ntawd has tas, “Kuv yuav tsi noj pluag mo nuav moog txug thaus kuv has taag tej lug kws kuv yuav has rua koj tsaiv.” Lanpaas teb has tas, “Koj muaj lug dlaabtsi los ca le has.”
Nwg teb has tas, “Kuv yog Anplahaas tug tubkhai.

Tug TSWV foom koob moov ntau kawg nkaus rua kuv tug tswv hab nwg yog ib tug tuabneeg npluanuj heev. Tug TSWV pub rua kuv tug tswv muaj yaaj, muaj tshis, muaj nyuj, muaj nyaj, muaj kub, muaj tubqhe hab ntxhais qhev, muaj ntxhuav hab muaj neeg luav coob kawg le.
Xalas kws yog kuv tug tswv tug quaspuj tub laug heev lawm los nwg tseem yug tau ib tug tub rua kuv tug tswv hab, mas kuv tug tswv muab taagnrho nwg lub cuabtaam rua tug tub ntawd.

Kuv tug tswv kuas kuv coglug has tas kuv yuavtsum noog nwg tej lug saamfwm. Nwg has tas, ‘Tsi xob moog yuav cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tebchaws Kana-aas nuav tej ntxhais lug rua kuv tug tub ua quaspuj hlo le.
Koj ca le moog lawm tim kuv txiv tsev tuabneeg, moog cuag kuv cov kwvtij, hab xaiv ib tug quaspuj lug rua kuv tug tub Ixaj yuav.’
Hab kuv nug kuv tug tswv has tas, ‘Yog tug ntxhais tsi kaam nrug kuv lug nua, kuv yuav ua le caag?’

Nwg teb has tas, ‘Tug TSWV kws kuv yeej ibtxwm noog nwg lug, yuav tso ib tug timtswv nrug koj moog hab yuav ua kuas koj teg num tav. Koj yuav moog yuav tau kuv txiv tsev tuabneeg ib tug ntxhais lug rua kuv tug tub ua quaspuj.
Tsuas yog muaj tuab qho ua rua koj dlim ntawm kuv lu lug cog tseg xwb, yog koj moog has kuv cov kwvtij tsi kaam, ces koj txhaj yuav dlim ntawm kuv cov lug cog tseg nuav.’
“Nub nua thaus kuv tuaj txug rua ntawm lub qhov tshij, kuv thov Vaajtswv has tas, ‘Tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug tswv Anplahaas tug Vaajtswv, thov koj paab kuas teg num kws kuv tuaj ua nuav tav.
Kuv nyob ntawm lub qhov tshij nuav. Thaus ib tug hluas nkauj tawm tuaj kwv dlej, kuv yuav thov kuas nwg muab dlej huv nwg lub hub pub rua kuv haus.
Yog nwg txaus sab muab rua kuv haus hab nwg tseem moog ntaus dlej lug pub rua kuv cov ntxhuav haus huv tuabsi, ces thov kuas nwg yog tug kws koj xaiv rua kuv tug tswv tug tub yuav ua quaspuj ntaag.’

Thaus kuv tseem thov Vaajtswv tuabywv huv kuv lub sab tsi tau taag, kuv txawm pum Lenpekas kwv ib lub hub sau nwg xubpwg hab nqeg moog ntaus dlej huv lub qhov tshij. Kuv txhaj has rua nwg has tas, ‘Thov pub mivntsiv dlej rua kuv haus.’

Nwg txhaj txu kag nwg hub dlej sau xubpwg lug hab has tas, ‘Haus mas, kuv tseem yuav ntaus dlej rua koj cov ntxhuav haus huv tuabsi hab.’ Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj tau haus, hab nwg ntaus dlej pub rua kuv cov ntxhuav haus huv tuabsi.

Kuv nug nwg has tas, ‘Koj txiv yog leejtwg?’ Hab nwg teb has tas, ‘Kuv txiv yog Npethuyees kws yog Nahaus hab Milekas obtug tug tub.’ Kuv txhaj muab lub kauj ntswg kub khawm nwg qhovntswg hab muab ob lub paugteg rua nwg coj ntawm nwg ncej npaab.

Kuv txhaj txhus caug ndlua pehawm hab ua tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug tswv Anplahaas tug Vaajtswv tsaug, nwg yog tug kws coj kuv kev ncaaj nraim tuaj rua ntawm kuv tug tswv cov kwvtij, yog qhov chaw kws kuv tuaj nrhav tau tug txhais rua kuv tug tswv tug tub.
Nwgnuav yog mej zoo sab hab ua ncaaj rua kuv tug tswv, ces thov qha rua kuv paub, yog tsi tau los thov qha rua kuv paub, kuas kuv txhaj paub txav txim sab has tas yuav ua le caag.”
Lanpaas hab Npethuyees teb has tas, “Qhov nuav yeej yog Vaajtswv pum zoo lawm, peb tsi pum qaab yuav has tau le caag rua koj.
Lenpekas nyob ntawd, koj ca le coj nwg moog. Ca nwg ua koj tug tswv tug tub tug quaspuj lawv le tug TSWV tau has tseg ca lawm.”
Thaus Anplahaas tug tubkhai nov tej lug nuav lawm, nwg txhus caug ndlua pehawm tug TSWV.
Ces nwg txawm muab tej rig tsho, tej nyaj hab tej saw kub lug rua Lenpekas. Hab nwg tseem muab tau tej khoom pub kws muaj nqes heev rua Lenpekas tug nug hab muab rua nwg nam.
Ces Anplahaas tug tubkhai hab cov tuabneeg kws nrug nwg tuaj, txawm noj haus hab pw ib mos qhov ntawd. Taagkig kaaj ntug, tug tubkhai has tas, “Thov tso kuv rov qaab moog cuag kuv tug tswv.”
Tabsis Lenpekas tug nug hab nwg nam teb has tas, “Thov ca tug ntxhais nrug peb nyob xyaa yim nub lossis kaum nub ntxiv tsaiv, nwg maam nrug mej moog.”
Tabsis tug tubkhai teb has tas, “Mej tsi xob cheem kuv nyob. Tug TSWV tub ua rua kuv teg num kws kuv taug kev tuaj nuav tav taag lawm, thov tso kuv rov moog cuag kuv tug tswv.”
Obtug teb has tas, “Ca peb hu tug ntxhais lug nug saib nwg has le caag.”
Yog le ntawd, obtug txawm hu Lenpekas lug nug has tas, “Koj puas zoo sab nrug tug txivneej nuav moog?” Lenpekas teb has tas, “Kuv yuav moog.”
Yog le ntawd, obtug txhaj le tso Lenpekas hab tug ntxhais qhev laug kws ibtxwm tu Lenpekas nrug Anplahaas tug tubkhai hab nwg cov tuabneeg moog.
Ces puab txawm foom koob moov rua Lenpekas le nuav: “Tug muam, thov kuas koj muaj tub muaj ki ntau txheeb ntau vaam leej; Thov kuas koj cov xeebntxwv txeeb tau puab cov yeebncuab tej nroog!”
Ces Lenpekas hab nwg cov ntxhais qhev txhaj caij ntxhuav nrug Anplahaas tug tubkhai, sawv kev moog tsev lawm.
Ixaj taabtom tuaj txug ntawm lub taj suabpuam  ntawm “Lub Qhov Tshij Kws Yog Tug Muaj Sa Nyob Hab Tug Pum Kuv” hab nwg tuaj nyob rua huv tebchaws Kana-aas saab qaabteb.
Thaus yuav tsaus ntuj Ixaj txawm tawm moog ncig ua si tom teb hab nwg pum ib paab ntxhuav taug kev lug.
Thaus Lenpekas pum dlheev Ixaj, nwg txawm nqeg sau nwg tug ntxhuav nrausqaum lug,

hab nug Anplahaas tug tubkhai has tas, “Tug txivneej kws taabtom taug kev tuaj rua ntawm peb nuav yog leejtwg?” Tug tubkhai teb has tas, “Nwg yog kuv tug tswv ntaag.” Yog le ntawd, Lenpekas txawm muab phuam lug npug nwg lub ntsejmuag.
Tug tubkhai txhaj qha txhua yaam kws nwg moog ua tav taag lug rua Ixaj noog.

Ces Ixaj txhaj coj Lenpekas moog rua huv lub tsevntaub kws thaus Xalas kws yog nwg nam nyob, hab Lenpekas tau lug ua Ixaj tug quaspuj. Ixaj hlub Lenpekas heev, txawm yog nwg nam tuag lawm los nwg rov muaj kev kaaj sab tuaj.
Anplahaas yuav dlua ib tug quaspuj tshab, nwg lub npe hu ua Ketulas.
Ketulas yug tau Xeelas, Yausaas, Medas, Midias, Isanpas hab Suas rua Anplahaas.
Yausaas yog Senpas hab Dedaas obtug txiv, hab Dedaas cov xeebntxwv yog cov Asulees, cov Letusees hab cov Le-umees.
Midias cov tub yog Efas, Efelas, Hanauj, Anpidas hab Eladas. Taagnrho cov nuav puavleej yog Ketulas cov xeebntxwv.
Anplahaas tso txhua yaam kws yog nwg tej qubtxeeg qubteg rua Ixaj,

tabsis thaus Anplahaas tseem ua neej nyob, nwg tub muab nwg lub cuabtaam ibtxha faib rua nwg ob tug nam yau tej tub lawm hab. Ces nwg txhaj muab cov tub nuav cais moog nyob rua saab nubtuaj, kuas nyob nrug dleb ntawm nwg tug tub Ixaj.
Anplahaas ua neej nyob tau ib puas xyaa caum tsib xyoos.

Anplahaas txawm tuag thaus nwg muaj noobnyoog laug lawm, nwg yog ib tug tuabneeg laug hab muaj noobnyoog nyob ntev heev; nwg maam tuag moog nrug nwg tej kwvtij hab nwg tej yawmkoob kws tub xub tuag lawm nyob.

Nwg ob tug tub, Ixaj hab Yisamayees coj Anplahaas lub cev moog log rua huv lub Qhov tsua Makepelas kws nyob ze rua ntawm Maales saab nubtuaj, huv Xauhas tug tub Efaloos kws yog tuabneeg Hitis thaaj teb.
Yaav nraag ntej Anplahaas tub yuav thaaj teb nuav lug ntawm cov tuabneeg Hitis lawm, puab txhaj kwv Anplahaas moog log nrug Xalas kws yog nwg tug quaspuj ua ke rua huv.
Tom qaab kws Anplahaas tuag lawm, Vaajtswv tau foom koob moov rua nwg tug tub Ixaj. Thaus ntawd Ixaj nyob ze ntawm “Lub Qhov Tshij Kws Yog Tug Muaj Sa Nyob Hab Tug Pum Kuv.”
Ntawm nuav yog has txug Anplahaas tug tub Yisamayees caajceg kws yog Xalas tug ntxhais qhev Hankas kws yog tuabneeg Iziv yug rua Anplahaas.
Yisamayees muaj kaum ob tug tub, hab teev puab tej npe ib tug zuj zug kws yog pib tug tub hlub moog txug tug tub ntxawg muaj lawv le nuav: Nenpayaus, Kedas, Anpees, Mixames,
Misemas, Dumas, Maxas,
Hadas, Temas, Yetus, Nafises hab Kedemas.
Puab yog yawmkoob ntawm kaum ob xeem tuabneeg, hab puab muab puab tej zog hab tej chaw nyob tis npe lawv le puab tej npe.
Yisamayees muaj noobnyoog ib puas peb caug xyaa xyoo rua thaus nwg tuag moog nrug nwg tej kwvtij, tej yawmkoob kws tub xub tuag ua ntej lawm nyob.

Yisamayees cov xeebntxwv nyob rua huv cheebtsaam nruab nraab ntawm Havilas hab Sules kws ze tebchaws Iziv saab nubtuaj ntawm txujkev moog rua peg tebchaws Axilias. Puab nyob puab rua ib qho tsi xyaw puab cov kwvtij kws yog Anplahaas cov xeebntxwv.
Ntawm nuav yog has txug Anplahaas tug tub Ixaj lub neej.
Ixaj noobnyoog muaj plaub caug xyoo rua thaus nwg yuav Lanpaas tug muam Lenpekas kws yog Npethuyees tug ntxhais lug ua quaspuj. Npethuyees yog tuabneeg Alamees kws nyob peg tebchaws Mexuputamias.
Vim Lenpekas yeej ibtxwm xeeb tsi taug tub le, Ixaj txhaj thov tug TSWV pub mivnyuas rua Lenpekas. Tug TSWV txhaj teb Ixaj tej lug thov, hab Lenpekas txawm xeeb tub lawm.

Lenpekas suab ob tug mivnyuas ntxaib. Thaus tseem tsi tau yug, obtug ib leeg tub tuam ib leeg huv leej nam plaab lawm. Lenpekas txhaj has tas, “Vim le caag muaj tej yaam xwmtxheej zoo le nuav rua kuv?” Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj nug tug TSWV saib yog vim le caag.

Tug TSWV has rua Lenpekas tas, “Muaj ob tsaav tuabneeg nyob huv koj plaab; Koj yuav yug tau ob tsaav tuabneeg kws yuav sis tawmtsaam. Ib tug yuav muaj zug tshaaj ib tug, tug tij yuav ua tug kwv qhev.”
Thaus txug caij yug lawm, Lenpekas txhaj yug tau ob tug tub ntxaib.
Thawj tug tub nqaj tawv lab, hab tuaj plaub nplwg loo zoo le lub tsho ntev kws muab tej plaub tsaj ua. Yog le ntawd, txhaj tis nwg lub npe hu ua Exaus.

Thaus kws yug tau tug kwv, tug kwv tuav rawv Exaus lub laujtaws. Yog le ntawd, txhaj tis nwg lub npe hu ua Yakhauj.  Ixaj noobnyoog muaj rau caum xyoo rua thaus kws Lenpekas yug tau ob tug tub ntxaib ntawd.

Thaus ob tug tub ntawd luj hlub tav hluas lawm, Exaus yog ib tug kws txawj tua nqaj, nwg yog ib tug tuabneeg nyam plhob haav zoov heev, tabsis Yakhauj yog ib tug tuabneeg ncauj lug tsawg hab nwg nyam nyob huv tsev xwb.
Ixaj nyam Exaus dlua, rua qhov Ixaj nyam noj tej nqaj tsaj qus kws Exaus moog plhob tua tau lug, tabsis Lenpekas nyam Yakhauj dlua.
Muaj ib nub thaus Yakhauj taabtom hau mivntsiv taum rua huv qhovcub, Exaus moog plhob tua nqaj lug txug. Nwg tshaib plaab heev
hab nwg has rua Yakhauj tas, “Kuv tshaib plaab heev lawm, thov muab koj laujkaub taum lab mivntsiv pub rua kuv noj.” (Tub yog vim le ntawd txhaj muab nwg tis npe hu ua Edoos.)
Yakhauj teb has tas, “Yog koj muab koj lub meejmom kws yog tijlaug rua kuv, kuv txhaj yuav pub rua koj noj.”
Exaus teb has tas, “Ua le los mas! Kuv tub yuav tuag tshaib ntawm nuav, lub nyuas meejmom ua tij yuav muaj qaabhau dlaabtsi rua kuv?”

Yakhauj teb has tas, “Koj yuavtsum xub coglug ua ntej rua kuv has tas, koj yuavtsum muab lub meejmom ua tij ntawd rua kuv tsaiv.” Exaus txhaj coglug tseg hab muab nwg lub meejmom ua tijlaug rua Yakhauj.
Ces Yakhauj txawm muab mivntsiv ncuav hab mivntsiv taum rua Exaus. Thaus nwg noj taag, ces nwg txawm sawv moog lawm. Qhov ntawd tub yog Exaus ua saib tsi taug nwg lub meejmom tijlaug.

Rov muaj dlua kev tshaib nqhes nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd, ib yaam le tam kws thaus Anplahaas tseem ua neej nyob. Ixaj txhaj le moog cuag Anpimelej kws yog cov Filitees tug Vaajntxwv huv lub nroog Kelas.
Tug TSWV lug tshwm rua Ixaj pum hab has rua nwg tas, “Koj tsi xob tsiv moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv; nyob tuabywv huv lub tebchaws nuav ntawm thaaj chaw kws kuv qha rua koj nyob.

Nyob tuabywv ntawm nuav xwb, kuv yuav nrug nraim koj nyob hab foom koob moov rua koj. Kuv yuav muab taagnrho lub tebchaws nuav pub rua koj hab koj cov xeebntxwv. Kuv yuav ncu ntsoov tej lug kws kuv cog tseg rua koj txiv Anplahaas lawm.

Kuv yuav pub kuas koj muaj xeebntxwv coob npaum le tej nubqub sau nruab ntug, hab kuv yuav muab taagnrho lub tebchaws nuav pub rua puab. Hab kuv yuav foom koob moov ntawm koj cov xeebntxwv moog rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob thoob nplajteb.
Kuv yuav foom koob moov rua koj, rua qhov Anplahaas noog kuv lug, hab coj lawv le kuv tej kevcai hab tej lug saamfwm txhua lu.”
Yog le ntawd, Ixaj txhaj nyob tuabywv huv lub nroog Kelas.

Thaus cov txivneej kws nyob huv lub nroog ntawd nug txug Ixaj tug quaspuj, nwg teb puab has tas, Lenpekas yog nwg tug muam xwb. Nwg tsi kaam qha has tas, Lenpekas yog nwg tug quaspuj, rua qhov Lenpekas zoo nkauj heev, Ixaj ntshai nyob tsaam cov txivneej kws nyob huv lub nroog ntawd tua nwg povtseg hab yuav Lenpekas.
Thaus Ixaj hab Lenpekas tseem nyob huv lub nroog ntawd Vaajntxwv Anpimelej nyob huv tsev xauj ntawm qhovrais pum Ixaj hab Lenpekas obtug taabtom sis tawb.

Anpimelej txhaj tso tuabneeg moog has rua Ixaj has tas, “Lenpekas tub yog koj tug quaspuj ntaag los sav! Vim le caag koj tseem has tas, nwg yog koj tug muam xwb?” Ixaj teb vaajntxwv has tas, “Yog kuv qha rua suavdlawg has tas nwg yog kuv tug quaspuj, nyob tsaam muaj tuabneeg sab phem muab kuv tua povtseg hab yuav Lenpekas.”
Anpimelej rov has tas, “Yog le caag koj txhaj ua le nuav rua peb? Yog kuv cov pejxeem ib tug txivneej ca le moog nrug koj tug quaspuj pw, ces koj yog tug kws coj txujkev txhum ntawd lug rua peb.”
Anpimelej txhaj ceebtoom rua nwg cov pejxeem has tas: “Yog leejtwg laam moog zig tug txivneej nuav tug quaspuj, mas yuav muab tug ntawd tua povtseg.”
Ixaj cog qoobloo rua huv lub tebchaws ntawd, hab xyoo ntawd nwg sau tau qoob ntau tshaaj cov noob kws nwg cog lawm ib puas npaug, rua qhov tug TSWV foom koob moov rua nwg.
Ixaj vaammeej zuj zug hab ua ib tug tuabneeg npluanuj heev.
Rua qhov Ixaj muaj tej tsaj txhu kws yog yaaj hab nyuj coob, hab nwg tseem muaj tubkhai coob kawg le, txhaj ua rua cov tuabneeg Filitees khib heev.
Puab txhaj muab tej qhov tshij kws nwg txiv Anplahaas cov tubkhai khawb thaus nwg tseem ua neej nyob txhub taag huv tuabsi lawm.
Ces Anpimelej txhaj has rua Ixaj tas, “Koj ca le tsiv tawm huv peb lub tebchaws nuav moog, rua qhov koj muaj fwjchim tshaaj peb lawm.”
Yog le ntawd, Ixaj txhaj tsiv tawm huv lub nroog ntawd hab moog tsaa tsevntaub nyob rua huv lub Haav Kelas, nwg nyob qhov ntawd tau ib ntus.

Nwg txhaj le rov qaab khawb cov qhov tshij kws thaus u nwg txiv Anplahaas khawb ca lawm dlua ib zag ntxiv, rua qhov tom qaab kws Anplahaas tuag lawm, cov Filitees tau tuaj muab tej qhov tshij ntawd txhub taag lawm. Ixaj tis npe rua cov qhov tshij nuav lawv le tej qub npe kws thaus nwg txiv tis rua lawm.
Ixaj cov tubkhai moog khawb ib lub qhov tshij huv lub haav ntawd hab txawm muaj dlej txhawv tawm lug.

Ces cov tuabneeg yug yaaj huv lub nroog Kelas tuaj nrug Ixaj cov tuabneeg yug yaaj sis txeeb hab has tas, “Cov qhov tshij nuav yog peb tug.” Yog le ntawd, Ixaj txhaj muab lub qhovdlej ntawd tis npe hu ua, “Sis Txeeb.”
Ixaj cov tubkhai rov khawb dlua ib lub qhov tshij, hab puab tseem rov txeeb lub qhov tshij ntawd dlua, yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tis npe rua lub qhov tshij ntawd hu ua, “Sis Ntxub.”

Nwg txhaj tsiv tawm ntawm thaaj chaw ntawd moog khawb dlua ib lub qhov tshij. Nyob qhov ntawd puab tsi muaj kev sis caav sis tshe txug lub qhov tshij nuav ntxiv lawm, yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tis npe rua lub qhov tshij ntawd hu ua “Muaj Aav Dlaav.” Nwg has tas, “Nwgnuav tug TSWV pub peb muaj aav dlaav nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav, hab peb yuav muaj kev vaammeej nyob ntawm nuav moog le.”
Ixaj txhaj tawm ntawm qhov chaw ntawd hab moog rua tom Npesenpas.

Mo ntawd tug TSWV txhaj lug tshwm rua nwg pum hab has rua nwg tas, “Kuv yog koj txiv Anplahaas tug Vaajtswv ntaag. Koj tsi xob ntshai, kuv nrug nraim koj nyob. Kuv yuav foom koob moov rua koj hab pub rua koj muaj xeebntxwv coob lawv le kuv tau coglug rua kuv tug tubkhai Anplahaas lawm.”
Ixaj txhaj teeb tau ib lub thaaj rua ntawd hab pehawm tug TSWV. Ces nwg txawm tsaa nwg lub tsevntaub nyob rua qhov ntawd, hab nwg cov tubkhai rov khawb dlua ib lub qhov tshij.
Anpimelej coj Ahuxas kws yog nwg tug tuavxaam hab Fikaules kws yog nwg tug thawj tubrog nrug nwg tuaj cuag Ixaj.
Ixaj txhaj nug has tas, “Vim le caag nwgnuav mej txhaj tuaj cuag kuv? Yaav nraag ntej mej tub tsi nrug kuv ua phoojywg hab mej tub ntab kuv tawm huv mej lub tebchaws lawm?”
Puab teb has tas, “Nwgnuav peb paub has tas muaj tug TSWV nrug nraim koj nyob, hab peb xaav has tas tsimnyog peb yuavtsum tau lug sis has kuas hum hab coglug rua koj. Peb xaav kuas koj coglug rua peb
has tas, koj yuav tsi ua phem rua peb, ib yaam le peb tsi tau ua phem rua koj. Peb yeej ua zoo rua koj hab tso koj moog kaaj sab lug. Peb paub has tas nwgnuav tug TSWV foom koob moov rua koj lawm.”
Ixaj txhaj npaaj tau ib rooj mov rua puab, puab txhaj noj hab haus txaus nkaus.
Taagkig sawv ntxuv puab peb leeg ntawd nyag lug leeg nyag lug hab nas homthawj rua nyag dlaim ntawv. Ces Ixaj txhaj xaa puab sawv kev moog tsev kaaj sab lug lawm.
Nub ntawd Ixaj cov tubkhai txhaj lug pav qha rua nwg has txug lub qhov tshij kws puab tau moog khawb ntawd. Puab has tas, “Peb moog nrhav tau ib lub qhov tshij lawm.”
Ixaj txhaj tis npe rua lub qhov tshij ntawd hu ua “Coglug.” Vim le ntawd txhaj ua rua lub nroog Npesenpas  tau lub npe nuav.
Thaus kws Exaus noobnyoog muaj plaub caug xyoo, nwg yuav tau cov tuabneeg Hitis ob tug ntxhais lug ua quaspuj, Yudis yog Npeelis tug ntxhais, hab Npasemas yog Eloos tug ntxhais.
Ob tug nyaab nuav ua rua Ixaj hab Lenpekas ua neej lwj sab kawg le.
Nwgnuav Ixaj laug heev hab qhovmuag tsi pum kev lawm. Nwg tso tuabneeg moog hu nwg tug tub hlub Exaus lug hab nwg has tas, “Mivtub!” Exaus teb has tas, “Txiv, kuv nyob ntawm nuav.”
Ixaj has tas, “Koj pum has tas kuv tub laug heev hab kuv yuav tuag nub twg los tsi paub le.
Nqaa koj raab neevnti hab cov xub, moog yos tom haav zoov hab tua nqaj nruab nraag lug rua kuv noj.
Ua ib pluag zaub mov qaab kws kuv nyam, hab nqaa lug rua kuv noj. Tom qaab kws kuv noj taag lawm, kuv yuav foom koob moov rua koj zag kawg ua ntej kuv tuag.”
Thaus Ixaj taabtom has rua Exaus ntawd, Lenpekas txawm nov. Yog le ntawd, thaus Exaus tawm moog yos tua nqaj lawm,
Lenpekas txawm has rua Yakhauj tas, “Kuv nov koj txiv has rua Exaus tas,
‘Koj ca le moog yos tua nqaj hab ua ib pluag mov qaab lug rua kuv noj. Tom qaab kws noj npluag mov ntawd taag lawm, kuv yuav foom koob moov rua koj taabmeeg tug TSWV ua ntej kuv tuag.’
Lenpekas has tas, ‘Taamsim nuav ntaag lauj, mivtub, koj ca le noog kuv has hab ua lawv le kuv qha.’
Koj moog nraag paab tsaj hab nteg ob tug mivnyuas tshis kws rog lug rua kuv, kuv yuav muab ob tug tshis ntawd tua ua ib pluag nqaj qaab qaab kws koj txiv nyam heev rua koj txiv noj.
Koj nqaa moog rua koj txiv noj, hab nwg yuav foom nwg tej koob moov rua koj ua ntej nwg tuag.”
Tabsis Yakhauj has rua nwg nam has tas, “Koj yeej paub has tas Exaus yog tuabneeg tuaj plaub, tabsis kuv tej tawv nqaj dlu lug xwb.
Nyob tsaam kuv txiv cev teg plhw kuv, ces nwg paub has tas yog kuv dlaag nwg, kuv ua le nuav kuas kuv tau koob moov, tabsis ntshai kuv yuav tau nwg lu lug foom tsi zoo xwb.”
Nwg nam teb has tas, “Kuv tub, txhua yaam kws koj txiv foom tsi zoo ca poob rua kuv ris huv tuabsi, ca le ua lawv le kuv tub has rua koj lawm, moog nteg ob tug mivnyuas tshis lug rua kuv.”
Yog le ntawd, Yakhauj txhaj moog nteg tau ob tug mivnyuas tshis caab lug rua nwg nam, ces leej nam txhaj muab tua ua ib pluag nqaj qaab heev kws nwg txiv nyam noj.
Ces Lenpekas txawm moog muab Exaus kws yog nwg tug tub hlub, cev rig tsho zoo tshaaj plawg kws nwg khaws ca, lug rua Yakhauj naav.
Lenpekas txhaj muab ob dlaim tawv tshis lug qhwv Yakhauj ob txhais ncej npaab hab qhwv Yakhauj lub cejdlaab qhov tsi tuaj plaub.
Ces Lenpekas txawm muab cov nqaj kws qaab ntawd, hab cov mov kws nwg ua tau lawm, rua nwg tug tub Yakhauj.
Ces Yakhauj txawm nqaa moog rua nwg txiv hab has tas, “Txiv!” Ixaj teb has tas, “Koj has dlaabtsi, koj yog kuv ob tug tub tug twg?”

Yakhauj teb has tas, “Kuv yog Exaus, koj tug tub hlub ntaag, kuv tub ua nqaj tav taag lawv le koj tau has rua kuv lawm. Koj ca le sawv lug hab noj tej nqaj kws kuv nqaa lug rua koj, hab foom koj tej koob moov rua kuv.”
Ixaj nug has tas, “Mivtub, koj moog yos qhov twg, koj yuav tua tau nqaj lug sai ua luaj le?” Yakhauj teb has tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv paab kuv, kuv txhaj moog nrhav tau sai.”
Ixaj has rua Yakhauj has tas, “Koj ca le txaav lug rua ntawm kuv nuav, kuv yuav cev teg plhw koj saib koj puas yog Exaus tag los tsi yog?”
Yakhauj txhaj txaav zog moog rua ntawm nwg txiv, Ixaj txhaj cev teg tuaj plhw Yakhauj hab has tas, “Koj lub suab has lug zoo le Yakhauj lub, tabsis koj ob txhais npaab zoo le Exaus ob txhais.”
Nwg tsi paub Yakhauj lawm rua qhov Yakhauj ob txhais npaab tuaj plaub nplwg loo zoo le Exaus ob txhais hab. Nwg tub yuav foom koob moov rua Yakhauj,
tabsis nwg tseem rov nug dlua ntxiv has tas, “Koj yog Exaus tag los?” Yakhauj teb has tas, “Kuv yog Exaus tag.”

Ixaj has tas, “Tsaws cov nqaj lug rua kuv noj. Thaus kuv noj taag lawm, kuv maam le foom kuv tej koob moov rua koj.” Yakhauj txhaj tsaws hlo tsum mov lug rua nwg txiv noj hab tseem laub cawv lug rua nwg txiv haus huv tuabsi.
Ces Ixaj has rua Yakhauj has tas, “Mivtub, koj ca le txaav lug ze hab nwj kuv.”

Thaus Yakhauj txaav zog lug nwj Ixaj, Ixaj na Yakhauj lub tsho tsw Exaus tug ntxhab, nwg txhaj foom koob moov rua Yakhauj. Nwg has tas: “Kuv tug tub nuav tug ntxhab tsw ib yaam le thaaj teb kws tug TSWV tub foom koob moov rua lawm tug ntxhab ntaag.
Thov Vaajtswv tso lwg sau ntuj lug rua koj tej teb kuas zoo qoobloo heev! Thov nwg pub rua koj tej nplej, tej txiv maab kuas ntsu heev!

Thov kuas txhua tsaav tuabneeg tau lug ua koj tubkhai, hab thov kuas tej pejxeem txhus caug ndlua pe koj. Thov kuas koj tau ua tug kaav taagnrho koj tsoom kwvtij, thov kuas koj nam cov xeebntxwv txhus caug pe koj. Thov kuas cov kws tsawm foom koj raug foom tsi zoo, hab thov kuas cov kws foom koob moov rua koj tau txais koob moov zoo.”
Ixaj foom koob moov taagnrho xwb, Yakhauj tawm plawg lawm, ces Yakhauj tug tijlaug Exaus kws moog yos tua nqaj, txawm lug txug ndlua.

Nwg muab cov nqaj ntawd ua tau nqaj qaab heev hab nqaa moog rua nwg txiv. Nwg has tas, “Txiv, koj ca le sawv lug hab noj tej nqaj kws kuv moog tua tau hab ua nqaa lug rua koj, koj yuav foom koj tej koob moov rua kuv.”
Ixaj nug has tas, “Koj yog leejtwg?” Exaus teb has tas, “Kuv yog koj tug tub hlub, Exaus ntaag.”

Ixaj poob sab nthaav hab ua ib ce tshee nyo, ces nwg txhaj nug has tas, “Tug puastaab tua tau nqaj lug rua kuv noj taag lawm, tsua yog leejtwg? Kuv noj taagnrho ces koj txawm lug txug ndlua ntaag. Kuv tub foom kuv tej koob moov kws yog zag kawg rua nwg, hab nwg yeej tau txuj koob moov ntawd moog ibtxhis le lawm.”
Thaus Exaus nov dlheev le ntawd, nwg mob sab heev tsaa hlo suab quaj hab has tas, “Txiv, koj ca le foom koob moov rua kuv ib yaam nkaus hab los mas!”
Ixaj teb has tas, “Koj tug kwv tub lug dlaag kuv, mas nwg tub tau koj tej koob moov lawm.”

Exaus has tas, “Zag nuav yog zag ob kws nwg txhaav kuv tug. Nwg lub npe yeej phim hu ua Yakhauj lawm tag.  Nwg tub txeeb kuv lub meejmom kws yog tijlaug lawm, nwgnuav nwg tseem txhaav kuv tej koob moov lawm hab. Koj txawm tsi tshuav koob moov seem rua kuv le los?”

Ixaj teb has tas, “Kuv tub tsaa nwg lug ua num ua tswv kaav koj, hab kuv tub foom kuas nwg cov kwvtij tau lug ua nwg tubkhai huv tuabsi lawm. Kuv tau foom koob moov kuas nwg muaj qoobloo hab txiv maab nplua mag. Mivtub nwgnuav kuv tsi tshuav ib yaam dlaabtsi yuav foom rua koj ntxiv le lawm!”
Exaus rov taij nwg txiv has tas, “Txiv, koj tej lug koob lug moov tsuas muaj npaum ntawd xwb los? Thov foom koob moov rua kuv hab los mas!” Nwg rov quaj dlua.
Ces Ixaj has rua Exaus has tas, “Koj yuav nyob lub tebchaws kws tsi zoo qoob, hab tsi muaj dlej naag yug koj tej qoobloo.
Koj yuav nrhav noj nrhav haus ntawm koj raab ntaaj, tabsis koj yuav ua koj tug kwv qhev. Yog thaus twg koj ntxeev sab koj txhaj le dlim ntawm nwg kev tswjfwm.”
Exaus txawm ntxub Yakhauj heev, rua qhov nwg txiv foom koob moov rua Yakhauj lawm. Nwg xaav has tas, “Kuv txiv nub tuag tub lug ze lawm, thaus dlua nwg lawm, kuv yuav muab Yakhauj tua povtseg.”
Tabsis thaus Lenpekas nov has tas Exaus tuav tswvyim le ntawd, nwg txhaj moog has rua Yakhauj tas, “Koj tug tijlaug Exaus tuav tswvyim yuav tua koj povtseg pauj qhov kws koj ua rua nwg.
Mivtub, taamsim nuav koj ca le ua le kuv has. Koj ca le sawbsim tsiv moog nrug kuv tug nug Lanpaas nyob tim lub nroog Halaas,
hab nrug nwg nyob ib ntus, kuas koj tug tijlaug tej kev chim xaam
hab nwg tsi ncu qaab txug tej kws koj ua rua nwg lawm tsaiv. Ces kuv maam nrhav tuabneeg tuaj tog koj rov qaab lug. Vim le caag kuv yuav ua tuab nub pluj kuv ob tug tub le?”

Lenpekas has rua Ixaj tas, “Kuv dlhuav Exaus ob tug quaspuj kws yog cov tuabneeg Hitis ntawd hwv lawm. Yog Yakhauj tseem moog yuav cov tuabneeg Hitis nuav ib tug ntxhais lug ua quaspuj hab, ntshai kuv yeem tuag moog zoo dlua.”
Ixaj txhaj hu Yakhauj lug cuag nwg, foom koob moov rua nwg, hab has rua nwg tas, “Mivtub, koj tsi xob laam yuav cov tuabneeg Kana-aas nuav tej ntxhais.
Ca le moog lawm tim koj yawm Npethuyees tsev kws nyob tim tebchaws Mexuputamias, hab moog yuav cov ntxhais tid ib tug lug ua koj quaspuj, yuav koj txivdlaab Lanpaas cov ntxhais ib tug ntaag.
Thov Vaajtswv tug muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus foom koob moov rua koj hab pub koj muaj tubki coob, kuas koj tau ua ntau tsaav tuabneeg tug yawmkoob.

Thov kuas nwg foom koob moov rua koj hab koj tej xeebntxwv ib yaam le nwg foom koob moov rua Anplahaas, hab thov kuas koj tau thaaj aav kws Vaajtswv muab pub rua Anplahaas kws koj tau lug nyob nuav lawm ua koj tug.”
Ixaj txhaj tso Yakhauj moog rua tim tebchaws Mexuputamias, moog nrug Lanpaas kws yog Npethuyees kws yog tuabneeg Alamees tug tub kws yog Yakhauj hab Exaus obtug nam Lenpekas tug nug hlub nyob.

Exaus paub has tas, Ixaj foom koob moov rua Yakhauj hab saamfwm tsi pub kuas nwg yuav cov tuabneeg Kana-aas tej ntxhais lug ua quaspuj, hab tso nwg moog nrhav yuav quaspuj rua tim tebchaws Mexuputamias lawm.
Exaus paub has tas Yakhauj yeej noog nam noog txiv lug hab nwg tau moog rua tim tebchaws Mexuputamias lawm tag.
Ces Exaus txhaj paub has tas, nwg txiv Ixaj tsi nyam cov quaspuj kws yog tuabneeg Kana-aas.
Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj moog yuav Anplahaas tug tub Yisamayees tug ntxhais Mahalas kws yog Nenpayaus tug muam lug ua quaspuj.
Yakhauj sawv kev ntawm lub nroog Npesenpas moog rua tim lub nroog Halaas.
Nwg moog txug ntawm ib thaaj chaw  nub poob qho lawm, nwg txhaj pw ib mos ntawm ib tog kev. Nwg muab ib lub pobzeb lug rau ncoo pw tsaug zug.
Nwg ua npau suav pum ib tug ntaiv tuam huv aav nuav moog nto plawg sau ntuj, muaj cov timtswv nce moog hab nqeg lug ntawm tug ntaiv ntawd.

Ua cav txawm pum tug TSWV sawv nreg nreeg ntawm nwg ib saab.  Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yog Anplahaas hab Ixaj tug Vaajtswv, kuv yuav muab thaaj aav kws koj taabtom pw ntawm ko pub rua koj hab koj cov xeebntxwv ua mej tug.

Koj cov xeebntxwv yuav coob npaum nkaus le cov moov aav huv nplajteb nuav. Puab yuav nthuav puab lub tebchaws kuas dlaav moog rua txhua faab, hab kuv yuav foom koob moov ntawm koj hab koj cov xeebntxwv moog rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg  kws nyob thoob nplajteb.

Ncu ntsoov has tas kuv yuav nrug nraim koj hab tsomkwm koj txhua qhov chaw kws koj moog, hab kuv yuav coj koj rov lug nyob rua ntawm thaaj aav nuav dlua. Kuv yuav nrug nraim koj moog txug thaus kuv ua txhua yaam tav taag lawv le kuv tau coglug rua koj lawm.”
Yakhauj tsim dlheev lug hab nwg has tas, “Tug TSWV yeej nyob ntawm nuav tag lauj! Nwg yeej nyob ntawm thaaj chaw nuav, tabsis yog kuv tsi paub xwb!”
Nwg ntshai heev hab nwg has tas, “Qhov chaw nuav ua rua kuv ntshai heev! Lub chaw nuav yeej yog Vaajtswv lub tsev hab yog rooj ntug ceebtsheej ntaag lauj.”
Taagkig kaaj ntug Yakhauj txhaj muab lub pobzeb kws nwg muab lug rau ncoo ntawd teeb ua qhov chaw tseemceeb ncu tseg. Ces nwg muab roj txiv ntoo laub rua sau lub pobzeb hab muab fij rua Vaajtswv.
Nwg txhaj tis npe rua thaaj chaw ntawd hu ua Npethees  (Lub nroog ntawd thaus u hu ua Lexes.)
Yakhauj txawm coglug rua tug TSWV has tas, “Yog koj nrug nraim kuv nyob hab tsomkwm kuv taug kev moog, pub mov rua kuv noj hab rig tsho rua kuv naav,
moog txug thaus kuv rov qaab lug txug rua huv kuv txiv tsev kaaj sab lug, mas koj txhaj yog kuv tug Vaajtswv tag.
Lub pobzeb kws kuv teeb ua chaw ncu txug nuav yuav yog qhov chaw pehawm koj ntaag, hab kuv yuav muab txhua yaam kws koj muab rua kuv lawm ib feem kaum rua koj.”
Yakhauj txawm rau sab ntso taug kev moog txug rua huv cov tuabneeg kws nyob saab nubtuaj lub tebchaws.

Taamsim ntawd, nwg saib dlheev pum ib lub qhov tshij nyob huv dlaim teb, hab muaj peb paab yaaj pw pawg lug ncig lub qhov tshij ntawd. Cov yaaj ntawd yeej haus dlej huv lub qhov tshij nuav, luas muab ib dlaim txag zeb luj heev npug lub qhov tshij ntawd.

Lawv le ibtxwm luas tog thaus cov yaaj lug txhij rua ntawm lub qhov tshij lawm, mas cov tuabneeg yug yaaj maam le muab dlaim txag zeb ntawd tshem tawm hab cug dlej rua cov yaaj haus. Ces puab maam le muab dlaim txag zeb rov lug npug lub qhov tshij dlua.
Yakhauj nug cov tuabneeg yug yaaj has tas, “Kuv cov phoojywg, mej tuaj qhov twg tuaj?” Puab teb has tas, “Peb tuaj tom lub nroog Halaas tuaj.”
Yakhauj rov nug dlua has tas, “Mej puas paub Lanpaas kws yog Nahaus tug tub?” Puab teb has tas, “Peb paub nwg hab.”
Yakhauj rov nug has tas, “Nwg puas noj qaab nyob zoo?” Puab teb has tas, “Nwg noj qaab nyob zoo hab, koj saib tid maj, nwg tug ntxhais Laxees taabtom taav nwg paab yaaj tuaj txug tid.”
Yakhauj has tas, “Taamsim nuav tseem ntxuv heev tsi tau txug lub caij kws taav tej tsaj moog tsev, ua caag mej tsi cug dlej rua mej cov tsaj haus hab coj rov moog noj zaub dlua?”
Puab teb has tas, “Peb tsi ua le ntawd, tog txug thaus cov tsaj lug txhij rua ntawm nuav tsaiv, peb maam muab dlaim txag zeb tshem tawm hab cug dlej rua cov tsaj haus.”
Thaus Yakhauj taabtom nrug puab thaam, Laxees txawm taav nwg txiv paab yaaj lug txug ndlua ntawd hab.

Thaus Yakhauj pum Laxees coj Yakhauj txivdlaab Lanpaas paab yaaj lug txug ndlua ntawd lawm, Yakhauj txawm moog rua ntawm lub qhov tshij, muab dlaim txag zeb tshem tawm, hab ntaus dlej rua cov yaaj haus.
Nwg nwj kag Laxees hab quaj zoo sab heev.
Nwg has rua Laxees has tas, “Kuv yog Lenpekas tug tub, kuv nam hab koj txiv yog muagnug ntaag.” Laxees txhaj dlha moog qha rua nwg txiv,
hab thaus Lanpaas nov has tas nwg tug muam tug tub Yakhauj tuaj, nwg txawm dlha loo moog tog Yakhauj, hab coj Yakhauj lug tsev. Yakhauj qha txhua yaam rua Lanpaas noog,
Lanpaas has rua Yakhauj has tas, “Tseeb lawm lauj, koj yeej yog kuv nqaj tawv hab roj ntshaav tag.” Yakhauj nrug Lanpaas nyob tau ib hlis nkaus.
Lanpaas has rua Yakhauj has tas, “Koj hab kuv wb txawm yog txheeb ze los tsi tsimnyog koj yuav ua num pub dlawb rua kuv xwb. Koj xaav yuav nqe zug pistsawg?”
Lanpaas muaj ob tug ntxhais, tug hlub hu ua Le-as, hab tug yau hu ua Laxees.
Le-as tsi tshua zoo nkauj,  tabsis Laxees zoo nkauj hab txaus nyam heev.
Yakhauj nyam Laxees dlua, yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj has rua Lanpaas has tas, “Yog koj kaam kuv yuav Laxees ua quaspuj, kuv yuav ua num rua koj xyaa xyoo.”
Lanpaas teb has tas, “Kuv zoo sab muab Laxees rua koj, zoo dlua le kuv muab rua lwm tug, koj ca le nrug kuv nyob ntawm nuav.”
Yakhauj txhaj ua num xyaa xyoo kuas tau Laxees ua quaspuj. Txawm yog sijhawm ntev npaum le ntawd los zoo le ob peb nyuas nub rua Yakhauj xwb, rua qhov nwg nyam Laxees heev.
Ces Yakhauj has rua Lanpaas has tas, “Kuv tub ua num puv xyaa xyoo lawm, ca le muab Laxees rua kuv yuav.”
Yog le ntawd, Lanpaas txhaj ua ib rooj mov hab caw txhua tug tuaj nrug nwg noj tshoob.
Yog tag mas yuavtsum muab Laxees rua Yakhauj, tabsis mo ntawd Lanpaas muab Le-as moog rua Yakhauj, ces Yakhauj txhaj nrug Le-as pw.
(Lanpaas muab nwg tug ntxhais qhev Xilepas rua nwg tug ntxhais Le-as ua Le-as tug ntxhais qhev.)

Thaus kaaj ntug Yakhauj maam le paub has tas tug kws nrug nwg pw ntawd yog Le-as. Nwg txhaj moog has rua Lanpaas has tas, “Vim le caag koj txhaj ua le nuav rua kuv? Kuv ua num rua koj yog xaav yuav Laxees xwb. Vim le caag koj dlaag kuv?”
Lanpaas teb has tas, “Peb cov tuabneeg nyob tebchaws nuav, tsi muaj cai xub muab tug ntxhais yau qua ua ntej tug ntxhais hlub.
Tog xyaa nub kuas ua tshoob dlhau tsaiv, kuv maam le muab Laxees rua koj, yog koj kaam rov qaab ua num rua kuv xyaa xyoo ntxiv.”
Yakhauj kuj pum zoo ua le ntawd, ces thaus xyaa nub kws ua tshoob ntawd dlhau lawm, Lanpaas txhaj muab Laxees txis rua Yakhauj yuav ua quaspuj.
(Lanpaas muab nwg tug ntxhais qhev kws hu ua Npilehas rua Laxees ua nwg tug ntxhais qhev.)
Yakhauj nrug Laxees pw hab nwg hlub Laxees heev dlua le nwg hlub Le-as. Yakhauj rov ua num rua Lanpaas xyaa xyoo ntxiv.
Thaus Vaajtswv pum has tas, Yakhauj hlub Le-as tsi npaum le hlub Laxees, nwg txhaj ca Le-as muaj mivnyuas xwb, tabsis tsi pub kuas Laxees muaj taug mivnyuas.

Le-as txawm xeeb tub hab yug tau ib tug tub tag. Nwg txhaj has tas, “Tug TSWV pum kuv tej kev lwj sab, nyaj zag nuav kuv tug quasyawg yuav hlub kuv”; yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tis tug tub ntawd npe hu ua Lunpees.

Le-as rov xeeb tub hab yug tau ib tug tub. Nwg has tas, “Tug TSWV pub kuv rov muaj tug tub nuav hab, rua qhov nwg nov has tas, kuv tug quasyawg tsi hlub kuv”; yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tis tug tub ntawd npe hu ua Xime-oos.

Le-as rov xeeb tub hab yug tau ib tug tub ntxiv. Nwg has tas, “Zag nuav kuv tug quasyawg yuav muab sab npuab kuv, rua qhov kuv tub yug tau peb tug tub rua nwg lawm”; yog le nwg txhaj tis tug tub ntawd npe hu ua Levis.

Le-as rov xeeb tub hab yug tau ib tug tub ntxiv. Nwg has tas, “Zag nuav kuv yuav ua tug TSWV tsaug”; yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tis npe rua tug tub ntawd hu ua Yudas.  Ces nwg txawm tseg tsi muaj mivnyuas lawm.
Tabsis Laxees tsi muaj ib tug mivnyuas rua Yakhauj le, hab nwg ntxub nwg tug taislaug heev, nwg txhaj has rua Yakhauj has tas, “Koj yuav muab mivnyuas rua kuv lossis koj yuav ca kuas kuv tuag.”
Yakhauj chim heev rua Laxees, nwg txhaj teb Laxees has tas, “Kuv yog Vaajtswv los? Vaajtswv yog tug kws tsi pub koj muaj taug mivnyuas los sav.”
Laxees has tas, “Kuv tug ntxhais qhev Npilehas nyob ntawm nuav, koj ca le moog nrug nwg pw kuas nwg muaj mivnyuas rua kuv. Ua le nuav kuv txhaj yuav tau ua tug tub ntawd leej nam.”
Yog le ntawd, Laxees txhaj muab Npilehas rua nwg tug quasyawg yuav, hab Yakhauj txhaj moog nrug nwg pw.
Npilehas txawm xeeb tub hab yug tau ib tug tub rua Yakhauj.
Laxees has tas, “Vaajtswv txav txim lawv le nwg txujkev ncaaj nceeg. Nwg nov kuv tej lug thov hab pub rua kuv muaj ib tug tub lawm;” Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tis tug tub ntawd npe hu ua Daas.
Npilehas rov xeeb tub hab yug tau ib tug tub rua Yakhauj.
Laxees has tas, “Kuv tau tawmtsaam kuv tug taislaug nyaav heev, nwgnuav kuv txhaj yeej nwg lawm”; yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tis tug tub ntawd npe hu ua Nathalis.
Thaus Le-as paub has tas nwg tsi muaj mivnyuas lawm, nwg txawm muab nwg tug ntxhais qhev Xilepas rua Yakhauj ua nam yau.
Ces Xilepas txawm yug tau ib tug tub rua Yakhauj.
Le-as has tas, “Kuv moov zoo kawg”; yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tis tug tub ntawd npe hu ua Khas.
Xilepas rov yug tau ib tug tub rua Yakhauj,
hab Le-as has tas, “Kuv zoo sab kawg nkaus le lauj! Nwgnuav tej quaspuj yuav hu kuv has tas, tug zoo sab”; yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tis tug tub ntawd npe hu ua Aseles.

Thaus txug caij hlais nplej Lunpees moog yos ua si tom teb hab nwg pum ib cov zaub ntug hauvpaug,  nwg txawm rhu tau ib cov nqaa lug rua nwg nam Le-as. Laxees has rua Le-as has tas, “Thov muab koj tug tub cov zaub ntug hauvpaug ob peb lub pub rua kuv.”

Le-as teb has tas, “Koj tub coj kuv tug quasyawg moog lawm ne, tseem tsi tau txaus koj sab hab los? Nwgnuav koj tseem tuaj thov kuv tug tub cov zaub ntug hauvpaug hab.” Laxees teb has tas, “Yog koj muab koj tug tub cov zaub ntug hauvpaug ob peb lub rua kuv, ib chim tsaus ntuj kuv ca Yakhauj nrug koj pw.”

Thaus yuav tsaus ntuj Yakhauj rov tom teb lug, Le-as txawm moog tog Yakhauj hab has tas, “Mo nuav koj yuavtsum moog nrug kuv pw, rua qhov kuv tub muab kuv tug tub cov zaub ntug hauvpaug ndlav koj lawm.” Yog le ntawd, mo ntawd Yakhauj txhaj moog nrug Le-as pw.
Vaajtswv teb Le-as tej lug thov, nwg txhaj rov xeeb tub hab yug tau ib tug tub rua Yakhauj yog tug tsib.
Le-as has tas, “Vaajtswv muab nqe zug rua kuv, rua qhov kuv muab kuv tug ntxhais qhev rua kuv tug quasyawg yuav”; yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tis tug tub ntawd npe hu ua Ixakhas.
Le-as rov xeeb tub hab yug tau ib tug tub rua Yakhauj yog tug rau.

Le-as has tas, “Vaajtswv muab tau ib qhov khoom pub rua kuv zoo kawg nkaus le. Mas zag nuav kuv tug quasyawg yuav hlub kuv, rua qhov kuv tub yug tau rau tug tub rua nwg lawm”; yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tis tug tub ntawd npe hu ua Xenpuloos.
Ces tom qaab ntawd nwg yug tau ib tug ntxhais, hab nwg tis npe rua tug ntxhais ntawd hu ua Dinas.
Vaajtswv tseem ncu ntsoov txug Laxees; nwg txhaj teb Laxees tej lug thov hab pub kuas nwg muaj taug mivnyuas.
Laxees txhaj xeeb tub hab yug tau ib tug tub. Nwg has tas “Vaajtswv pub kuv muaj tug tub nuav lug tshem kuv txujkev txaajmuag tawm.
Thov kuas tug TSWV pub rua kuv rov muaj dlua ib tug tub ntxiv hab”; yog le ntawd, Laxees txhaj tis tug tub ntawd npe hu ua Yauxej.
Tom qaab kws Laxees yug tau Yauxej lawm, Yakhauj txawm has rua Lanpaas has tas, “Thov koj tso kuv rov qaab, kuv yuav rov qaab moog nyob nraag kuv txiv lub tsev hab lub tebchaws.
Thov muab kuv ob tug quaspuj hab kuv cov mivnyuas kws kuv ua zug tau rua kuv, kuv yuav sawv kev moog. Koj yeej paub has tas kuv ua txhua yaam rua koj tav log lawm.”
Lanpaas teb rua Yakhauj has tas, “Thov ca rua kuv has le nuav: Lawv le kuv saib yaig mas, vim muaj koj, tug TSWV txhaj foom koob moov rua kuv.
Xaam taagnrho tej nqe zug kws koj ua saib raug pestsawg kuv yuav them rua koj.”
Yakhauj teb has tas, “Kuv tau ua num zoo npaum le caag rua koj hab koj tej tsaj kws kuv tu fuamvaam npaum le caag los koj yeej paub zoo lawm.

Ua ntej thaus kuv tsi tau lug koj muaj tsaj tsawg heev, nwgnuav koj tej tsaj kuj fuamvaam coob kawg le lawm, hab tug TSWV tub foom koob moov rua koj txhua yaam kws kuv ua hab txhua qhov kws kuv moog.  Ua le yuav thaus twg kuv maam le yug taug kuv lub cuab lub yig?”

Lanpaas txhaj nug has tas, “Yog le ntawd, kuv yuav muab dlaabtsi lug ua nqe zug rua koj?” Yakhauj teb has tas, “Kuv tsi yuav ib yaam dlaabtsi le. Yog koj kaam mas kuv yuav nyob tu koj cov tsaj moog ntxiv, xws le:

Nub nua ca kuv moog ncig saib thoob plawg koj cov tsaj hab muab txhua tug mivnyuas yaaj dlub  hab tej mivnyuas tshis kws txaij lossis txaij tej teev xaiv ca rua ib qho. Cov tsaj nuav lauj, yog cov kws ua nqe zug rua kuv.

Thaus koj tuaj saib koj txhaj paub has tas, kuv yeej ua ncaaj nceeg tag. Thaus kws koj tuaj tshuaj saib kuv tej nqe zug, yog kuv tseem muaj tej tug mivnyuas tshis tsi txaij lossis tsi txaij tej teev lossis muaj ib tug mivnyuas yaaj tsi dlub le, ces koj txhaj paub has tas yog kuv nyag lug xwb.”
Lanpaas teb has tas, “Kuv pum zoo yuav le kws koj has ntaag.”

Tabsis nub ntawd Lanpaas muab cov laug tshis kws txaij lossis txaij tej teev hab cov maum tshis kws txaij lossis txaij ua tej teev lossis dlawb tej teev cais, hab nwg muab taagnrho cov yaaj dlub cais tawm rua ib qho. Nwg tso nwg cov tub ua cov saib tej tsaj ntawd,
hab muab cais moog nyob nrug dleb peb nub ke ntawm Lanpaas cov tsaj kws tseg ca rua Yakhauj tu.
Yakhauj muab tej ceg cev, ceg txiv dluaj, hab ceg seb laws tawv txaij ua tej kaab kuas pum tug txhaa ceg ntoo dlawb paug.
Nwg txhaj muab cov ceg ntoo ntawd coj moog tso rua ntawm lub dlaab dlej kws cov tsaj lug haus dlej. Nwg coj cov ceg ntoo moog tso rua ntawd, rua qhov cov tsaj sis phuv thaus puab lug haus dlej ua ke.
Yog le ntawd, thaus cov tshis lug sis phuv rua ntawm cov ceg ntoo ntawd, cov tshis txawm yug tau cov mivnyuas txaij ua tej kaab hab txaij ua tej teev.

Yakhauj txawm muab cov mivnyuas yaaj hab mivnyuas tshis kws txaij cais tawm ntawm cov maum laug hab muab cov maum laug tso tig taubhau rua tom Lanpaas cov tsaj kws txaij hab dlub. Qhov kws nwg ua le nuav, tub yog nwg faib kuas nwg muaj nwg ib paab tsaj ua nwg tug hab muab cais tawm ntawm Lanpaas cov moog rua ib qho.

Thaus cov tsaj kws zoo hab khov kho sis phuv, Yakhauj muab cov ceg ntoo ntawd coj moog tso rua ntawm lub dlaab dlej, qhov chaw kws cov tsaj lug haus dlej, kuas cov tsaj lug sis phuv nyob ntawm cov ceg ntoo ntawd.

Tabsis nwg tsi muab cov ceg ntoo ntawd tso rua ntawm dlaab dlej thaus cov tsaj kws tsi khov lug haus dlej. Txij ntawd lug Lanpaas txhaj tau cov tsaj kws tsi khov lawm xwb, tabsis cov tsaj kws khov puavleej yog Yakhauj cov.
Tub yog vim ua le nuav Yakhauj txhaj npluanuj. Nwg muaj tsaj txhu, tubqhe, ntxhuav hab neeg luav coob heev.
Yakhauj nov Lanpaas cov tub has tas, “Yakhauj tau muab txhua yaam kws yog peb txiv le tug coj moog taag huv tuabsi lawm. Nwg muaj txag npluanuj tub yog tau lug ntawm peb txiv nkaus xwb.”
Hab nwg paub has tas, Lanpaas tsi nrug nwg sis raug zoo le ibtxwm muaj yaav taag lug lawm.
Ces tug TSWV txhaj has rua Yakhauj has tas, “Koj ca le rov qaab moog rua tim koj txiv hab koj cov kwvtij lub tebchaws. Kuv yuav nrug nraim koj.”
Yog le ntawd, Yakhauj txhaj tso tuabneeg moog has rua Laxees hab Le-as, kuas obtug tuaj ntsib nwg rua tom teb kws yog qhov chaw cov tsaj nyob.
Nwg txhaj has rua obtug tas, “Kuv paub lawm has tas, meb txiv tsi nrug kuv sis raug zoo le ibtxwm kws nwg ua rua kuv lug lawm, tabsis kuv txiv tug Vaajtswv yeej ibtxwm nrug nraim kuv.
Meb yeej paub zoo lawm has tas, kuv rau sab ntso ua num rua meb txiv kawg kuv tug dlaag tug zug le.
Txawm yog kuv tub ua npaum le ntawd los nwg tseem nyag hab hloov txu kuv tej nqe zug kaum zag lawm. Tabsis Vaajtswv tsi pub nwg ua phem rua kuv.

Thaus kws Lanpaas has tas, ‘Muab cov tshis kws txaij tej teev ua nqe zug rua koj,’ ces cov tsaj txawm yug tau mivnyuas txaij taagnrho. Thaus nwg has tas, ‘Muab cov tshis kws txaij tej kaab ua nqe zug rua koj,’ ces cov tsaj txawm yug tau mivnyuas txaij ua tej kaab taagnrho.
Vaajtswv tau muab cov tsaj ntawd tshem tawm ntawm meb txiv hab coj lug rua kuv.
“Thaus txug caij kws cov tsaj sis phuv kuv txawm ua ib zaaj npau suav, kuv pum cov laug tshis kws taabtom phuv maum ntawd yog cov txaij ua tej teev hab txaij ua tej kaab.
Vaajtswv ib tug timtswv lug has rua kuv huv zaaj npau suav ntawd has tas, ‘Yakhauj!’ Kuv teb has tas, ‘Kuv nyob ntawm nuav.’

Nwg has ntxiv tas, ‘Koj saib maj cov laug tshis kws taabtom phuv maum ntawd puavleej yog cov txaij ua tej teev hab txaij ua tej kaab xwb. Kuv taabtom ua kuas muaj tej nuav tshwmsim lug, rua qhov kuv pum tej kws Lanpaas ua tsi zoo rua koj.

Kuv yog tug Vaajtswv kws lug tshwm rua koj pum nraag Npethees, ntawm thaaj chaw kws koj muab lub pobzeb lug teeb ua chaw ncu txug kws koj muab roj txiv ntoo laub rua sau ua khoom fij hab yog thaaj chaw kws koj coglug rua kuv ntaag. Nwgnuav koj ca le npaaj kuas txhij hab rov qaab moog rua nraag lub tebchaws kws yug koj.’ ”
Laxees hab Le-as teb Yakhauj has tas, “Wb yeej tsi tshuav ib yaam qubtxeeg qubteg kws wb txiv tseg rua wb nyob huv wb txiv tsev le.
Nwg saib wb ib yaam le yog tuabneeg txawv tebchaws xwb. Nwg muab wb muag, hab nwgnuav nwg muab tej nyaj kws yog wb tej nqe ntawd siv taag huv tuabsi lawm.
Txhua yaam kws Vaajtswv muab ntawm wb txiv lug lawm, puavleej yog peb hab peb tej mivnyuas tug lawm. Koj ca le ua lawv le tug TSWV tau has rua koj lawm.”

Yog le ntawd, Yakhauj txhaj sawbsim txhij hab rov qaab moog cuag nwg txiv rua nraag tebchaws Kana-aas. Nwg muab nwg cov mivnyuas hab nwg ob tug quaspuj tsaws caij sau cov ntxhuav nrausqaum, hab lawv taagnrho nwg cov tsaj moog ua nwg ntej, hab coj txhua yaam kws nwg khwv tau huv tebchaws Mexuputamias lug.
Lanpaas taabtom moog txav plaub yaaj lawm, ces thaus kws nwg tsi nyob huv tsev lawm, Laxees txawm moog nyag tau nwg txiv cov mlom zuv tsev coj moog lawm.
Yakhauj nyag kev tsiv ntsag tu tsi qha rua Lanpaas paub has tas nwg tsiv moog lawm.
Yakhauj coj txhua yaam kws yog nwg tug hab maaj ceev nrooj moog hlaa tug Dlej Efalates hab taug kev moog rua tim lub laaj roob Nkile-as lawm.
Tau peb nub tom qaab muaj tuabneeg moog qha rua Lanpaas paub has tas, Yakhauj tub tsiv lawm.
Nwg txhaj txhij nwg cov tuabneeg nrug nwg moog caum Yakhauj qaab tau xyaa nub, puab txhaj caum cuag Yakhauj rua ntawm lub roob Nkile-as.
Mo ntawd Vaajtswv lug has rua Lanpaas huv nruab npau suav has tas, “Koj ceevfaaj tsi xob moog thaab Yakhauj hlo le.”
Yakhauj txhaj tsaa tsevntaub su sau laaj roob, Lanpaas hab nwg cov tuabneeg kuj tsaa tsevntaub su rua sau lub roob Nkile-as ntawd hab.
Lanpaas has rua Yakhauj has tas, “Vim le caag koj nyag kev tsiv tawm ntawm kuv hab coj kuv ob tug ntxhais tsiv ib yaam le tej quaspuj kws luas nteg tau huv tshaav rog lug?
Vim le caag koj ua sab dlub nyag kev tsiv ntsag tu tsi qha rua kuv paub? Yog koj qha kuv paub, kuv yuav xaa koj sawv kev lug ntawm kev zoo sab nrug tej suab hu nkauj lomzem hab nkauj nogncaas.
Koj txawm tsi pub kuv nwj kuv cov xeebntxwv hab kuv ob tug ntxhais ua kev sis ncaim le. Qhov kws koj ua taag lug ntawd mas yog ruag kawg nkaus le!
Kuv muaj cuabkaav yuav ua rua koj raug kev puamtsuaj tau, tabsis naag mo koj txiv tug Vaajtswv lug txwv tsi pub kuv ua le caag rua koj hlo le.
Kuv paub qhov kws koj tsiv, rua qhov koj maaj rov qaab moog txug tsev heev, tabsis vim le caag koj nyag kuv cov mlom lug lawm hab?”
Yakhauj teb has tas, “Rua qhov kuv ntshai nyob tsaam koj coj koj ob tug ntxhais tsiv tawm ntawm kuv moog, mas kuv txhaj tsi qha rua koj.

Tabsis yog koj nrhav tau peb cov ntawm nuav leejtwg tau coj koj cov mlom lug lawm, ca le muab tug ntawd tua povtseg. Peb cov tuabneeg puavleej nyob ntawm nuav nrug ua timkhawv, tshawb txhua yaam kws yog koj tug nqaa huv tuabsi rov qaab moog.” Yakhauj tsi paub has tas, Laxees yog tug nyag Lanpaas cov mlom ntawd lug.

Lanpaas txhaj moog tshawb huv Yakhauj tej tsevntaub taag, ces nwg maam moog tshawb huv Le-as lub tsevntaub, hab huv ob tug ntxhais qhev ob lub tsevntaub, tabsis nwg nrhav tsi tau nwg cov mlom ntawd le. Ces nwg maam moog tshawb huv Laxees lub tsevntaub.

Laxees yeej tau muab cov mlom kws zuv tsev ntawd hab nwg muab qhwv ntsaws rua huv lub nraa ntxhuav hab nwg nyob quastsawg sau. Lanpaas moog tshawb thoob plawg huv cov tsevntaub, tabsis nwg nrhav tsi pum cov mlom ntawd le.

Laxees has rua nwg txiv tas, “Txiv, thov koj tsi xob chim rua kuv, qhov kws kuv tsi muaj cuabkaav lug sawv ntawm koj xubndlag, tub yog kuv taabtom coj khaub dluag.” Lanpaas nrhav kawg, tabsis tsi pum nwg cov mlom ntawd le.

Yakhauj chim heev tswj tsi tau nwg lub sab le lawm. Nwg txhaj nug npautawg vog has tas, “Kuv tau ua txhum koj dlaabtsi? Kuv tau ua txhum txuj cai twg txhaj ua rua koj muaj cai tuaj caum kuv txug qhov nuav?

Nwgnuav koj tub tshawb taag kuv tej khoom huv tuabsi lawm, koj puas pum muaj ib yaam khoom twg kws yog koj le? Ca le muab rhu tawm lug tso taabmeeg rua koj cov tuabneeg hab kuv cov tuabneeg pum, hab ca puab txav txim rua wb ob tug nuav saib leejtwg txhaj ua yog.
Kuv nrug koj nyob tau neeg nkaum xyoo, ua rua koj tej yaaj tej tshis fuamvaam tsi tu ncua, hab kuv yeej tsi tau tua koj tej yaaj ib tug noj le.

Thaus kws ib tug yaaj twg raug tsaj qus tum lawm, kuv yeej them tug ntawd huv tuabsi rua koj. Kuv tsi tau coj lug qha rua koj rua qhov tsi yog tim kuv. Koj tseem yuam kuas kuv them tej tsaj kws tubsaab nyag nruab nub hab mo ntuj lawm huv tuabsi rua koj.
Ntau zag kuv tiv tshaav ntuj kub thaus nruab nub hab tiv no thaus tsaus ntuj. Kuv tsi tau zoo pw tsaug zug hlo le.

Yeej zoo le nuav lug tau neeg nkaum xyoo kws kuv nrug koj nyob. Kuv ua num kaum plaub xyoo lug pauv koj ob tug ntxhais, hab rau xyoo lug tu koj cov tsaj nkaus xwb. Ua npaum le ntawd los koj tseem hloov hab txu kuv tej nqe zug kaum zag lawm.

Yog kuv txiv tug Vaajtswv, Anplahaas hab Ixaj tug Vaajtswv, tsi nrug nraim kuv nyob, ntshai koj tub muab kuv xaa rov qaab teg dlawb teg nplag lawm. Tabsis Vaajtswv pum kuv tej kev nyuaj sab hab tej num kws kuv tau ua taag lug lawm, naag mo nwg txhaj tau lug txav txim.”

Lanpaas teb Yakhauj has tas, “Ob tug ntxhais nuav yog kuv ob tug, obtug cov mivnyuas los yeej yog kuv tug, hab tej tsaj nuav los puavleej yog kuv le. Txhua yaam kws koj qhovmuag pum ntawm nuav puavleej yog kuv tug. Tabsis nub nua kuv yuav ua caag taav tau kuv ob tug ntxhais hab obtug cov mivnyuas kev,
kuv txhaj npaaj sab yuav nrug koj sis has kuas hum xwb. Ca wb khaws pobzeb lug teeb ua ib qhov chaw ncu txug wb cov lug cog tseg nuav.”
Yog le ntawd, Yakhauj txhaj khaws tau ib cov pobzeb lug teeb ca ua lub cim ncu txug.
Yakhauj txhaj has kuas nwg cov tuabneeg moog khaws pobzeb lug teeb ua ib pawg ca. Ces puab txawm rau mov noj ua ke nyob ntawd pawg pobzeb ntawd ib saab.
Yog le ntawd, Lanpaas txhaj tis npe rua pawg pobzeb ntawd hu ua Yenkas Xahaduthas,  tabsis Yakhauj tis npe rua pawg pobzeb ntawd hu ua Nkale-es.
Lanpaas has rua Yakhauj has tas, “Pawg pobzeb nuav yuav ua lub cim ncu txug wb tej lug cog tseg.” Tub yog vim le nuav txhaj tis npe rua thaaj chaw ntawd hu ua Nkale-es.
Lanpaas has ntxiv tas, “Thov kuas tug TSWV tsomkwm wb thaus wb sis ncaim ib leeg moog nyob rua ib qho lawm.” Yog le ntawd, txhaj muab thaaj chaw ntawd tis npe hu ua Mixepas.

Lanpaas tseem has ntxiv tas, “Yog koj tsimtxom kuv ob tug ntxhais lossis moog yuav nam yau, txawm yog kuv tsi paub txug tej kws koj ua ntawd los xij, kuas koj ncu ntsoov has tas Vaajtswv yeej saib ntsoov wb ob leeg huv tuabsi.
Ntawm nuav yog cov pobzeb kws kuv sau lug teeb nruab nraab ntawm koj hab kuv, hab ntawm nuav yog tug ncej zeb kws ua lub cim coglug tseg ca.

Pawg pobzeb hab tug ncej zeb nuav, yog ua lub cim kws ncu ntsoov ca. Kuv yuav tsi hlaa pawg pobzeb nuav tuaj tua koj, hab koj yuav tsi hlaa pawg pobzeb nuav lossis tug nce zeb kws yog lub cim ncu txug nuav tuaj tua kuv le.
Ca Anplahaas tug Vaajtswv hab Nahaus  tug Vaajtswv ua tug txav txim rua wb ob leeg huv tuabsi.” Ces Yakhauj txhaj tuav Vaajtswv tug kws nwg txiv Ixaj pehawm lub npe coglug tseg.

Yakhauj txhaj muab ib tug tsaj lug tua fij rua sau lub roob ntawd, hab nwg caw taagnrho nwg cov tuabneeg lug noj. Tom qaab kws puab noj mov taag lawm, puab tseem rov pw ib mos sau lub roob ntawd ntxiv hab.
Nub tom qaab thaus sawv ntxuv Lanpaas txhaj moog nwj nwg cov xeebntxwv hab nwg ob tug ntxhais hab foom koob moov rua puab taag, ces nwg txawm ncaim puab rov qaab moog tsev lawm.
Thaus Yakhauj taabtom taug kev lug, cov timtswv sau ntuj lug ntsib nwg.
Thaus Yakhauj pum cov timtswv ntawd nwg has tas, “Ntawm nuav yog Vaajtswv lub yeej”, yog le ntawd, Yakhauj txhaj tis npe rua thaaj chaw ntawd hu ua Mahana-ees.
Yakhauj tso tuabneeg ua nwg ntej moog has rua nwg tug tijlaug Exaus kws nyob huv tebchaws Edoos.

Nwg kuas cov xaa xuv moog has le nuav rua Exaus: “Kuv yog Yakhauj, yog koj tug tubkhai kws noog lug, thov has rua kuv tug tswv Exaus paub has tas, kuv moog nrug Lanpaas nyob tau ntev loo hab taamsim nuav kuv taabtom rov qaab lug lawm.
Kuv muaj nyuj, neeg luav, yaaj, tshis, hab qhev coob heev. Kuv muaj lug le nuav lug thov koj kws yog tug tswv, kuv ca sab ntsoov has tas koj yuav txaus sab rua kuv.”

Thaus cov tuabneeg kws xaa xuv rov qaab lug cuag Yakhauj, puab has tas, “Peb tub moog cuag koj tug tijlaug Exaus taag lawm, nwg taabtom npaaj sawv kev tuaj tog koj lawm ntaag. Nwg coj tau plaub puas leej tuabneeg nrug nwg tuaj.”
Yakhauj ntshai heev hab nyuaj sab kawg le. Nwg txhaj muab nwg cov tuabneeg faib kag ua ob paab, nwg tseem muab nwg cov yaaj, tshis, nyuj hab ntxhuav faib ua ob paab hab.
Nwg xaav has tas, “Yog Exaus tuaj tua paab ua ntej los kuas paab ua qaab tsiv tau dlim.”

Yakhauj txhaj thov Vaajtswv has tas, “Kuv yawmkoob Anplahaas tug Vaajtswv hab kuv txiv Ixaj tug Vaajtswv, thov koj noog kuv tej lug thov lauj! Tug TSWV, koj has kuas kuv rov qaab moog lawm nraag kuv lub tebchaws hab kuv cov kwvtij, hab koj yuav pub kev tau zoo rua kuv.

Tub tsi tsimnyog koj hlub hab ua ncaaj nceeg rua kuv kws yog koj tug tubkhai hlo le. Thaus kuv hlaa tug dlej Yauladees tuaj, kuv tsi muaj dlaabtsi le, tsuas muaj tuab tug paas nreg xwb, tabsis nwgnuav muaj ob paab tuabneeg hab ob paab tsaj coob kawg nrug kuv rov qaab lug.

Kuv thov koj paab kuas kuv dlim ntawm kuv tug tijlaug Exaus lauj. Kuv ntshai heev, kuv ntshai nyob tsaam nwg tuaj tua peb hab ua rua peb raug kev puamtsuaj, tsi has tej quaspuj hab mivnyuas huv tuabsi.
Thov koj ncu ntsoov tej lug kws koj cog tseg has tas, koj yuav pub kev tau zoo rua kuv hab pub kuas kuv muaj xeebntxwv coob suav tsi txheeb, ib yaam le tej xuabzeb nraag ntug havtxwv.”
Nwg txhaj pw ib mos ntawm thaaj chaw ntawd, hab nwg txhaj xaiv tej tsaj kws nwg muaj ibtxha coj moog pub rua nwg tug tijlaug Exaus le nuav:
Ob puas tug maum tshis hab neeg nkaum tug laug tshis, ob puas tug maum yaaj hab neeg nkaum tug laug yaaj,
peb caug tug maum ntxhuav nrug cov mivnyuas kws tseem mog, plaub caug tug maum nyuj hab kaum tug txiv nyuj, neeg nkaum tug maum neeg luav hab kaum tug txiv neeg luav.
Nwg muab cov tsaj ntawd faib ua tej paab hab nwg kuas nwg cov tubkhai ib leeg moog saib ib paab. Nwg has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le moog ua kuv ntej, ib paab moog kuas nrug ib paab dleb tsawv.”

Nwg has rua thawj tug tubkhai has tas, “Thaus twg yog kuv tug tijlaug Exaus tuaj ntsib koj hab nwg nug has tas, ‘Koj tug tswv yog leejtwg? Koj yuav moog qhov twg? Leejtwg yog tug tswv cov tsaj kws ua koj ntej nuav?’
Koj yuavtsum teb has tas, ‘Cov tsaj nuav yog koj tug tubkhai Yakhauj le. Nwg kuas coj cov tsaj nuav lug pub rua Exaus kws yog nwg tug tswv. Yakhauj tseem taabtom lug ua peb qaab.’ ”
Yakhauj has rua tug tubkhai ob hab tug tubkhai peb hab txhua tug kws nwg tsaa lug saib nwg cov tsaj ntawd ib yaam nkaus has tas: “Thaus mej ntsib Exaus mej yuavtsum has tej lug nuav rua nwg.

Mej yuavtsum has tas, ‘Yakhauj kws yog koj tug tubkhai tseem ua peb qaab.’ ” Yakhauj xaav has tas, “Kuv tub muab kuv tej tsaj xaa ua ntej moog pub rua nwg lawm, ces thaus kuv moog ntsib nwg, nyaj nwg yuav zaam txim rua kuv.”
Yakhauj xaa tej khoom pub ntawd moog ua ntej, tabsis nwg tseem rov pw ib mos ntawm lub yeej ntawd.
Mo ntawd Yakhauj sawv coj nwg ob tug quaspuj, nwg ob tug nam yau, hab nwg kaum ib leeg mivnyuas moog hlaa tug Dlej Yanpaus.
Thaus nwg xaa quaspuj mivnyuas hlaa dlhau dlej taag, nwg maam muab tej khoom kws yog nwg tug xaa rua saab dlej tim u huv tuabsi hab,
tabsis Yakhauj tuab leeg tseem nyob tom qaab. Ces txawm muaj ib tug txivneej lug nrug Yakhauj sis qhau moog txug thaus kaaj ntug txoog.
Thaus tug txivneej ntawd pum has tas, nwg yuav qhau tsi yeej Yakhauj, nwg txhaj ntaus Yakhauj lub ntsaag ua rua Yakhauj lub pob qej txhaa pluam plhuav.
Tug txivneej ntawm has tas, “Nub tub yuav tawm, koj ca le tso kuv moog.” Yakhauj teb has tas, “Kuv yuav tsi tso koj moog txug thaus koj foom koob moov rua kuv tsaiv.”
Tug txivneej ntawm nug Yakhauj has tas, “Koj npe hu le caag?” Nwg teb has tas, “Kuv npe hu ua Yakhauj.”

Tug txivneej ntawd has tas, “Koj lub npe yuav tsi hu ua Yakhauj ntxiv lawm. Rua qhov koj muaj peevxwm nrug Vaajtswv hab nrug tuabneeg sis qhau, hab ua rua koj yeej lawm. Yog le ntawd, yuav muab koj lub npe tis hu ua Yixalayees.”
Yakhauj has tas, “Thov koj qha koj lub npe rua kuv.” Tabsis nwg teb Yakhauj has tas, “Vim le caag koj xaav paub kuv lub npe?” Ces nwg txawm foom koob moov rua Yakhauj.
Yakhauj has tas, “Kuv tub pum Vaajtswv tim ntsej tim muag lawm, tabsis kuv tseem muaj sa nyob.” Yog le ntawd, Yakhauj txhaj tis npe rua thaaj chaw ntawd hu ua Peniyees.
Thaus nub tawm tuaj Yakhauj txhaj sawv kev huv Peniyees moog lawm, hab nwg moog kev cegtawv pluav, rua qhov mob nwg lub ntsaag heev.
Txawm yog naj nub nwgnuav los Yixalayees cov xeebntxwv yeej tsi noj thooj nqaj ntawm lub ntsaag ntawd hlo le, rua qhov Vaajtswv ntaus Yakhauj lub ntsaag lawm.
Thaus Yakhauj pum Exaus hab plaub puas leej kws nrug Exaus ua ke tuaj, nwg txawm muab nwg cov mivnyuas faib rua Le-as, Laxees hab rua ob tug nam yau.
Nwg tso ob tug nam yau hab obtug cov mivnyuas moog ua ntej, tso Le-as hab nwg cov mivnyuas tuaj nruab nraab, ces maam tso Laxees hab Yauxej tuaj tom qaab kawg.
Yakhauj moog ua puab ntej hab nwg txhus caug ndlua huv aav pe xyaa pes moog ti nkaus ntawm nwg tug tijlaug.
Tabsis Exaus dlha ceev nrooj moog cuag Yakhauj, puag nkaus hab nwj nwg. Obtug ob kwvtij sis qawg quaj.

Thaus Exaus tsaa muag xaam nwg pum dlheev cov quaspuj hab cov mivnyuas ntawd, nwg txawm nug has tas, “Cov tuabneeg kws nrug koj lug nuav yog leejtwg?” Yakhauj teb has tas, “Tijlaug, cov mivnyuas nuav yog Vaajtswv tug kws ibtxwm ua zoo kawg nkaus, pub rua kuv.”
Ces ob tug nam yau nrug obtug cov mivnyuas txaav zog lug hab txhus caug ndlua pe,
Le-as hab nwg cov mivnyuas maam lug, hab thaus kawg Yauxej hab Laxees maam le txaav lug hab txhus caug ndlua pe.
Exaus rov nug has tas, “Ua le paab kws kuv xub tuaj ntsib ne? Paab ntawd yog leejtwg paab hab?” Yakhauj teb has tas, “Paab ntawd yog kuv muab rua koj, thov koj hlub kuv.”
Tabsis Exaus has tas, “Kuv tug kwv, kuv tub muaj txaus kuv lawm, ca le ceev tej ntawd rua koj xwb.”

Yakhauj has tas, “Tijlaug, yog koj txaus sab rua kuv thov koj ca le yuav tsi xob yig, ca le txais tej kws kuv muab pub rua koj lawm. Kuv tau rov lug pum koj mas zoo kuv sab npaum nkaus le kuv pum Vaajtswv ntaag, rua qhov nwgnuav koj ua zoo kawg nkaus rua kuv.

Thov koj ca le yuav tej kws kuv muab pub rua koj ntawd, Vaajtswv hlub kuv hab nwg pub txhua tsaav yaam kws kuv xaav yuav rua kuv.” Yakhauj has tej lug mog lug muas thov moog txug thaus Exaus leeg yuav lawm.
Exaus has tas, “Peb ca le npaaj hab sawv kev moog. Kuv yuav ua tug coj mej kev moog.”

Yakhauj teb has tas, “Tijlaug, koj yeej paub has tas kuv cov mivnyuas tseem yau moog tsi taug ceev, hab kuv txhawj kuv tej yaaj hab tej tsaj txhu kws muaj mivnyuas mog. Yog peb yuav moog ceev nrooj, ntshai moog ib nub xwb kuv tej tsaj yuav tuag taag.

Thov ca koj ua kuv ntej moog, hab kuv yuav maam maam lawv koj qaab lug, kuv tej tsaj txhu hab kuv cov mivnyuas moog taug le caag kuv yuav moog le ntawd, txug thaus kuv lug cuag tau koj huv tebchaws Edoos.”

Exaus has tas, “Yog le ntawd, kuv maam le ca kuv cov tuabneeg ob peb leeg nrug koj.” Tabsis Yakhauj teb has tas, “Tijlaug, tsi taag koj yuav tso tuabneeg paab kuv, tsuav yog koj txaus sab rua kuv xwb ces tau lawm.”
Yog le ntawd, nub ntawd Exaus txhaj sawv kev ua ntej rov lug rua tebchaws Edoos lawm.
Tabsis thaus Yakhauj moog txug ntawm Xukaus, nwg txawm ua tsev rua nwg nyob hab ua nkuaj kaw nwg cov tsaj rua ntawd. Tub yog vim le nuav txhaj muab thaaj chaw ntawd tis npe hu ua Xukaus.

Yakhauj rov qaab tim tebchaws Mexuputamias lug txug rua huv lub nroog Sekhees kws nyob huv tebchaws Kana-aas tsi ntsib kev nyuaj sab dlaabtsi, hab nwg moog ua zog nyob ze rua ntawm ntug nroog Sekhees.
Nwg muab tau ib puas dlaim nyaj yuav tau ib thaaj aav ntawm Sekhees txiv Hamaules cov xeebntxwv.
Yakhauj txhaj teeb tau ib lub thaaj rua ntawd hab tis npe hu ua Ees lawv le cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv lub npe.
Muaj ib nub Yakhauj hab Le-as obtug tug ntxhais Dinas txawm tawm moog saib cov tuabneeg Kana-aas tej quaspuj.
Hamaules kws yog tuabneeg Hivis kws yog tug thawj saib cheebtsaam ntawd, thaus Hamaules tug tub Sekhees pum Dinas, nwg txawm tuaj coj Dinas moog hab muab Dinas yuam.
Rua qhov Sekhees pum Dinas zoo nkauj heev, nwg txhaj ua zaaj ua ntxeev ntxag kuas tau Dinas yuav.
Sekhees txhaj has rua nwg txiv has tas, “Txiv, kuv xaav kuas koj moog yuav tug ntxhais ntawd lug ua kuv tug quaspuj.”
Yakhauj paub has tas nwg tug ntxhais raug kev txaajmuag, tabsis vim nwg cov tub moog yug tsaj rua nraag teb lawm, nwg txhaj tsi has ib yaam dlaabtsi txug thaus nwg cov tub lug tsev txhij.
Hamaules kws yog Sekhees txiv txhaj tuaj thov Yakhauj,

tawm thawj thaus Yakhauj cov tub rov nraag teb lug txug tsev. Thaus puab nov dlheev txug zaaj nuav, ua rua puab mob sab hab chim heev rua qhov Sekhees tau ua saib tsi taug cov tuabneeg Yixalayees kws yog nwg muab Yakhauj tug ntxhais yuam le ntawd.
Hamaules has rua Yakhauj has tas, “Kuv tug tub Sekhees nyam koj tug ntxhais heev le lawm, thov ca nwg yuav koj tug ntxhais ua nwg tug quaspuj.
Thov ca peb lug sis coglug, kuas mej hab peb tsaav tuabneeg txhaj muaj kev txis tshoob txis kug rua peb tej mivnyuas.
Ces mej txhaj tau nrug peb nyob huv peb lub tebchaws nuav. Mej yuav nyob thaaj chaw twg los nyob ntawm mej nyam, tso kev laag luam, hab muaj ndlag tug kuas ywjpheej rua mej.”
Ces Sekhees has rua Dinas txiv hab nwg cov nug has tas, “Thov mej ua zoo rua kuv, hab kuv yuav muab txhua yaam kws mej xaav tau rua mej.

Thov qha yaam kws mej xaav yuav rua kuv, hab ca le has nqe tshoob kuas ntau npaum le mej xaav sau, mej xaav kuas them npaum twg los kuv yuav them npaum ntawd rua mej, tsuav yog mej kaam muab mej tug muam rua kuv yuav ua quaspuj xwb.”
Vim qhov kws Sekhees tau ua rua puab tug muam Dinas raug kev txaajmuag, Yakhauj cov tub txhaj teb dlaag ntsuav rua Sekhees hab Hamaules obtug.
Puab has rua Sekhees has tas, “Peb tsi pum zoo ca peb tug muam moog yuav ib tug txivneej twg kws tsi tau ua kevcai txav tawv le, yog ua le ntawd mas rhuav peb ntsejmuag heev.
Tsuas muaj tuab qho kws mej ua lawv le peb ua xwb, mej txhua tug txivneej yuavtsum tau ua kevcai txav tawv ib yaam le peb ua huv tuabsi,
ces peb txhaj paub nrug mej ua tshoob ua kug. Peb txhaj yuav nrug mej nyob tau ua ke hab peb txhaj yuav nrug mej ua tau ib tsaav tuabneeg.
Tabsis yog mej tsi leeg ua lawv le peb has hab ua kevcai txav, peb yuav coj peb tug muam lug hab tsiv tawm huv tebchaws nuav moog.”
Hamaules hab nwg tug tub Sekhees pum zoo yuav lawv le puab has ntawd,
ces tug tub hluas txawm maaj nrooj ua lawv le puab tau has ntawd, rua qhov nwg nyam Yakhauj tug ntxhais heev. Sekhees kuj yog ib tug kws muaj meejmom huv nwg tsev tuabneeg.
Hamaules hab nwg tug tub Sekhees txhaj moog rua tim qhov chaw saablaaj kws nyob tim roojvaag nroog hab has rua cov pejxeem huv lub nroog has tas:

“Cov tuabneeg nuav nrug peb sis raug zoo heev, ca puab nrug peb nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav hab ca puab moog lug ywj sab. Lub tebchaws los kuj dlaav txaus puab nyob hab. Ca peb tej tub moog yuav puab tej ntxhais hab puab tej tub tuaj yuav peb tej ntxhais.
Puab yeej zoo sab nrug peb nyob hab nrug peb koom ua ib tsaav tuabneeg, tabsis muaj ib txuj cai kws peb yuavtsum tau ua, yog peb txhua tug txivneej yuavtsum tau ua kevcai txav tawv le puab.
Mej puas xaav tau puab tej tsaj txhu hab tej khoom kws yog puab le lug ua peb tug? Yog mej xaav tau, ca le leeg yuav puab txuj cai hab ca puab nrug peb nyob.”
Taagnrho cov pejxeem suavdlawg puavleej pum zoo yuav hab ua lawv le Hamaules hab Sekhees has ntawd, txhua tug txivneej txhaj ua kevcai txav tawv taagnrho.

Tau peb nub tom qaab kws cov txivneej ua kevcai txav tawv ntawd tej nqaj tseem mob, Yakhauj ob tug tub: Xime-oos hab Levis kws yog Dinas ob tug nug, txawm nqaa obtug ob raab ntaaj nyag kev tuabywv moog rua huv nroog, hab muab cov txivneej huv tua tuag taag,
nrug rua Hamaules hab nwg tug tub Sekhees huv tuabsi. Ces obtug txhaj coj Dinas huv Sekhees tsev tawm lug lawm.
Tom qaab kws Xime-oos hab Levis obtug muab cov tuabneeg ntawd tua tuag taag lawm, Yakhauj cov tub tseem moog fuab lub nroog ua pauj qhov kws puab tug muam raug txaajmuag ntawd.
Puab caab taagnrho tej tsaj txhu, nyuj, neeg luav hab muab txhua yaam khoom kws nyob huv nroog hab huv tej teb nqaa huv tuabsi moog lawm.
Puab coj txhua yaam kws muaj nqes, nteg tej quaspuj hab mivnyuas, hab nqaa txhua yaam kws nyob huv puab tej vaaj tse huv tuabsi lawm hab.

Yakhauj has rua Xime-oos hab Levis has tas, “Meb ua rua kuv tau kev ntxhuv sab lawm, taamsim nuav cov tuabneeg Kana-aas hab cov tuabneeg Pelixes, hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tebchaws nuav yuav ntxub kuv heev. Kuv tsi muaj tuabneeg coob, yog puab sis sau tuaj tawmtsaam hab tua kuv, mas peb tsev tuabneeg yuav raug kev puamtsuaj taag le.”
Tabsis obtug teb has tas, “Yuav ca Sekhees coj wb tug muam moog ntxag zoo le tug namndlav los?”

Vaajtswv has rua Yakhauj has tas, “Koj ca le moog nyob peg Npethees. Hab koj ca le teeb ib lub thaaj rua kuv, kuv yog Vaajtswv tug kws tshwm rua koj pum thaus koj tsiv koj tug tijlaug Exaus moog ntaag.”

Yog le ntawd, Yakhauj txhaj has rua nwg tsev tuabneeg hab taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws nrug nwg nyob ntawd has tas, “Mej ca le muab cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws tej vaajtswv kws mej muaj coj moog povtseg, ua kevcai ntxuav mej kuas huv hab naav tej rig tsho kws ntxhua huv si lawm.

Peb yuav sawv kev ntawm nuav moog rua peg lub nroog Npethees, qhov chaw kws kuv yuav teeb ib lub thaaj rua Vaajtswv tug kws tau paab kuv thaus kuv raug kev txomnyem nyuaj sab, hab yog tug kws nrug nraim kuv txhua qhov kws kuv moog.”

Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj muab taagnrho cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws tej vaajtswv kws puab muaj hab puab tej qhws ntsej kws puab coj ntawm qhovntsej huv tuabsi rua Yakhauj. Yakhauj txhaj coj moog faus rua ntawm qaab tsob ntoo qheb kws nyob ze lub nroog Sekhees.

Thaus Yakhauj hab nwg cov tub taabtom sawv kev moog, Vaajtswv txawm ua ib yaam txaus ntshai heev lug rua cov tuabneeg huv tej nroog kws nyob puagncig puab. Cov tuabneeg huv tej nroog ntawd txhaj tsi kaam moog caum Yakhauj puab qaab.
Yakhauj hab nwg cov tuabneeg lug txug huv lub zog Luxes kws nwgnuav yog lub nroog Npethees, huv tebchaws Kana-aas.

Nyob qhov ntawd, Yakhauj teeb tau ib lub thaaj hab nwg tis npe rua thaaj chaw ntawd hu ua Ees Npethees,  rua qhov Vaajtswv tau lug tshwm rua Yakhauj pum thaus Yakhauj tsiv nwg tug tijlaug moog txug ntawm qhov chaw ntawd.

Lenpekas tug ntxhais qhev Denpaulas tuag hab puab muab log rua huv qaab ib tsob ntoo qheb kws nyob ntawm lub nroog Npethees saab nraag. Yog le ntawd, txhaj muab tsob ntoo qheb ntawd tis npe hu ua, “Tsob Ntoo Qheb Quaj Ntsuag.”
Thaus Yakhauj rov huv tebchaws Mexuputamias lug, Vaajtswv rov lug tshwm rua Yakhauj pum dlua ib zag ntxiv, hab foom koob moov rua nwg.
Vaajtswv has rua nwg has tas, “Koj lub npe hu ua Yakhauj, tabsis txij nuav moog koj lub npe yuav hu ua Yixalayees.” Yog le ntawd, Vaajtswv txhaj tis Yakhauj lub npe hu ua Yixalayees.

Hab Vaajtswv rov has rua Yakhauj has tas, “Kuv yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus. Koj ca le muaj tubki kuas fuamvaam coob. Koj cov xeebntxwv yuav dlhau moog ua ntau tsaav tuabneeg, hab koj yuav yog ntau leej vaajntxwv tug yawmkoob.
