Kuv yuav muab lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua Anplahaas hab Ixaj lawm pub rua koj, hab kuv tseem yuav muab rua koj cov xeebntxwv kws nyob ntau tam tom qaab koj.”
Ces Vaajtswv txawm ncaim nwg moog lawm.
Yakhauj txhus tau ib tug ncej zeb ua cim ncu txug rua ntawm qhov chaw kws Vaajtswv lug nrug nwg thaam, nwg muab cawv txiv maab hab roj txiv ntoo laub rua sau tug ncej zeb ntawd fij rua Vaajtswv.
Nwg txhaj tis npe rua thaaj chaw ntawd hu ua Npethees.

Yakhauj hab nwg tsev tuabneeg txawm tawm huv Npethees moog lawm, hab thaus tseem tshuav dleb maam le moog txug rua huv Efalates, Laxees txawm mob plaab txug caij dlaws cev, hab zag nuav nwg yug mivnyuas nyuaj heev.
Thaus Laxees mob plaab yuav yug tug mivnyuas ntawd, tug quaspuj kws paab tu mivnyuas txhaj has rua Laxees has tas, “Laxees, koj tsi xob ntshai, koj yuav tau ib tug tub ntxiv xwb.”
Tabsis thaus Laxees yuav tuag, hab nwg fuas paa yuav tu sav nwg tis tug mivtub ntawd npe hu ua Npee-aunis,  tabsis nwg txiv tis nwg lub npe hu ua Npeenyamees.
Thaus Laxees tuag, puab txhaj muab nwg moog log rua ntawm ib saab ntug kev kws moog rua huv lub zog Efalates kws nwgnuav hu ua lub nroog Npelehees.
Hab Yakhauj txhus ib tug ncej zeb rua sau Laxees lub ntxaa ua cim ncu txug Laxees lub ntxaa lug txug naj nub nua.
Yakhauj sawv kev moog ntxiv hab lug tsuam yeej nyob rua ntawm tug pemthuam Edeles ib saab.

Thaus Yakhauj tawm huv lub tebchaws ntawd moog lawm, Lunpees txawm moog nrug Npilehas kws yog nwg txiv tug nam yau pw. Thaus Yakhauj nov txug zaaj nuav mas nwg chim heev. Yakhauj muaj kaum ob leeg tub.
Le-as cov tub yog Lunpees (Yakhauj tug tub hlub), Xime-oos, Levis, Yudas, Ixakhas hab Xenpuloos.
Laxees cov tub yog Yauxej hab Npeenyamees.
Laxees tug ntxhais qhev Npilehas ob tug tub yog: Daas hab Nathalis.
Le-as tug ntxhais qhev Xilepas cov tub yog, Khas hab Aseles. Cov tub nuav puavleej yug peg tebchaws Mexuputamias.
Yakhauj moog saib nwg txiv Ixaj huv lub nroog Maales kws nyob ze lub nroog Henploos, yog qhov chaw kws Anplahaas hab Ixaj obtug nyob.
Ixaj ua neej nyob tau ib puas yim caum xyoo,
hab tuag thaus nwg muaj noobnyoog laug heev lawm, nwg ob tug tub Exaus hab Yakhauj txhaj coj nwg lub cev moog log.
Ntawm nuav moog yog Exaus cov xeebntxwv kws muaj dlua ib lub npe hu ua Edoos.

Exaus moog yuav cov tuabneeg Kana-aas tej ntxhais lug ua quaspuj: Eloos kws yog tuabneeg Hitis tug ntxhais kws hu ua Adahes, hab Xinpe-oos kws yog tuabneeg Hivis tug tub  Anas tug ntxhais kws hu ua Auhaulinpamas,
hab Yisamayees tug ntxhais Npasemas kws yog Nenpayaus tug muam.
Adahes yug tau Elifas, Npasemas yug tau Le-uyees
hab Auhaulinpamas yug tau Ye-uses, Yalaas hab Kaulas. Taagnrho cov nuav puavleej yog Exaus cov tub kws yug huv lub tebchaws Kana-aas.

Ces Exaus coj nwg cov quaspuj, cov tub, cov ntxhais hab taagnrho nwg tsev tuabneeg, nrug nwg tej tsaj txhu hab txhua yaam kws nwg khwv tau huv tebchaws Kana-aas, tsiv moog nyob rua ib lub tebchaws kws nyob dleb ntawm nwg tug kwv Yakhauj.
Nwg tsiv moog vim lub tebchaws kws nwg hab Yakhauj ibtxwm nyob nqaim rua obtug heev, hab obtug muaj tsaj txhu coob txhaj ua rua obtug nyob tsi tau ua ke.
Yog le ntawd, Exaus (kws yog tuabneeg Edoos) txhaj moog nyob rua peg lub laaj roob kws nyob peg tebchaws Xe-iles lawm.
Ntawm nuav yog Exaus cov xeebntxwv kws yog cov tuabneeg Edoos cov yawmkoob kws nyob peg lub laaj roob peg tebchaws Xe-iles.
Ntawm nuav yog Exaus cov tub tej npe: nwg tug quaspuj kws hu ua Adahes yug tau Elifaxes, hab nwg tug quaspuj kws hu ua Npasemas yug tau Le-uyees.
Elifas cov tub yog: Temaas, Aumas, Xefus, Nkatas, hab Kenaxes.
Exaus tug tub Elifas tseem muaj ib tug nam yau hu ua Teenas. Teenas yug tau ib tug tub hu ua Amalej. Cov nuav puavleej yog Exaus tug quaspuj kws hu ua Adahes cov xeebntxwv.
Le-uyees cov tub yog: Nahas, Zelas, Samas hab Mixexas. Cov nuav puavleej yog Exaus tug quaspuj kws hu ua Npasemas cov xeebntxwv.
Exaus tug quaspuj kws hu ua Auhaulinpamas kws yog Xinpe-oos tug tub  Anas tug ntxhais, yug tau peb tug tub rua Exaus: Ye-uses, Yalaas hab Kaulas.
Ntawm nuav yog cov thawjcoj kws yog Exaus cov xeebntxwv. Exaus tug tub hlub Elifas yog yawmkoob ntawm cov thawjcoj nraag qaab nuav: Temaas, Aumas, Xefaus, Kenaxes,
Kaulas, Nkatas hab Amalej. Cov thawjcoj nuav puavleej yog caajceg lug ntawm Elifas kws nyob huv tebchaws Edoos, hab yog Exaus tug quaspuj kws hu ua Adahes cov xeebntxwv.

Exaus tug tub Le-uyees yog yawmkoob ntawm cov thawjcoj nraag qaab nuav: Nahas, Zelas, Samas hab Mixexas. Cov thawjcoj nuav puavleej yog caajceg lug ntawm Le-uyees kws nyob huv tebchaws Edoos, hab yog Exaus tug quaspuj kws hu ua Npasemas cov xeebntxwv.
Cov thawjcoj nraag qaab nuav, puavleej yog caajceg lug ntawm Exaus tug quaspuj kws hu ua Auhaulinpamas kws yog Anas tug ntxhais: Ye-uses, Yalaas, hab Kaulas.
Taagnrho cov thawjcoj nuav puavleej yog Exaus (kws yog tuabneeg Edoos) cov xeebntxwv.

Ntawm nuav yog Xe-iles kws yog tuabneeg Haulis cov tub, puab yog cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws Edoos hab puab yeej ibtxwm nyob huv cheebtsaam ntawm. Xe-iles cov tub yog: Lautas, Saunpas, Xinpe-oos, Anas,
Disoos, Exeles hab Disaas. Xe-iles cov tub kws nyob huv tebchaws Edoos puavleej yog cov tuabneeg Haulis cov thawjcoj.
Lautas cov tub: yog Haulis hab Hemaas. Teenas yog Lautas tug muam.
Sunpas cov tub: Alevas, Manahas, Enpales, Sefaus, hab Aunas.
Xinpe-oos muaj ob tug tub: Ayihas hab Anas. (Ntawm nuav yog Anas tug kws moog pum lub qhovdlej kub kws nyob tom roob mojsaab qhua, thaus nwg coj nwg txiv cov neeg luav moog noj zaub.)
Anas cov mivnyuas yog: Disoos hab Auhaulinpamas kws yog Anas tug ntxhais.
Disoos cov tub yog: Heedaas, Esenpaas, Ithalaas hab Khelaas.
Exeles cov tub yog: Npihaas, Xavaas, hab Akaas.
Disaas cov tub yog: Uxes hab Alaas.
Cov ntawm nuav yog cov Haulis tej thawjcoj: Lautas, Saunpas, Xinpe-oos, Anas,
Disoos, Exeles hab Disaas. Puab cov nuav puavleej yog cov Haulis cov thawjcoj, lawv le puab muab faib ua tej paab tej pawg, nyob huv lub tebchaws Xe-iles.
Cov nuav yog cov vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws Edoos ua ntej cov Yixalayees muaj vaajntxwv.
Npe-ules tug tub Npelas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Edoos, nwg lub nroog hu ua Dihanpas.
Thaus Npelas tuag lawm, Zelas tug tub Yaunpas kws nyob huv Npauxelas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.
Thaus Yaunpas tuag lawm, Husaas kws nyob huv tebchaws Temaas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.
Thaus Husaas tuag lawm, Npedas tug tub Hadas, (Npedas yog tug moog tua yeej cov tuabneeg Midias huv lub tebchaws Mau-am,) lug ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw. Nwg lub nroog hu ua Avithas.
Thaus Hadas tuag lawm, Xamelas kws nyob huv Malekas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.
Thaus Xamelas tuag lawm, Sa-ules kws nyob huv Lehaunpaus, peg lub hauv dlej Efalates ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.
Thaus Sa-ules tuag lawm, Anpaus tug tub Npa-aas Hanas, ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.

Thaus Anpaus tug tub Npa-aas Hanaas tuag lawm, Hadas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw. Nwg lub nroog hu ua Pa-us, (nwg tug quaspuj hu ua Mehetanpees, yog Matales tug ntxhais hab yog Mexahas tug ntxhais xeebntxwv.)
Cov nuav yog cov thawjcoj kws yog Exaus cov xeebntxwv, lawv le puab caajceg tsev tuabneeg, puab tej chaw nyob, hab puab tej npe: Teenas, Alevas, Yethes,
Auhaulinpamas, Elames, Pinoos,
Kenas, Temaas, Minpaxales,
Makediyees hab Ilames. Cov nuav puavleej yog cov tuabneeg Edoos cov thawjcoj.
Yakhauj tseem nyob huv tebchaws Kana-aas kws nwg txiv ibtxwm nyob thaus u lug lawm.

Zaaj nuav yog has txug Yakhauj tsev tuabneeg lub neej. Yauxej yog ib tug tub hluas kws noobnyoog muaj kaum xyaa xyoo, nwg moog yug yaaj hab tshis nrug nwg cov tijlaug kws yog Npilehas hab Xilepas kws yog nwg txiv ob tug nam yau cov tub. Yauxej pheej coj tej yaam tsi zoo kws nwg cov tijlaug ua lug pav qha rua nwg txiv noog.
Taagnrho Yakhauj cov tub, mas Yakhauj hlub Yauxej tshaaj cov huv tuabsi, rua qhov nwg muaj Yauxej thaus kws nwg laug heev lawm. Nwg xaws tau ib lub tsho ntev  rua Yauxej naav.
Thaus Yauxej cov tijlaug pum has tas, puab txiv hlub Yauxej tshaaj le hlub puab lawm, puab txhaj ntxub puab tug kwv kawg nkaus le, hab ua rua puab tsi xaav has ib lu lug zoo rua Yauxej.
Muaj ib zag Yauxej txawm ua npau suav, hab thaus nwg qha zaaj npau suav ntawd rua nwg cov tijlaug noog taag, ua rua puab yimfuab ntxub nwg heev.
Yauxej has tas, “Kuv yuav pav kuv zaaj npau suav rua mej noog.

Peb suavdlawg puavleej paav peb cov teg nplej huv teb, thaus paav tau lawm, kuv teg nplej txawm sawv nreg nreeg. Ces mej cov teg nplej sawv lug vij kuv teg hab ca le nyo zum zawg lug pe kuv teg nplej.”

Nwg cov tijlaug nug has tas, “Koj xaav has tas koj yuav tau ua vaajntxwv kaav peb nua los?” Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj yimfuab ntxub nwg heev, vim zaaj npau suav hab tej lug kws nwg pav rua puab noog ntawd.
Ces Yauxej rov ua ib zaaj npau suav dlua hab nwg qha rua nwg cov tijlaug noog has tas, “Kuv ua dlua ib zaaj npau suav, kuv pum lub nub, lub hli hab kaum ib lub nubqub pe kuv zum zawg.”

Nwg pav zaaj npau suav nuav rua nwg txiv noog huv tuabsi hab, nwg txiv txawm ywg nwg has tas, “Ua caag koj yuav txawj ua npau suav ua luaj le? Koj xaav has tas koj nam wb hab koj cov tijlaug peb suavdlawg yuav tau lug txhus caug pe koj nua los?”
Yauxej cov tijlaug yimfuab khib heev, tabsis nwg txiv xaav ntsoov zaaj npau suav ntawd rua nruab sab.
Muaj ib nub Yauxej cov tijlaug moog yug puab txiv paab tsaj rua peg Sekhees,
Yakhauj has rua Yauxej has tas, “Kuv yuav khaiv koj moog peg Sekhees qhov chaw kws koj cov tijlaug yug tsaj.” Yauxej teb has tas, “Kuv maam le moog!”

Nwg txiv has rua nwg has tas, “Koj ca le moog saib, yog koj cov tijlaug noj qaab nyob zoo hab tej tsaj los nyob txhij txhua, ces koj rov qaab lug qha rua kuv paub.” Yog le ntawd, nwg txiv txhaj tso nwg sawv kev huv lub Haav Henploos moog lawm. Yauxej moog txug peg Sekhees,
hab nwg ncig moog ncig lug ntawm roob mojsaab, muaj ib tug txivneej pum nwg hab nug nwg has tas, “Koj nrhav dlaabtsi?”
Yauxej teb has tas, “Kuv tuaj nrhav kuv cov tijlaug kws puab tuaj yug puab cov tsaj, koj puas paub puab nyob qhov twg? Thov koj qha rua kuv.”

Tug txivneej ntawd teb has tas, “Puab tsi nyob ntawm nuav lawm. Kuv nov puab has tas, puab yuav moog rua tom lub nroog Dauthaas.” Ces Yauxej txhaj lawv cov tijlaug qaab moog hab pum puab nyob ntawm Dauthaas.
Thaus Yauxej cov tijlaug pum Yauxej tuaj txug tim u, cov tijlaug txawm tuavhuv tua Yauxej povtseg.
Puab ib leeg has rua ib leeg tas, “Tug kws txawj ua npau suav ntawd tuaj lawm.

Zag nuav, peb muab nwg tua povtseg hab muab nwg coj moog pov rua huv cov qhov tshij qhuav nuav ib lub. Peb maam dlaag has tas yog tsuv tum nwg lawm. Saib nwg tej npau suav yuav muaj dlaabtsi tshwm tuaj.”
Thaus Lunpees nov puab has le ntawd, nwg nrhav tswvyim paab cawm Yauxej, nwg txhaj has tas, “Ca peb tsi xob muab Yauxej tua povtseg.

Peb ca le muab nwg pov rua huv lub qhov tshij kws nyob ntawm roob mojsaab qhua nuav xwb, tsi xob ua kuas nwg nqaj ndluag ntshaav nrug.” Lunpees has le nuav, rua qhov nwg xaav paab kuas Yauxej dlim ntawm puab hab tso nwg rov moog cuag nwg txiv.
Thaus Yauxej tuaj txug ntawm cov tijlaug lawm, puab txawm sau nthwv lug nteg nwg hab muab nwg lub tsho ntev kws muaj teg.  hle hlo.
Ces puab txawm coj nwg moog pov rua huv lub qhov tshij kws tsi muaj dlej.

Thaus puab tseem taabtom noj mov, puab txawm pum ib paab tuabneeg Yisamayees taug kev peg lub nroog Nkile-as tuaj moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv. Puab caab ntxhuav thauj tej tshuaj tsw qaab hab txumlom moog muag.
Yudas has rua nwg cov kwvtij has tas, “Yog peb muab peb tug kwv tua povtseg hab npog txujkev tua tuabneeg nuav ca, peb yuav tau dlaabtsi?

Peb muab nwg muag rua cov tuabneeg Yisamayees ntawd ntshai yuav zoo dlua. Peb tsi xob ua rua nwg nqaj ndluag ntshaav nrug, rua qhov nwg yeej yog peb tug kwv hab nrug peb koom roj koom ntshaav.” Nwg cov kwvtij kuj pum zoo le nwg has,

thaus cov tub laag tub luam kws yog tuabneeg Midias tuaj txug, cov tijlaug  txhaj le nqug Yauxej tawm huv lub qhov tshij lug hab muab nwg muag rua cov Yisamayees ua neeg nkaum dlaim nyaj, luas txhaj coj Yauxej moog rua tebchaws Iziv lawm.
Thaus Lunpees rov qaab moog xauj huv lub qhov tshij tsi pum Yauxej nyob huv lawm, nwg ntxhuv sab heev hab dlua rhe nwg lub tsho povtseg.
Nwg rov qaab lug cuag nwg cov kwv hab has rua puab tas, “Tsi pum Yauxej nyob huv lub qhov tshij lawm, sov kuv yuav ua le caag lauj?”
Ces puab txawm muab ib tug tshis tua hab muab Yauxej lub tsho ntev moog raus rua huv cov ntshaav tshis.
Puab nqaa lub tsho ntev ntawd moog qha rua puab txiv hab has tas, “Peb khaws tau lub tsho nuav. Koj sim saib puas yog koj tug tub lub tsho los tsi yog?”
Yakhauj ncu tau lub tsho ntawd zoo hab has tas, “Yog tag, lub tsho nuav yog Yauxej lub! Tej tsaj nyaum yeej muab kuv tug tub tum lawm tag. Kuv tug tub Yauxej tau raug dlua ua tej dlaim lawm lauj!”
Yakhauj dlua rhe nwg lub tsho povtseg hab muab ntaub tsaaj lug npua, ua kev tu sab quaj ntsuag. Nwg quaj ncu txug nwg tug tub tau ntev loo.

Taagnrho nwg tej tub tej ntxhais puavleej lug nplig nwg sab, tabsis nwg yeej tsi noog leejtwg has hab nwg has tas, “Kuv yuav quaj ntsuag kuv tug tub le nuav moog txug thaus kuv txujsa tu moog nrug nwg nyob.” Yog le ntawd, nwg pheej quaj nwg tug tub Yauxej le.

Thaus cov tub laag tub luam kws yog tuabneeg Midias moog txug nraag tebchaws Iziv lawm, puab txawm muab Yauxej muag rua Pautifas kws yog Falaus ib tug thawj tubrog saib cov tubrog kws zuv Falaus lub loog.
Thaus lub sijhawm ntawd Yudas tso nwg cov kwvtij tseg hab tsiv moog nrug ib tug txivneej hu ua Hilaas kws yog cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Adaulaas nyob.
Nyob qhov ntawd Yudas ntsib cov Kana-aas ib tug ntxhais, tug ntxhais ntawd txiv hu ua Suav. Yudas txhaj yuav tug ntxhais ntawd ua quaspuj,
hab nwg yug tau ib tug tub rua Yudas, Yudas txhaj tis tug tub ntawd npe hu ua Eles.
Tug quaspuj ntawd rov xeeb tub dlua, nwg yug tau ib tug tub, hab nwg tis tug tub ntawd npe hu ua Aunaas.
Nwg rov yug tau ib tug tub ntxiv hab nwg tis tug tub ntawd npe hu ua Selas. Thaus yug tug tub ntawd Yudas tseem nyob huv lub nroog Akhexis.
Yudas tug tub hlub kws yog Eles yuav tau ib tug quaspuj npe hu ua Tamaj.
Eles ua kev phem kev qas tsi hum tug TSWV sab, tug TSWV txhaj muab nwg tua povtseg lawm.
Ces Yudas txhaj has rua Eles tug kwv Aunaas has tas, “Koj ca le moog yuav koj tug namtij, sawv koj tug tijlaug chaw kuas koj tug tijlaug txhaj muaj caajceg.”
Tabsis Aunaas paub has tas, cov mivnyuas ntawd yuav tsi yog nwg le; ces thaus nwg moog nrug nwg tug namtij pw, nwg ca cov kua txuas rua huv aav, kuas muaj tsi taug mivnyuas rua nwg tug tijlaug.
Qhov kws nwg ua le ntawd tsi hum tug TSWV sab, vim le ntawd tug TSWV txhaj le muab nwg tua povtseg lawm hab.

Ces Yudas txhaj le has rua Tamaj kws yog nwg tug nyaab has tas, “Koj ca le rov qaab moog nrug koj nam koj txiv nyob, ua puj ntsuag tog moog txug thaus kuv tug tub yau hlub tav txiv tsaiv.” Nwg has le ntawd rua qhov nwg ntshai nyob tsaam Selas raug tua ib yaam le Selas ob tug tijlaug hab. Ces Tamaj txhaj rov qaab moog nrug nwg nam hab nwg txiv nyob lawm.

Tau ntev loo lug tom qaab nuav Yudas tug quaspuj kws yog Suav tug ntxhais txawm tuag lawm. Thaus dlhau caij nyuaj sab quaj ntsuag lawm, Yudas hab nwg ib tug phoojywg kws nyob huv lub nroog Adaulaas txhaj moog saib nwg cov tuabneeg txav plaub yaaj kws nyob huv lub nroog Teenas.
Muaj tuabneeg moog has qha rua Tamaj has tas, nwg tug quasyawg leej txiv taabtom sawv kev tuaj moog txav plaub yaaj rua huv lub nroog Teenas.

Ces Tamaj txhaj hloov nwg cev rig tsho puj ntsuag kws nwg naj nub naav ntawd ca, muab ntaub lug npug nwg lub ntsejmuag, hab moog nyob ntawm ntug kev kws nyob ntawm ncauj ke moog rua huv lub zog Enayees, yog lub zog kws nyob ntawm txujkev moog rua huv lub nroog Teenas. Nwg yeej paub has tas, Yudas tug tub ntxawg Selas tub hlub tav hluas lawm, tabsis Yudas tseem pheej tsi muab Tamaj hab Selas txis ua nam txiv le.
Thaus Yudas pum Tamaj, nwg xaav has tas Tamaj yog ib tug namndlav, rua qhov Tamaj muab ntaub npug nwg lub ntsejmuag huv tuabsi lawm.

Yudas txhaj ncaaj nraim moog rua ntawm Tamaj hab has tas, “Koj ca le moog, kuv yuav nrug koj pw, koj yuav nqe pistsawg?” (Yudas tsi paub has tas, Tamaj yog nwg tug nyaab le lawm.) Tamaj txhaj teb has tas, “Koj txaus sab yuav muab dlaabtsi rua kuv?”

Yudas teb has tas, “Kuv yuav xaa ib tug mivnyuas tshis tuaj rua koj.” Tamaj has tas, “Ua le ntawd los tau, tabsis koj muab ib yaam dlaabtsi rua kuv khaws tseg ua puavpheej moog txug thaus koj coj tug mivnyuas tshis tuaj rua kuv tsaiv.”

Yudas nug has tas, “Koj xaav kuas kuv muab dlaabtsi rua koj khaws ua puavpheej tseg?” Tamaj teb has tas, “Muab koj lub homthawj kws muaj txuj hlua hab koj tug paas nreg rua kuv.” Yudas txhaj muab tej ntawd rua Tamaj. Ces obtug txawm moog pw, ces Tamaj txawm ca le xeeb tub.
Tamaj rov qaab moog tsev, tshem nwg dlaim ntaub npug ntsejmuag, hab rov qaab muab nwg cev rig tsho puj ntsuag lug naav dlua.
Yudas tso nwg tug phoojywg Hilaas xaa tug mivnyuas tshis moog txhwv tej khoom coglug kws nwg muab rua tug quaspuj ntawd khaws tseg lawm rov qaab lug, tabsis Hilaas nrhav tsi tau nwg le lawm.

Hilaas nug cov txivneej kws nyob huv lub nroog Enayees has tas, “Tug namndlav kws pheej moog nyob ntawm ntug kev moog rua qhov twg lawm?” Cov txivneej ntawd teb has tas, “Nyob huv lub zog nuav yeej ibtxwm tsi muaj namndlav.”

Hilaas rov qaab moog cuag Yudas hab has tas, “Kuv nrhav tsi tau tug quaspuj ntawd le lawm. Cov txivneej kws nyob huv lub zog ntawd has rua kuv tas, yeej tsi muaj ib tug namndlav nyob huv lub zog nuav hlo le.”

Yudas has tas, “Ca nwg yuav kuv cov khoom ntawd moog le. Peb tsi xaav pub kuas muaj tuabneeg luag peb plig. Kuv tub muab tug mivnyuas tshis nuav rua koj coj moog them nwg ntaag, tabsis koj moog nrhav tsi tau nwg lawm xwb.”

Tau peb hlis tom qaab muaj tuabneeg moog qha rua Yudas has tas, “Tamaj kws yog koj tug nyaab tau moog ua namndlav, hab nwgnuav nwg xeeb tub lawm.” Yudas has tas, “Ca Le coj Tamaj tawm moog lawm nrau ntug nroog hab muab suavtawg hlawv kuas tuag.”

Thaus puab taabtom coj Tamaj tawm moog, Tamaj tso tuabneeg nqaa cov khoom ntawd hab moog has rua nwg txiv yawm has tas, “Kuv muaj mivnyuas lug ntawm tug txivneej kws yog tug tswv cov khoom nuav. Mej nrug saib lub homthawj kws muaj hlua hab tug paas nreg nuav tuab zoo saib yog leejtwg le.”

Yudas ncu tau cov khoom ntawd hab has tas, “Tamaj ua yog cai lawm. Kuv tsi ua lawv le kuv tau coglug tseg rua nwg, tsimnyog kuv yuavtsum muab nwg txis rua kuv tug tub Selas.” Ces Yudas tsi moog nrug Tamaj pw ib zag ntxiv le lawm.
Thaus yuav txug caij Tamaj tu tub, nwg paub has tas nwg muaj mivnyuas ntxaib nyob huv nwg plaab.

Thaus nwg taabtom mob plaab yuav yug ob tug mivnyuas, muaj ib tug mivnyuas txhais teg txawm tawm tuaj ua ntej, tug quaspuj kws paab dlaws cev ntawd tuav nkaus txhais teg ntawd, hab muab tau ib txuj xuv paaj lab lug khi txhais teg ntawd hab has tas, “Tug nuav yog tug xub yug.”

Tabsis nwg nkaum nwg txhais teg rov qaab lawm, nwg tug kwv txawm yug lug ua ntej. Ces tug quaspuj kws tuaj paab dlaws cev ntawd has tas, “Yog ua le caag koj yuav txeeb tau kev lug ua ntej!” Yog le ntawd, txhaj muab nwg tis npe hu ua Peles.
Ces nwg tug tijlaug maam yug lug txhais teg khi rawv ib txuj xuv paaj lab hab muab nwg tis npe hu ua Zelas.
Cov tuabneeg Yisamayees coj Yauxej moog txug nraag tebchaws Iziv, hab puab muab nwg muag rua Pautifas kws yog Falaus tug thawj tubrog saib cov tubrog faajxwm kws zuv Falaus lub loog.
Tug TSWV nrug nraim Yauxej hab pub nwg teg num vaammeej heev. Nwg nyob huv nwg tug tswv Pautifas kws yog tuabneeg Iziv lub tsev.
Pautifas pum has tas tug TSWV nrug nraim Yauxej nyob hab ua rua txhua teg num kws Yauxej ua puavleej tav.
Pautifas txaus sab heev rua Yauxej hab tsaa Yauxej ua nwg tug tubkhai, hab tso plhuav nwg lub cuabtaam rua Yauxej ua tug saib.

Txij thaus ntawd lug, tug TSWV txhaj foom koob moov rua tug tuabneeg Iziv ntawd tsev tuabneeg, hab txhua yaam kws nwg muaj nyob huv nwg lub vaaj lub tsev hab huv nwg tej teb, vim Yauxej nrug nwg nyob.

Pautifas muab txhua yaam kws nwg muaj cob rua Yauxej saib hab nwg tso sab plhuav tsi txhawj txug ib yaam dlaabtsi le, tsuas yog tshwj cov zaub mov kws nwg noj nkaus xwb. Yauxej yog ib tug hluas kws cev yag hab zoo nraug heev,
ces tau tsi ntev Yauxej tug tswv tug quaspuj txawm nyam Yauxej, hab nwg taij Yauxej has tas, “Koj moog nrug kuv pw.”

Yauxej tsi kaam moog hab nwg has rua Pautifas tug quaspuj has tas, “Koj saib, txij thaus kuv lug nyob ntawm nuav, kuv tug tswv tso sab plhuav rua kuv tsi muaj kev nyuaj sab txhawj txug ib yaam dlaabtsi nyob huv nwg lub tsev hlo le. Nwg muab txhua yaam kws nwg muaj tso plhuav rua kuv ua tug saib.

Huv lub tsev nuav kuv txhaj yog tug kws muaj peevxwm ib yaam le nwg muaj xwb. Kuv tug tswv yeej tsi txwv kuv ib yaam dlaabtsi le, tsuas tshwj koj kws yog nwg tug quaspuj, nwg txhaj txwv tsi pub kuv kov, kuv yuav ua le caag muaj pluaj sab nrug koj pw hab ua txhum rua Vaajtswv?”
Txawm yog nwg naj nub taij kuas Yauxej moog nrug nwg pw los Yauxej yeej tsi kaam moog le.
Tabsis muaj ib nub Yauxej moog ua num huv tsev lawv le nwg pheej txeev ua, nub ntawd tej tubkhai tsi muaj ib tug nyob huv tsev le lawm.
Pautifas tug quaspuj txawm lug tuav nkaus Yauxej lub tsho hab has tas, “Koj ca le moog nrug kuv pw xwb.” Tabsis Yauxej hle hlo Yauxej lub tsho rua nwg, hab Yauxej tawm plawg tsiv rua nrau zoov lawm.
Thaus Pautifas tug quaspuj pum has tas, Yauxej hle Yauxej lub tsho rua nwg hab tsiv tawm rua nrau zoov lawm,

nwg txawm hu cov tubkhai kws zuv nwg lub tsev lug hab ntxeev lug has tas, “Mej sim saib! Tug tuabneeg Henplais kws kuv tug quasyawg coj lug rua huv tsev nuav, nwg ua saib tsi taug peb kag le. Nwg ca le lug huv kuv txaaj hab mos kuv, tabsis kuv qw tawg ntho,
ces nwg ca le tsiv rua nrau zoov, hab tseg nwg lub tsho rua ntawm kuv ib saab.”
Pautifas tug quaspuj txhaj khaws Yauxej lub tsho ca moog txug thaus Yauxej tug tswv rov qaab lug txug tsev.
Ces nwg txawm pav zaaj nuav rua nwg tug quasyawg noog has tas: “Tug tubkhai Henplais kws koj coj lug nrug wb nyob, nwg lug mos kuv huv txaaj.
Tabsis thaus kuv qw tawg ntho, nwg tso plhuav kuv tseg tsiv rua nrau zoov hab tseg nwg lub tsho rua ntawm kuv ib saab.”
Thaus Yauxej tug tswv nov dlheev tej lug kws nwg tug quaspuj pav has tas, “Koj tug tubkhai tau ua le nuav rua kuv lawm ntaag.” Txhaj ua rua nwg chim heev.
Yauxej tug tswv txhaj coj Yauxej moog kaw rua huv qhov chaw kws kaw Falaus cov tuabneeg raug txim, ces Yauxej txawm moog nyob rua huv lub tsev lojcuj ntawd lawm.
Tabsis tug TSWV yeej nrug nraim Yauxej hab foom koob moov rua Yauxej, ces tug kws saib lub tsev lojcuj txhaj txaus sab heev rua Yauxej.
Nwg tsaa Yauxej ua tug saib taagnrho cov tuabneeg raug txim hab ua tug saib txhua yaam kws nyob huv lub tsev lojcuj.
Tug kws saib lub tsev lojcuj tso sab plhuav, tsi moog saib tej num kws nwg tso rua Yauxej ua le, rua qhov tug TSWV nrug nraim Yauxej hab pub tswvyim rua Yauxej ua tau txhua yaam num tav huv tuabsi.
Tau ib ntus lug tom qaab nuav tug kws laub cawv hab tug thawj kws saib cov tuabneeg ua mov rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Iziv noj hab haus, obtug tau ua txhum rua vaajntxwv.
Falaus txhaj chim rua ob tug tubkhai ntawd heev,
nwg txawm has kuas coj obtug moog kaw rua huv tug thawj kws saib cov faajxwm lub tsev, yog tuab lub tsev lojcuj kws kaw Yauxej hab ntaag.
Tug thawj kws saib cov tuabneeg raug txim tso Yauxej lug ua tug saib obtug, hab puab nyob tau ib ntus ntev loo huv tsev lojcuj.

Muaj ib mos tug laub cawv hab tug thawj kws saib cov ua mov rua vaajntxwv noj kws raug kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj, nyag txawm ua nyag ib zaaj npau suav, hab obtug ob zaaj npau suav ntawd nyag muaj nyag ntsab lug.
Thaus sawv ntxuv Yauxej lug rua huv chaav kws obtug nyob, nwg pum obtug mluag kawg le.
Yauxej nug obtug has tas, “Vim le caag nub nua meb mluag kawg le?”

Obtug teb has tas, “Wb nyag ua nyag ib zaaj npau suav, tabsis tsi muaj leejtwg yuav txhais tau wb ob zaaj npau suav le.” Yauxej teb has tas, “Tsuas yog Vaajtswv tuab leeg xwb txhaj le txhais tau npau suav. Qha meb ob zaaj npau suav rua kuv noog saib!”
Ces tug laub cawv txhaj pav nwg zaaj npau suav rua Yauxej has tas, “Kuv ua npau suav pum ib tsob txiv maab nyob ntawm kuv xubndlag
ncau ua peb ceg. Thaus hlaav nplooj lawm, taamsim ntawd txawm tawg paaj txi txiv ua tej tauv, tej txiv txawm sav taagnrho.
Kuv tuav rawv Falaus lub khob, ces kuv cev teg moog dle cov txiv maab ntawd hab tsu kua rua huv lub khob muab cev rua Falaus haus.”
Yauxej has tas, “Koj zaaj npau suav lub ntsab mas yog le nuav: peb tug ceg txiv maab ntawd yog peb nub.

Peb nub sau nuav Falaus yuav tuaj tso koj tawm moog, zaam txim rua koj hab nwg yuav muab koj teg num qub rov rua koj ua. Koj yuav tau rov muab nwg lub khob cev rua nwg ib yaam le yaav thaus koj tau ua lug lawm.
Tabsis thaus koj tau zoo lawm thov koj ncu ntsoov txug kuv, hab koj ua sab dlawb paug pav txug kuv zaaj rua Falaus noog, kuas nwg txhaj tso kuv tawm huv tsev lojcuj nuav moog.

Qhov tseeb yog puab nyag kuv peg tebchaws Henplais lug, hab txawm yog kuv lug nyob rua huv tebchaws Iziv nuav los kuv yeej tsi tau ua ib qhov txhum kws txaus puab coj kuv tuaj kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj nuav le.”

Thaus tug thawj kws saib cov ua mov pum has tas, tug laub cawv zaaj npau suav yog zaaj zoo lawm, nwg txhaj has rua Yauxej has tas, “Kuv ua ib zaaj npau suav hab, kuv kwv peb choo ncuav sis tshooj sau kuv taubhau.
Nyob sau tshooj choo peb, muaj txhua yaam ncuav zoo kws coj moog rua Falaus noj, tabsis noog lug muab cov ncuav ntawd noj lawm.”
Yauxej teb has tas, “Koj zaaj npau suav lub ntsab yog le nuav: peb choo ncuav yog peb nub.
Peb nub sau nuav Falaus yuav tuaj coj koj moog, hab yuav muab koj txav cejdlaab! Ces nwg yuav muab koj lub cev moog dlai rua sau tug ncej, hab noog yuav lug noj koj cev nqaj.”

Tau peb nub tom qaab kws txug Falaus nub yug nwg txawm ua tau ib rooj mov rua taagnrho nwg cov numtswv noj ua kev zoo sab, nwg txhaj tso tug kws laub cawv hab tug thawj saib ua mov lug sawv taabmeeg ntawm nwg cov numtswv.
Falaus muab tug kws laub cawv rov moog ua nwg lub luag num laub cawv le qub,
tabsis nwg muab tug thawj saib cov ua mov txav cejdlaab. Tej nuav tshwmsim lawv le Yauxej tau has lawm tag.
Tabsis tug laub cawv ncu tsi txug tej lug kws Yauxej has, ces nwg txawm ca le tsi ncu qaab txug Yauxej le lawm.
Tau ob xyoos txwm nkaus tom qaab ntawd, Falaus ua ib zaaj npau suav has tas, nwg sawv ntawm ntug dlej Niles,
thaus ntawd nwg pum xyaa tug maum nyuj rog rog tawm huv dlej tuaj noj tej zaub kws nyob ntawm ntug dlej.
Ces muaj dlua xyaa tug maum nyuj ntxaug ntxaug tshuav pobtxhaa xwb, tawm huv tug dlej Niles tuaj nrug xyaa tug maum nyuj rog rog ntawd sawv ua ke ntawm ntug dlej,
ces xyaa tug maum nyuj ntxaug ntxaug ca le muab xyaa tug maum nyuj rog rog noj nqog taag huv tuabsi lawm. Ces Falaus txawm tsim dlheev lug.
Nwg rov qaab tsaug zug hab ua dlua ib zaaj npau suav tas muaj ib tsob nplej txhawv tau xyaa naab, mas puv hab sav zoo kawg le.
Ces muaj dlua xyaa naab nplej txhawv tuaj yog npluag xwb, rua qhov raug cov cua tom taj suabpuam tuaj ntsawj,
xyaa naab nplej npluag ntawd ca le muab xyaa naab nplej puv puv noj nqog huv tuabsi lawm. Falaus txawm tsim dlheev lug, ua cav yog nwg ua npau suav xwb.

Taagkig kaaj ntug Falaus ntxhuv sab heev, nwg txhaj khaiv tuabneeg moog hu cov tuabneeg kws txawj saib yaig hab tej tuabneeg txawj ntse kws nyob huv tebchaws Iziv tuaj huv tuabsi. Nwg txawm pav nwg ob zaaj npau suav ntawd rua puab noog, tabsis tsi muaj leejtwg txhais tau nwg ob zaaj npau suav ntawd le.
Ces tug laub cawv maam le has rua Falaus has tas, “Tsimnyog nub nua kuv yuavtsum tau lug leeg kuv lub txim kws kuv tau ua txhum rua koj taag lug lawm.
Falaus, koj tau chim rua tug thawj kws saib ua mov hab kuv, koj txhaj muab wb coj moog kaw rua huv tug thawj kws saib cov faajxwm lub tsev lojcuj.
Muaj ib mos wb nyag txawm ua nyag ib zaaj npau suav, hab wb ob zaaj npau suav ntawd nyag muaj nyag ntsab lug.

Tug tub hluas Henplais kws raug kaw nrug wb nyob ua ke rua huv, nwg yog tug thawj kws saib cov faajxwm tug tubqhe. Wb pav wb ob zaaj npau suav rua nwg noog, hab nwg txhais tau wb ob zaaj npau suav ntawd rua wb.
Mas txhua yaam txawm muaj lawv le nwg has tag: koj muab kuv tso rov lug ua kuv tej num qub, tabsis koj muab tug saib cov ua mov txav cejdlaab lawm.”

Falaus txhaj khaiv tuabneeg moog tso Yauxej lug, hab taamsim ntawd luas txawm moog coj nwg tawm huv tsev lojcuj lug. Tom qaab kws nwg chais fwjtxwv hab hloov nwg cev rig tsho taag lawm, nwg txawm lug sawv ntawm Falaus xubndlag.

Falaus has rua Yauxej has tas, “Kuv ua ib zaaj npau suav tabsis tsi muaj leejtwg txhais tau zaaj npau suav ntawd le. Mas kuv nov has tas, thaus koj nov luas tej ua npau suav, koj yeej muaj peevxwm txhais tau tej npau suav ntawd.”
Yauxej teb has tas, “Falaus, kuv tsi muaj peevxwm txhais tau koj zaaj npau suav, tabsis Vaajtswv yuav pub rua kuv txhais koj zaaj npau suav rua koj.”
Falaus has tas, “Kuv ua npau suav mas kuv sawv ntawm ntug Dlej Niles.
Thaus ntawd muaj xyaa tug maum nyuj rog rog hab zoo nkauj heev tawm huv tug Dlej Niles tuaj noj zaub ntawm ntug dlej.
Ces muaj dlua xyaa tug maum nyuj ntxaug ntxaug tshuav pobtxhaa xwb. Kuv yeej tsi tau pum dlua tej nyuj phem hab ntxaug le ntawd nyob huv tebchaws Iziv nuav hlo le.
Cov maum nyuj ntxaug ntxaug ntawd ca le muab cov maum nyuj rog zoo nkauj noj nqog taag,
tabsis tsi muaj leejtwg yuav paub, rua qhov cov maum nyuj ntawd tseem ntxaug hab phem ib yaam le qub. Ces kuv txawm tsim dlheev lug lawm.
Kuv rov ua dlua ib zaaj npau suav pum ib tsob nplej txhawv tau xyaa naab nplej puv puv hab sav zoo heev.
Ces muaj dlua ib tsob nplej txhawv tau xyaa naab nplej npluag hab qhuav taw nreeg kws yog raug cov cua tom taj suabpuam tuaj ntsawj,

cov naab nplej npluag ca le nqog cov naab nplej puv puv hab sav zoo ntawd huv tuabsi lawm. Kuv tub pav zaaj npau suav nuav rua cov tuabneeg kws txawj saib yaig noog taag, tabsis tsi muaj leejtwg yuav txhais tau lub ntsab rua kuv le.”
Yauxej has rua Falaus has tas, “Ob zaaj npau suav nuav lub ntsab lug yog tuab yaam xwb, yog Vaajtswv qha rua koj paub txug tej xwmtxheej kws yuav muaj lug yaav tom ntej nuav.
Xyaa tug maum nyuj rog rog yog xyaa xyoo, hab xyaa naab nplej kws puv zoo nkauj los yog xyaa xyoo ib yaam nkaus hab, ob zaaj npau suav nuav puavleej yog tuab lub ntsab lug xwb.
Xyaa tug maum nyuj ntxaug ntxaug kws tawm tuaj tom qaab hab xyaa naab nplej npluag kws raug cov cua tom taj suabpuam ntsawj ntawd, yog xyaa xyoo kws yuav muaj kev tshaib nqhes heev.
Falaus, koj ob zaaj npau suav yeej muaj tseeb ib yaam le kws kuv qha rua koj nuav ntaag, Vaajtswv qha rua koj paub txug tej kws nwg yuav ua ntawd.
Xyaa xyoo sau nuav yuav muaj qoobloo ntau nplua mag thoob plawg tebchaws Iziv.

Tom qaab ntawd yuav muaj kev tshaib nqhes heev xyaa lub xyoos, hab suavdlawg yuav tsi ncu txug xyaa lub xyoo kws muaj qoobloo lawm, rua qhov txujkev tshaib nqhes yuav ua rua lub tebchaws nuav raug kev puamtsuaj.
Thaus ntawd suavdlawg yuav ncu tsi txug lub sijhawm kws lub tebchaws nuav muaj qoobloo nplua mag, rua qhov muaj kev tshaib nqhes luj kawg nkaus le.

Tej kws koj tau ua npau suav pum ob zag ntawd txhais has tas Vaajtswv tub teem ib lub sijhawm tseg ca kuas muaj tej ntawd tshwmsim lug, Vaajtswv yuav ua kuas tej ntawd muaj lug sai sai tom ntej nuav ntaag.
“Nwgnuav koj ca le nrhav ib tug tuabneeg txawj ntse hab muaj tswvyim zoo, hab tsaa nwg ua tug saib lub tebchaws nuav.
Hab koj yuavtsum tau tsaa dlua ib paab numtswv moog ua cov sau suavdlawg tej qoobloo ib feem tsib ntawm xyaa lub xyoo kws muaj qoobloo ntau heev nuav lug ca.

Koj has kuas puab ca le sau tej qoobloo huv xyaa lub xyoo kws muaj qoobloo ntawd tseg ca, hab tso cai rua puab moog sau tej nplej lug ntim rua huv tej txhaab ca rua txhua lub nroog, hab tso tuabneeg zuv huv tuabsi.
Sau tej qoobloo nuav lug ca, txhaj le tau yug lub tebchaws, thaus muaj kev tshaib nqhes lug raug cov tuabneeg Iziv xyaa lub xyoo ntawd. Yuavtsum ua le nuav tsoom pejxeem txhaj tsi tuag tshaib.”
Falaus hab nwg tsoom numtswv puavleej pum zoo ua lawv le zaaj kws Yauxej has nuav,
hab Falaus has rua puab tas, “Peb yuav nrhav tsi tau ib tug tuabneeg nyob qhov twg kws muaj Vaajtswv tug ntsujplig nrug nwg nyob le Yauxej lawm.”
Falaus has rua Yauxej tas, “Vaajtswv tub qha tej nuav rua koj paub lawm, yeej tsi muaj leejtwg yuav totaub hab muaj tswvyim npaum le koj.
Kuv yuav tsaa koj ua tug saib taagnrho kuv lub tebchaws, hab kuv cov pejxeem yuav noog koj tej lug saamfwm. Tsuas yog ca kuv ua tug luj dlua koj xwb.
Nwgnuav kuv tsaa koj ua tug tswj lub tebchaws Iziv.”

Falaus hle nwg ntiv nplhaib kws yog lub homthawj ntawm nwg tug ntivteg lug hab muab looj rua Yauxej tug ntivteg. Falaus muab cev rig tsho ntaub maag kws zoo heev rua Yauxej naav, hab muab txuj saw kub lug rua Yauxej coj ntawm cejdlaab.

Falaus muab nwg lub tsheb neeg kws yog lub ob rua Yauxej caij, hab Falaus cov tub faajxwm moog ua Yauxej ntej qw has tas, “Zaam kev! Zaam kev!” Falaus tsaa Yauxej ua tug kaav taagnrho lub tebchaws Iziv lawm.
Falaus has rua Yauxej tas, “Kuv yog Falaus, tabsis yog koj tsi tau tso cai mas cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tebchaws Iziv nuav tsi muaj cai ua tau ib yaam dlaabtsi le.”

Falaus tis dlua ib lub npe tshab rua Yauxej hu ua Xefanas Paneyas hab nwg muab Pautifelas kws yog tug Povthawj kws nyob huv lub nroog Heli-aupulis, tug ntxhais Axenas rua Yauxej yuav ua quaspuj. Hab Yauxej tawm moog ncig thoob plawg tebchaws Iziv.
Thaus Yauxej pib ua num rua Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv, Yauxej noobnyoog muaj peb caug xyoo. Yauxej tawm huv Falaus lub loog moog ncig saib num thoob plawg tebchaws Iziv.
Xyaa lub xyoo kws qoobloo zoo hab ntsu heev ntawd, cov tuabneeg huv tebchaws Iziv ua tau qoobloo ntau kawg nkaus le,

hab Yauxej sau taagnrho tej qoobloo kws cov tuabneeg ua tau ntawm xyaa lub xyoo nyob huv tebchaws Iziv, lug khaws ca huv tuabsi rua huv tej nroog. Nwg sau tej qoob kws luas ua huv tej teb nyob ibncig lub nroog twg muab sau lug ntim ca rua huv lub nroog ntawd.
Yauxej sau tau tej qoob lug khaws ca ntau cuag le tej xuabzeb nraag ntug havtxwv, sau tau ntau heev nwg txhaj tsi suav has tas muaj pistsawg taw hab pistsawg taas.
Ua ntej xyoo kws muaj kev tshaib nqhes lug txug, Yauxej tug quaspuj kws hu ua Axenas kws yog tug povthawj Pautifelas tug ntxhais yug tau ob tug tub rua Yauxej lawm.
Yauxej has tas, “Vaajtswv ua rua kuv tsi ncu txug kuv tej kev txomnyem hab ua rua kuv tsi ncu kuv tsev tuabneeg le lawm”; yog le ntawd nwg txhaj muab nwg tug tub hlub tis npe hu ua Manaxes.
Hab nwg tseem has tas, “Vaajtswv pub kuv muaj tubki huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muaj kev ntxhuv sab;” yog le ntawd nwg txhaj muab nwg tug tub yau tis npe hu ua Efalayees.
Xyaa lub xyoo kws suavdlawg muaj kev zoo sab rua tej qoobloo kws ntsu heev nyob huv tebchaws Iziv ntawd xaus lawm,

ces xyaa lub xyoo kws muaj kev tshaib nqhes txawm pib muaj tuaj, lawv le Yauxej has tseg lawm tag. Txhua lub tebchaws puavleej muaj kev tshaib nqhes, tabsis tshuav tebchaws Iziv txhaj tseem muaj mov noj xwb.
Thaus cov tuabneeg Iziv pib muaj kev tshaib plaab, puab tuaj quaj thov mov ntawm Falaus. Falaus kuas puab ca le moog cuag Yauxej hab ua lawv le Yauxej kuas puab ua.
Thaus muaj kev tshaib nqhes moog thoob lub tebchaws lawm, Yauxej txhaj qheb txhua lub txhaab nplej muag rua cov tuabneeg Iziv.
Tej tuabneeg nyob txhua qhov chaw thoob plawg tebchaws puavleej tuaj yuav nplej ntawm Yauxej huv tebchaws Iziv, rua qhov muaj kev tshaib nqhes thoob plawg txhua qhov chaw.
Thaus Yakhauj nov has tas nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv muaj nplej ntau, nwg txhaj has rua nwg cov tub has tas, “Vim le caag mej nyob hlwb hluav tsi ua ib yaam dlaabtsi le?
Kuv nov has tas, nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv muaj mov ntau, mej ca le moog yuav mov lug rua peb noj, cawm kuas peb tsi xob tuag tshaib.”
Yog le ntawd, Yauxej cov tijlaug kaum leej txhaj moog yuav mov nraag tebchaws Iziv,
tabsis Yakhauj tsi tso Yauxej tug kwv Npeenyamees nrug cov tijlaug moog, rua qhov Yakhauj ntshai nyob tsaam muaj tej xwmtxheej phem lug raug Npeenyamees hab.
Yakhauj cov tub nrug luas lwm paab tuabneeg moog yuav mov rua nraag tebchaws Iziv hab, rua qhov muaj kev tshaib nqhes nyob huv tebchaws Kana-aas.

Yauxej kws yog tug tswj lub tebchaws Iziv, nwg ua tug muag mov rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob thoob plawg tebchaws. Yog le ntawd, Yauxej cov tijlaug txhaj tuaj hab txhus caug ndlua pe ntawm nwg xubndlag nyo hau ua ntsejmuag ti nkaus huv aav.

Thaus Yauxej pum dlheev nwg cov tijlaug, nwg tseem ncu tau puab, tabsis nwg txhobtxwm ua tug tsi paub puab le. Nwg nug puab chawv ntag has tas, “Mej tuaj qhov twg tuaj?” Puab teb has tas, “Peb tuaj peg tebchaws Kana-aas tuaj yuav mov noj.”
Yauxej tseem ncu tau nwg cov tijlaug, tabsis puab ncu tsi tau nwg lawm.
Yauxej ncu txug ob zaaj npau suav kws nwg ua, has txug puab ntawd hab nwg has rua puab tas, “Mej yog cov tuabneeg kws tuaj soj saib peb lub tebchaws saib qhov twg yog qhov tsi muaj zug xwb los sav!”
Puab teb has tas, “Tug tswv, tsi yog peb tuaj ua le koj has ko, peb yog koj cov tubqhe, peb tuaj nuav yog peb tuaj thov yuav mov ntawm koj coj moog noj xwb.
Tug tswv, peb cov nuav puavleej yog kwvtij. Peb suavdlawg yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, peb tsi yog tuabneeg tuaj soj saib tebchaws.”
Yauxej has rua puab tas, “Yeej tsi yog le mej has, yog mej tuaj soj saib peb lub tebchaws saib qhov twg yog qhov tsi muaj zug xwb ntaag.”

Puab has tas, “Tug tswv, peb muaj kaum ob leeg kwvtij, peb puavleej yog tuab leeg txiv yug nyob huv tebchaws Kana-aas. Peb ib tug kwv yau tuag lawm, hab peb tshuav tug kwv ntxawg nrug peb txiv nyob peg tsev.”
Yauxej teb has tas, “Yeej yog le kuv has tag lauj, mej tuaj soj saib peb lub tebchaws xwb xwb le.
Kuv yuav sim mej, kuv thov coglug rua ntawm Falaus lub npe has tas, yog mej tsi coj mej tug kwv ntxawg tuaj ntawm nuav, mas kuv yuav tsi tso mej moog tsev le.

Mej cov ib tug yuavtsum moog coj mej tug kwv tuaj. Dlua le cov mas yuavtsum coj moog kaw, moog txug thaus mej cov lug nuav muaj tseeb lawv le mej has ntawd tsaiv. Falaus kaav rawv peb, yog tsi muaj tseeb le mej has, ces yog mej tuaj soj saib peb lub tebchaws xwb ntaag.”
Yauxej txhaj coj puab moog kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj tau peb nub.
Nub peb Yauxej txhaj has rua puab tas, “Kuv yog ib tug tuabneeg kws fwm Vaajtswv, yog mej ua tau yaam nuav, mas mej txhaj le yuav dlim txim.

Yog has tas mej yeej yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tag, ca mej cov nuav ib tug nyob huv lub tsev lojcuj nuav, dlua le cov, mej ca le thauj tej nplej kws mej yuav tau lawm moog cawm mej tej quaspuj mivnyuas kws yuav tuag tshaib tsaiv.

Ces mej maam le coj mej tug kwv ntxawg tuaj rua kuv. Ua le nuav txhaj le yog muaj tseeb lawv le tej lug kws mej tau has lawm, hab kuv txhaj yuav tsi tua mej povtseg.” Puab pum zoo ua lawv le Yauxej has.

Hab puab sis thaam zum zawg has tas, “Tseeb lawm lauj, nwgnuav peb raug tej kev txomnyem nuav los tub yog vim peb tau ua txhum rua peb tug kwv lawm. Peb tub pum nwg raug kev txomnyem luj heev thaus nwg thov kuas peb paab, tabsis peb tsi paab nwg le. Tub yog vim le nuav ntaag nwgnuav peb txhaj raug kev txomnyem.”
Lunpees has tas, “Kuv tub yeej has rua mej tas, tsi xob ua phem rua nwg, tabsis mej tsi noog kuv has. Mej paub lawm los tsi paub, nwgnuav lub txim nphau lug raug peb lawm lauj.”
Yauxej totaub tej lug kws puab has huv tuabsi, tabsis puab tsi paub has tas Yauxej paub puab tej lug, rua qhov thaus Yauxej nrug puab thaam, nwg kuas tuabneeg txhais lug xwb.
Yauxej tawm ntawm puab moog nkaum rua ib qho hab quaj. Thaus nwg tauv tau kua muag lawm, nwg rov lug muab Xime-oos khi kag taabmeeg puab.

Yauxej has kuas cov tubqhe muab nplej ntim rua huv nwg cov tijlaug tej naab kuas puv nkaus, muab puab tej nyaj ntsaws rov rua huv puab tej naab, hab ntim su huv tuabsi rua puab tau noj taug kev moog tsev. Cov tubqhe ua tej nuav tav log lawv le Yauxej has.
Ces cov tijlaug tsaws tej nplej kws puab yuav ntawd rua sau puab cov neeg luav nrausqaum, hab puab txawm sawv kev lug tsev lawm.
Thaus puab lug su ib mos ntawm ib tog kev, muaj ib tug txawm qheb nwg lub ncauj naab muab nplej lug rua nwg tug neeg luav noj, ua cav nwg cov nyaj tseem nyob ntawm nwg lub ncauj naab.

Nwg txhaj has rua nwg cov kwvtij has tas, “Ua caag kuv cov nyaj tseem nyob huv kuv lub naab nuav!” Puab poob sab hab ntshai kawg le, puab txhaj sis nug zum zawg has tas, “Vaajtswv ua dlaabtsi le nuav rua peb?”
Thaus puab rov lug txug ntawm puab txiv Yakhauj kws nyob huv tebchaws Kana-aas lawm, puab pav txhua yaam xwmtxheej kws puab moog ntsib rua puab txiv noog has tas,
“Tug nom kws tswj lub tebchaws Iziv has lug nyaum kawg rua peb hab lam has tas peb yog cov tuabneeg kws xaav moog soj saib nwg lub tebchaws xwb.
Peb teb has tas, ‘Peb yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, peb tsi yog cov tuabneeg moog soj saib tebchaws.
Peb cov kwvtij muaj kaum ob leeg, hab peb puavleej yog tuab leeg txiv yug xwb. Muaj ib tug tuag lawm, nwgnuav tshuav ib tug kwv ntxawg nrug peb txiv nyob peg tebchaws Kana-aas.’

Tug nom ntawd teb has tas, ‘Yog mej xaav kuas kuv ntseeg has tas mej yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, mas mej yuavtsum ua le nuav: mej cov nuav ib tug yuavtsum tau nrug kuv nyob, dlua le cov ca thauj nplej rov moog rua mej quaspuj mivnyuas cov kws yuav tuag tshaib tau noj.

Coj mej tug kwv ntxawg tuaj rua kuv. Kuv txhaj ntseeg has tas mej yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, tsi yog tuabneeg tuaj soj saib tebchaws, kuv txhaj yuav tso mej tug tijlaug rov rua mej, mas mej txhaj tau nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav ua laag ua luam.’ ”
Thaus puab muab puab cov naab nplej laub, puab pum puab cov nyaj, nyag cov nyob huv nyag lub naab nplej, mas thaus kws puab hab puab txiv Yakhauj pum cov nyaj ntawd, ua rua puab ntshai kawg le.

Puab txiv has rua puab tas, “Mej xaav ua kuas kuv cov tub tsi tshuav ib tug nrug kuv nyob le los? Yauxej los tuag lawm, Xime-oos los raug nteg moog kaw lawm, nwgnuav mej tseem yuav coj Npeenyamees moog hab. Kuv yog tug kws raug kev nyuaj sab tshaaj plawg huv tuabsi!”

Lunpees has rua nwg txiv has tas, “Yog kuv tseem tsi coj Npeenyamees rov lug rua koj, ces koj ca le muab kuv ob tug tub tua huv tuabsi povtseg. Tso nwg rua kuv ua tug saib, kuv yeej yuav coj nwg rov qaab lug xwb.”

Tabsis Yakhauj has tas, “Kuv tsi kaam tso kuv tug tub ntxawg nrug mej moog, rua qhov nwg tug tijlaug tuag lawm, tshuav nwg tuab leeg xwb. Nyob tsaam tsua muaj xwm rua nwg tom tej tog kev. Kuv laug heev lawm, yog kuv tseem pheej raug tej kev quaj ntsuag kws mej ua rua kuv ntawd, ntshai kuv yuav ca le txhawm chim tuag le!”
Huv tebchaws Kana-aas muaj kev tshaib plaab zuj zug ntxiv,
thaus kws Yakhauj tsev tuabneeg noj tej mov kws puab yuav nraag tebchaws Iziv lug taag lawm, Yakhauj has rua nwg cov tub has tas, “Mej ca le rov qaab moog yuav mivntsiv mov lug rua peb tau noj.”

Yudas has rua Yakhauj has tas, “Tug nom kws tswj tebchaws Iziv yeej has tu lug nrho rua peb tas, yog peb tseem tsi coj peb tug kwv moog rua nwg, mas kuas peb tsi xob moog tshwm ntsejmuag rua nwg pum ib zag le lawm.
Yog koj tso peb tug kwv ntxawg nrug peb moog, mas peb txhaj yuav kaam moog yuav nplej lug rua koj.

Tabsis yog koj tsi kaam tso nwg moog, peb yuav tsi kaam moog, rua qhov tug nom nraag yeej has rua peb tas, ‘Yog mej tsi coj mej tug kwv ntxawg nrug mej tuaj, mej tsi xob tuaj tshwm ntsejmuag rua kuv pum ib zag ntxiv le lawm.’ ”
Yakhauj has tas, “Vim le caag mej yuav ua rua kuv tau kev nyuaj sab ua luaj, ua le caag tseem yuav qha rua tug nom ntawd paub has tas, mej tshuav ib tug kwv hab nua?”

Puab teb has tas, “Tug nom nraag yeej nug txug peb hab peb tsev tuabneeg huv tuabsi has tas, ‘Mej txiv puas tseem ua neej nyob? Mej puas muaj kwv hab?’ Peb txhaj teb nwg tej lug kws nwg nug peb ntawd. Peb tub tsi paub has tas, nwg yuav kuas peb coj peb tug kwv ntxawg moog rua nwg le.”
Yudas has rua nwg txiv has tas, “Tso tug hluas nrug kuv moog, peb yuav rawm sawv kev moog taamsim nuav, peb suavdlawg txhaj yuav tsi tuag tshaib.
Kuv yuav zoo sab muab kuv txujsa pauv nwg, thov koj tso nwg rua kuv ua tug tsomkwm. Yog kuv coj tsi tau nwg rov lug rua koj, ces ca kuv ua tug ris lub txim nuav moog ibtxhis le.
Yog peb tsi xob pheej taabkaum le nuav, ntshai taamsim nuav peb tub rov moog ob ntsug lug lawm.”

Puab txiv has rua puab tas, “Yog le ntawd, ca peb ua le nuav, muab tej khoom zoo tshaaj plawg kws peb muaj nyob huv tebchaws nuav ntim rua huv mej cov naab coj moog pub rua tug nom nraag xws le: tshuaj tsw qaab, zib ntaab, txumlom, txiv laum fuabxeeb hab tej txiv ntoo.
Mej ca le nqaa nyaj ob npaug moog, mej nqaa cov nyaj kws zag taag nyob huv mej tej naab rov moog rua luas. Tej zag yog luas tsi ncu qaab lawm xwb.
Coj mej tug kwv ntxawg nrug mej moog hab rov moog cuag tug nom nraag.

Thov Vaajtswv tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus ua kuas tug nom nraag muaj sab mog muas hab taabncuab mej, nwg txhaj yuav tso Npeenyamees hab mej tug tijlaug rov lug. Txawm yog kuv ob tug tub tso kuv tseg lawm los xijpeem.”
Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj coj tej khoom pub hab ob npaug nyaj hab coj puab tug kwv Npeenyamees nrug puab rov moog cuag Yauxej rua nraag tebchaws Iziv lawm.

Thaus Yauxej pum Npeenyamees nrug puab tuaj txug lawm, nwg txawm has rua tug tubkhai kws saib nwg lub tsev has tas, “Coj cov tuabneeg nuav moog rua huv kuv tsev. Ca le moog nteg ib tug tsaj lug tua ua zaub ua mov, hab puab yuav nrug kuv noj sus ua ke.”
Tug tubkhai ntawd moog ua lawv le Yauxej has hab coj cov tijlaug ntawd moog su huv Yauxej tsev.

Thaus kws coj puab moog txug rua huv Yauxej tsev, puab ntshai kawg hab puab xaav has tas, “Ntshai yog tim cov nyaj kws thawj zag muab tso rov rua huv peb cov naab ntaag lauj. Nwg txhaj xaav ntaus peb, txeeb yuav peb tej neeg luav, hab coj peb moog ua nwg qhev.”
Puab txhaj moog cuag tug tubkhai kws saib Yauxej tsev ntawm lub qhovrooj kws yuav moog rua huv tsev hab has rua nwg tas,
“Tug tswv, yog koj txaus sab, peb tub tau tuaj yuav mov ntawm nuav ib zag lawm.

Thaus peb rov moog txug ib tog kev, peb qheb peb cov naab nplej, ua caag cov nyaj kws peb coj tuaj yuav nplej puavleej nyob taag hab peb tej ncauj naab tseem khi le qub. Peb txhaj nqaa cov nyaj nuav huv tuabsi rov tuaj rua koj.
Peb tsi paub sov yog leejtwg muab peb cov nyaj rov moog ntsaws rua huv peb cov naab. Zag nuav los peb kuj npaaj tau mivntsiv nyaj coj tuaj thov yuav mov dlua hab.”

Tug tubkhai txhaj has tas, “Mej tsi xob nyuaj sab, hab tsi xob ntshai. Mej tug Vaajtswv kws yog mej txiv tug Vaajtswv, muab tej nyaj ntawd ntsaws rov rua huv mej tej naab xwb. Kuv tub tau txais mej cov nyaj lawm.” Ces nwg txawm moog coj Xime-oos lug rua puab.
Ces tug tubkhai txhaj coj cov tijlaug lug rua huv Yauxej tsev, nwg moog nqaa dlej lug rua puab ntxuav kutaw, hab muab zaub rua puab cov neeg luav noj.
Puab npaaj puab tej khoom pub tog ca txug thaus taav su Yauxej lug txug, puab yuav muab pub rua nwg, rua qhov luas tub qha rua puab lawm has tas, puab yuav tau nrug Yauxej noj sus ua ke.
Thaus Yauxej lug txug, puab txhaj moog nqaa puab tej khoom lug rua huv tsev muab pub rua Yauxej hab txhus caug ndlua ntawm Yauxej xubndlag pe ua ntsejmuag ti nkaus huv aav.

Yauxej nug puab txug kev noj qaab nyob zoo hab has tas, “Mej tub yeej qha kuv has tas mej txiv laug heev, yog le ntawd, nwgnuav nwg nyob le caag lawm? Nwg puas tseem ua neej nyob hab puas noj qaab nyob zoo?”
Puab teb has tas, “Peb txiv kws yog koj tug tubkhai, nwg noj qaab nyob zoo hab tseem ua neej nyob.” Ces puab rov txhus caug pe Yauxej dlua ib zag ntxiv.

Thaus Yauxej pum dlheev nwg tug kwv ntxawg Npeenyamees kws yog nrug nwg koom ib leej nam yug, nwg txhaj nug has tas, “Tug nuav yog mej tug kwv ntxawg kws mej qha rua kuv lawm ntaag los? Yauxej has tas, mivtub, thov Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua koj.”

Ces Yauxej txawm tawm plawg moog lawm, rua qhov nwg pum nwg tug kwv ntxawg, nwg lub sab quaj dlhev puv nkaus kev zoo sab, nwg tauv tsi taug nwg lub kua muag, nwg yuav laug quaj taabmeeg puab, nwg txhaj tawm moog quaj tuabywv ib leeg huv nwg chaav tsev.
Tom qaab kws nwg ntxuav muag taag, nwg maam tawm lug, hab ua tag tauv nwg lub kua muag, nwg txhaj kuas cov tubkhai rau mov rua puab noj.

Puab rau ib rooj mov rua Yauxej noj hab rau dlua ib rooj rua Yauxej cov tijlaug noj. Puab rau dlua ib rooj rua lwm qhov rua cov tuabneeg Iziv kws tuaj nrug puab noj mov ntawd noj, rua qhov cov tuabneeg Iziv tsi kaam nrug cov tuabneeg Henplais noj mov ua ke, vim yuav ua rua cov tuabneeg Iziv poob ntsejmuag.

Yauxej cov tijlaug moog nyob ncig lub rooj tig xubndlag tuaj rua ntawm Yauxej, lawv le puab tej noobnyoog pib tug hlub moog txug tug ntxawg. Thaus puab pum has tas ua cav puab tau lug nyob txhij txhua lawm tag, puab ib leeg tig saib ib leeg ua rua puab xaav tsi thoob le.

Cov tubkhai dlaus zaub dlaus mov ntawm Yauxej lub rooj lug rua puab noj, hab puab txhaab rua Npeenyamees noj tsib npaug ntau dlua lwm tug huv tuabsi. Puab txhaj nrug Yauxej noj hab haus moog txug thaus puab noj tsau haus qaug.

Yauxej has rua nwg tug tubkhai kws saib nwg lub tsev has tas, “Koj muab nplej ntim rua huv cov tuabneeg nuav tej naab kuas ntau txaus nkaus puab thauj moog, hab muab puab tej nyaj ntsaws nyag le rov rua huv nyag lub ncauj naab.
Koj muab kuv lub khob nyaj ntsaws rua huv tug kwv ntxawg lub ncauj naab, ntsaws ua ke nrug nwg cov nyaj kws coj tuaj yuav nplej.” Tug tubkhai moog ua lawv nraim le Yauxej has kuas nwg ua.
Taagkig kaaj ntug, nwg txawm tso cov tijlaug caab puab tej neeg luav sawv kev rov qaab moog tsev lawm.

Puab nyavnyuas sawv kev lug tsi dleb ntawm ntug nroog, Yauxej has rua tug tubkhai kws saib nwg lub tsev has tas, “Koj ca le maaj nrooj moog caum cov tuabneeg ntawd. Thaus koj caum cuag puab lawm, koj nug puab has tas, ‘Vim le caag mej ua qhov phem pauj qhov zoo?
Vim le caag mej nyag kuv tug tswv lub khob nyaj?  Lub khob ntawd yog lub kws nwg naj nub haus dlej, hab yog lub kws siv saib moov. Mej tau ua txhum luj heev lawm lauj!’ ”
Thaus tug tubkhai moog caum cuag puab, nwg txawm has tej lug nuav rua puab.
Puab teb nwg has tas, “Tug tswv, koj has le ko, yog has txug dlaabtsi? Peb yeej tsi tau ua le nuav ib zag le.

Koj tub paub lawm has tas, tej nyaj kws peb tshawb tau huv peb tej naab nplej peg tebchaws Kana-aas, peb tub nqaa rov tuaj rua mej huv tuabsi lawm. Yuav ua caag peb txhaj nyag tau nyaj lossis kub huv koj tug tswv lub tsev?
Tug tswv, yog koj tseem tshawb tau lub khob ntawd ntawm peb cov nuav ib tug twg, yuavtsum muab tug ntawd tua povtseg, dlua le peb cov yuav zoo sab hlo moog ua koj qhev.”
Nwg teb has tas, “Kuv pum zoo ua le mej has ko ntaag, tabsis tug kws tau muab lub khob lawm txhaj yuav moog ua qhev xwb; mej cov kws tsi tau muab, mej ca le moog tsev kaaj sab lug.”
Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj maaj nrooj tsaws puab tej naab rua huv aav, hab puab nyag dlaws nyag lub ncauj naab.
Yauxej tug tubkhai ua tuab zoo tshawb, pib tshawb ntawm tug tijlaug hlub lub naab lug txug rua ntawm tug kwv ntxawg lub naab txhaj tshawb tau lub khob nyob huv Npeenyamees lub naab.
Cov tijlaug txhaj dlua rhe puab tej tsho povtseg tu sab heev, puab tsaws nraa rua puab tej neeg luav thauj hab rov lug rua huv nroog.
Thaus Yudas hab nwg cov kwvtij rov lug txug huv Yauxej tsev, Yauxej tseem nyob huv. Puab txhus caug ndlua rua huv aav pe Yauxej,
Yauxej has rua puab tas, “Ua caag mej laam ua le ko? Mej tsi paub has tas tug tuabneeg kws zoo le kuv nuav, muaj peevxwm paub tej xwmtxheej kws yuav muaj lug yaav tom hauv ntej nua los?”

Yudas teb has tas, “Tug tswv, peb yuav teb le caag rua koj? Peb yuav ua le caag tawv dlhau koj? Peb yuav ua le caag has tau tas peb tsi muaj txim? Vaajtswv tsi npog peb lub txim le lawm. Tsi yog tug kws luas tshawb tau koj lub khob huv nwg lub naab txhaj ua koj qhev xwb, tabsis taagnrho peb suavdlawg yuav ua koj qhev.”

Yauxej teb has tas, “Tsi yog le ntawd! Kuv tsi ua le mej has ko! Tsuas yog tug kws muab kuv lub khob lawm txhaj yuav tau ua kuv tug qhev xwb. Dlua le mej cov yuav tau rov moog tsev kaaj sab lug hab moog has qha rua mej txiv.”
Yudas txawm moog cuag Yauxej hab thov has tas, “Tug tswv, thov koj pub kuv nrug koj thaam ob peb lus. Thov koj tsi xob chim rua kuv, koj yeej zoo ib yaam le Falaus lawm ntaag.
Tug tswv, koj nug peb has tas, ‘Mej txiv puas tseem nyob lossis mej puas tshuav kwv lawm hab?’

Peb teb koj has tas, ‘Peb txiv tseem nyob, nwg tub laug heev lawm hab peb tshuav ib tug kwv ntxawg kws yug rua thaus peb txiv tub laug heev lawm. Tug tub nuav tug tijlaug tuag lawm, hab nwg nam tshuav tuab tug tub ntawd txhaj tseem ua neej nyob xwb, mas nwg txiv hlub nwg kawg le.’
Tug tswv, koj has kuas peb coj nwg tuaj ntawm nuav, rua qhov koj xaav pum nwg,
hab peb tub teb rua koj has tas, tug tub ntawd txiv tso tsi taug nwg tseg le, yog nwg tso leej txiv tseg, ces nwg txiv yeej yuav tuag xwb.
Ces koj has tas, ‘Yog mej tsi coj mej tug kwv ntxawg nrug mej tuaj, ces mej yuav tsi pum kuv ntsejmuag ib zag ntxiv le lawm.’
“Thaus peb rov qaab moog txug peb txiv, peb muab koj tej lug ntawd pav huv tuabsi rua nwg noog.
Ces nwg kuas peb rov tuaj hab yuav mivntsiv mov moog noj.

Peb teb nwg has tas, ‘Peb tsi kaam moog lawm, yog peb tsi coj peb tug kwv ntxawg nrug peb moog, peb yuav tsi muaj cuabkaav moog tshwm ntsejmuag rua tug nom nraag pum peb ntxiv lawm. Yog peb tug kwv ntxawg nrug peb moog mas peb txhaj kaam rov moog.’
Peb txiv has rua peb tas, ‘Mej tub paub lawm has tas Laxees kws yog kuv tug quaspuj yug tau ob tug tub nua rua kuv xwb.
Ob tug tub nuav muaj ib tug tub ncaim kuv lawm. Kuv xaav has tas tsuv tub tum nwg hab muab dlua ndluag ua tej dlaim taag, rua qhov txij thaus ntawd lug kuv yeej tsi pum nwg le lawm.
Yog nwgnuav mej tseem coj tug nuav ncaim kuv moog hab tseem muaj xwm lug raug nwg, mas ntshai tej kev quaj ntsuag kws mej tau ua rua kuv ntawd, yuav txuv kuv tug laug txujsa le lauj.’ ”

Yudas has ntxiv tas, “Tug tswv, yog kuv tsi coj tug tub nuav nrug kuv rov qaab, thaus kuv moog txug tsev, kuv txiv tsi pum tug tub nuav nrug kuv rov qaab, ces nwg yeej yuav npu paa tuag. Nwg muab nwg txujsa cog nkaus rua nwg tug tub nuav xwb,
hab nwg tub laug heev lawm, ces nyob tsaam tej kev quaj ntsuag kws peb ua rua nwgnuav yuav txuv nwg txujsa.

Tsi taag le nuav xwb, kuv tseem tau coglug muab kuv txujsa pauv tug tub nuav rua kuv txiv hab. Kuv coglug rua nwg lawm, yog has tas kuv tseem tsi coj tug tub nuav rov moog rua nwg, ces kuv yog tug ris lub txim nuav moog taag kuv simneej.
Tug tswv, thov koj tso tug tub nuav nrug cov tijlaug rov moog tsev, ca kuv nrug koj nyob ua koj qhev hloov tug tub nuav chaw.
Yog tsi tau tug tub nuav nrug kuv rov moog tsev, kuv yuav ua le caag muaj cuabkaav rov moog cuag tau kuv txiv? Kuv tsi xaav pum txujkev puamtsuaj nuav lug raug kuv txiv le.”

Yauxej tauv tsi taug nwg lub kua muag taabmeeg nwg cov tubkhai le lawm, nwg txhaj has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le tawm moog.” Tsi muaj cov Iziv nrug puab nyob ntawd le lawm, Yauxej txhaj qha rua nwg cov tijlaug hab nwg tug kwv has tas nwg yog leejtwg tag.
Yauxej tsaa suab hlo quaj, ua rua cov tuabneeg Iziv puavleej nov, hab muaj tuabneeg moog pav zaaj nuav qha rua huv Falaus lub loog.
Yauxej has rua nwg cov tijlaug has tas, “Kuv yog Yauxej ntaag. Kuv txiv puas tseem muaj sa nyob?” Thaus nwg cov tijlaug nov nwg has tej lug nuav, ua rua puab ntshai kawg hab teb tsi taug ib lus le.

Yauxej has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le txaav lug ze kuv.” Puab txhaj txaav zog lug rua ntawm Yauxej. Ces Yauxej has rua puab tas, “Kuv yog mej tug kwv Yauxej kws mej muab muag moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv ntaag.
Nwgnuav mej tsi xob txhawj lossis tu sab qhov kws mej muab kuv muag lug rua ntawm nuav, yeej yog Vaajtswv khaiv kuv ua mej ntej lug, txhaj cawm tau tuabneeg txujsa.
Tej kev tshaib nqhes nuav, xyoo nuav nyavnyuas yog xyoo ob xwb, tseem tshuav tsib xyoos tom ntej nuav ntxiv, mas yuav tsi muaj leejtwg cog hab sau tau qoobloo hlo le.
Vaajtswv khaiv kuv ua mej ntej lug kuas cawm tau mej dlim kev puamtsuaj, kuas mej hab mej cov xeebntxwv txhaj muaj sa nyob.

Tsi yog mej muag kuv lug rua ntawm nuav, tabsis yog Vaajtswv khaiv kuv lug; hab nwg tsaa kuv ua Falaus ib tug nom kws luj. Kuv tau ua tug saib taagnrho Falaus tej vaaj tse; hab kaav taagnrho lub tebchaws Iziv nuav.

“Taamsim nuav mej ca le maaj nrooj rov qaab moog cuag kuv txiv hab qha rua nwg has tas, ‘Yauxej kws yog koj tug tub has le nuav: Vaajtswv tsaa kuv ua tug kaav taagnrho lub tebchaws Iziv lawm, kuas koj ca le lug nrug kuv nyob tsi xob ua sab nyaav.
Coj taagnrho mej cov mivnyuas, cov xeebntxwv hab mej tej yaaj, tej tshis, tej nyuj hab txhua yaam kws mej muaj lug nyob rua huv cheebtsaam Nkausees, txhaj yog qhov chaw kws nyob ze kuv.

Yog koj lug nyob huv Nkausees, mas kuv txhaj yuav paab tau koj. Kev tshaib nqhes tseem tshuav tsib xyoos ntxiv tom ntej nuav, mas kuv tsi xaav kuas koj tsev tuabneeg, hab koj tej tsaj txhu tuag tshaib le.’ ”
Yauxej has ntxiv tas, “Nwgnuav mej txhua tug, hab kwv Npeenyamees puavleej pum has tas kuv yog Yauxej tag.

Mej ca le qha rua kuv txiv paub has tas, kuv muaj fwjchim luj npaum le caag nyob huv tebchaws Iziv nuav, hab qha txhua yaam kws mej tau pum lawm rua nwg noog. Mej ca le maaj nrooj coj nwg lug nyob ntawm nuav.”
Yauxej cev loo teg moog puag nkaus nwg tug kwv Npeenyamees quaj; Npeenyamees los tsaa hlo suab quaj puag nkaus Yauxej ib yaam nkaus hab.
Yauxej tseem quaj los nwg tub moog puag cov tijlaug hab nwj puab ib tug rua ib tug. Tom qaab ntawd nwg cov tijlaug maam pib nrug nwg thaam.
Thaus muaj tuabneeg moog qha zaaj nuav rua huv Falaus lub loog has tas, Yauxej cov tijlaug tuaj saib Yauxej, Falaus hab nwg cov numtswv nrug Yauxej zoo sab kawg le.
Falaus has rua Yauxej has tas, “Has rua koj cov tijlaug kuas tsaws nraa rua puab tej tsaj thauj hab rov qaab moog lawm peg tebchaws Kana-aas.
Kuas puab moog coj puab txiv hab tej quaspuj mivnyuas lug cuag kuv. Kuv yuav muab thaaj aav zoo kawg nkaus huv tebchaws Iziv nuav rua puab, puab txhaj yuav muaj noj muaj haus nplua mag.
Has kuas puab coj tsheb neeg huv tebchaws Iziv nuav moog tog koj txiv hab puab tej quaspuj mivnyuas lug nyob huv tebchaws Iziv nuav.
Kuas puab tsi xob khauvxwm puab tej khoom kws yog cuabyeej toomtxeem kws yuav muab tso tseg, tej kws zoo tshaaj plawg huv tebchaws Iziv nuav kuv yuav muab rua puab.”
Yakhauj cov tub ua lawv le tej lug kws has rua puab lawm. Yauxej muab tau ntau lub tsheb neeg rua puab, lawv le Falaus has rua Yauxej, hab muab zaub mov ntau heev rua puab coj moog tau noj taug kev.
Yauxej muab tau ib leeg ib cev rig tsho hloov rua nwg cov tijlaug, tabsis nwg muab tau peb puas dlaim nyaj hab tsib ce rig tsho rua Npeenyamees.
Nwg muab tau kaum tug neeg luav thauj tej khoom kws zoo tshaaj plawg huv tebchaws Iziv moog rua nwg txiv, hab muab dlua kaum tug thauj nplej, ncuav hab lwm yaam zaub mov rua puab tau noj taug kev.
Nwg txhaj xaa nwg cov tijlaug rov qaab. Hab thaus puab sawv kev moog, nwg has rua puab tas, “Mej tsi xob sis caav sis tshe tom tej tog kev mag.”
Puab tawm huv tebchaws Iziv rov qaab moog tsev, moog cuag puab txiv Yakhauj nyob rua peg tebchaws Kana-aas.
Puab has rua Yakhauj has tas, “Yauxej tseem muaj sa nyob! Nwg yog tug kws kaav tebchaws Iziv ntaag!” Yakhauj xaav tsi thoob hab nwg tsi ntseeg tej lug kws puab has ntawd.
Tabsis thaus puab pav tej lug kws Yauxej has rua puab txhua lu rua Yakhauj noog taag, hab thaus nwg pum cov tsheb kws Yauxej xaa tuaj tog nwg moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, nwg txhaj rov zoo sab.
Nwg has tas, “Zoo kuv sab heev lawm lauj! Kuv tug tub Yauxej tseem muaj sa nyob tag! Kuv yuavtsum moog pum nwg ua ntej kuv tuag.”
Yakhauj sau taagnrho txhua yaam kws nwg muaj coj huv tuabsi moog, hab thaus nwg moog txug nraag lub zog Npesenpas, nwg muab tsaj lug tua fij pub rua nwg txiv Ixaj tug Vaajtswv.
Mo ntawd nwg ua ywgtoog pum Vaajtswv lug has rua nwg hab hu nwg has tas, “Yakhauj, Yakhauj!” Yakhauj teb has tas, “Vaajtswv, kuv nyob ntawm nuav.”

Vaajtswv has tas, “Kuv yog Vaajtswv, kuv yog koj txiv tug Vaajtswv ntaag. Koj tsi xob ntshai qhov kws koj moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, kuv yuav pub kuas koj cov xeebntxwv fuamvaam coob ua tau ib tsaav tuabneeg tseemceeb nyob rua nraag.
Kuv yuav nrug koj moog nraag tebchaws Iziv, hab kuv yuav coj koj cov xeebntxwv rov lug nyob rua huv lub tebchaws nuav. Yauxej yuav nrug koj nyob thaus koj tuag.”
Yakhauj txawm sawv kev tawm huv lub zog Npesenpas moog. Yakhauj cov tub muab Yakhauj, puab cov mivnyuas kws tseem yau, hab puab tej quaspuj tsaws caij cov tsheb neeg kws Falaus tso tuaj tog puab.
Puab caab puab tej tsaj txhu hab coj puab tej cuabyeej toomtxeem kws puab muaj huv tebchaws Kana-aas moog nraag tebchaws Iziv huv tuabsi. Yakhauj coj taagnrho nwg cov xeebntxwv nrug nwg moog, xws le:
Nwg cov tub, cov ntxhais, hab cov ntxhais xeebntxwv.
Taagnrho Yakhauj tsev tuabneeg txhua tug kws nrug nwg tsiv moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, Lunpees yog nwg tug tub hlub, hab
Lunpees cov tub yog: Hanauj, Palus, Hexeloos hab Kalimis.
Xime-oos cov tub yog: Yemuyees, Yamees, Auhas, Yakhees, Xauhas, hab Sa-ules kws yog tug quaspuj tuabneeg Kana-aas tug tub.
Levis cov tub yog: Nkesoos, Kauhas, hab Malalis.
Yudas cov tub yog: Selas, Pelej hab Zelas. (Yudas muaj dlua ob tug tub yog Eles hab Aunaas, obtug tuag rua huv tebchaws Kana-aas lawm.) Peles ob tug tub yog: Hexeloos hab Hamaules.
Ixakhas cov tub yog: Taulas, Puahas, Yasus hab Simeloos.
Xenpuloos cov tub yog: Xelas, Eloos hab Yahelees.
Ntawm nuav yog cov tub kws Le-as yug rua Yakhauj thaus nyob peg tebchaws Mexuputamias, xaam nwg tug ntxhais Dinas nrug puab. Taagnrho nwg cov tub hab cov ntxhais kws Le-as yug muaj peb caug peb leeg.
Khas cov tub yog: Xefoos, Hankis, Sunis, Exenpoos, Elis, Alaudis hab Alelis.
Aseles cov tub yog: Eenas, Isevas, Isevis, Npeliyas hab puab tug muam kws hu ua Selas. Npeliyas ob tug tub yog Henpeles hab Makhiyees.
Kaum rau leej nuav puavleej yog Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv kws yog Le-as tug ntxhais qhev Xilepas kws Lanpaas muab rua nwg tug ntxhais Le-as yug.
Laxees kws yog Yakhauj tug quaspuj yug tau ob tug tub rua Yakhauj yog: Yauxej hab Npeenyamees.
Nyob huv tebchaws Iziv Yauxej muaj ob tug tub, Manaxes hab Efalayees, obtug yog Pautifelas kws yog tug povthawj kws nyob huv lub nroog Aunis tug ntxhais Axenas yug.
Npeenyamees cov tub yog: Npelas, Npekeles, Asenpees, Nkelas, Na-amas, Ehis, Lauses, Mupees, Hupees hab Alaudis.
Kaum plaub leeg nuav puavleej yog Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv kws yug lug ntawm Laxees.
Daas tug tub yog: Husees.
Nathalis cov tub yog: Yahexees, Nkunis, Yexes hab Silees.
Xyaa leej nuav puavleej yog Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv kws yog Laxees tug ntxhais qhev Nilehas kws Lanpaas muab rua nwg tug ntxhais Laxees yug.
Taagnrho Yakhauj cov tub hab cov xeebntxwv kws nrug nwg tsiv moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv muaj rau caum rau leej, tsi suav Yakhauj cov nyaab.
Xaam Yauxej ob tug tub kws yug nraag tebchaws Iziv rua hab, Yakhauj tsev tuabneeg muaj xyaa caum leej kws tsiv moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv.
Yakhauj khaiv Yudas ua ntej moog nug Yauxej kuas qha kev moog rua ntawm Nkausees. Thaus puab tub lug txug rua ntawm cheebtsaam Nkausees lawm,
Yauxej txhaj caij tsheb neeg moog ntsib nwg txiv rua ntawm Nkausees. Thaus obtug sis ntsib, Yauxej puag nkaus nwg txiv hab quaj ntev loo.
Yakhauj has rua Yauxej has tas, “Txawm yog kuv tuag los kuv yeej zoo sab, rua qhov kuv tub pum koj hab kuv paub has tas koj tseem muaj sa nyob.”

Yauxej has rua nwg cov tijlaug hab nwg txiv tsev tuabneeg has tas, “Kuv yuav moog qha rua Falaus paub has tas, kuv cov kwvtij hab kuv txiv tsev tuabneeg kws nyob peg tebchaws Kana-aas tub lug txug kuv lawm.
Kuv yuav qha rua Falaus has tas, mej yog cov tuabneeg yug yaaj hab tu tsaj txhu, mas mej caab mej tej tsaj luj, tsaj miv hab coj taagnrho mej tej cuabyeej toomtxeem kws mej muaj nrug mej lug.
Thaus Falaus hu mej moog nug saib mej ua num dlaabtsi,

mej teb nwg has tas, ‘Peb hab peb cov yawmkoob yeej yog tuabneeg yug tsaj thaus u lug txug naj nub nua.’ Mej yuavtsum teb le nuav, nwg txhaj yuav ca mej nyob ntawm cheebtsaam Nkausees nuav.” Yauxej has le nuav rua qhov cov tuabneeg Iziv yeej ibtxwm tsi nyam cov tuabneeg yug yaaj.

Yauxej moog has rua Falaus has tas, “Kuv txiv hab kuv cov tijlaug, caab puab tej tsaj txhu luj miv hab coj txhua yaam kws yog puab tug, nrug puab tsiv peg tebchaws Kana-aas lug txug lawm, taamsim nuav puab nyob huv cheebtsaam Nkausees.”
Yauxej coj nwg tsib tug tijlaug moog qha rua Falaus.
Falaus nug puab has tas, “Mej ibtxwm ua num dlaabtsi?” Puab teb Falaus has tas, “Peb yog tuabneeg yug yaaj ib yaam le peb tej yawmkoob ibtxwm yug lug lawm xwb.

Peb tau tsiv lug nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav, rua qhov nyob peg tebchaws Kana-aas muaj kev tshaib nqhes heev, tsi muaj zaub rua tej tsaj txhu noj le lawm. Mas thov koj tso cai rua peb nyob rua huv cheebtsaam Nkausees.”
Falaus has rua Yauxej has tas, “Nwgnuav koj txiv hab koj cov tijlaug tub lug txug koj lawm,

lub tebchaws Iziv nuav yeej yog puab lub hab. Ca le tso puab nyob rua huv cheebtsaam Nkausees, yog thaaj chaw kws aav zoo tshaaj plawg huv lub tebchaws nuav. Hab yog puab tseem tshuav cov tuabneeg kws muaj peevxwm yug taug tsaj, koj kuas puab ua cov yug kuv tej tsaj txhu hab.”
Ces Yauxej txhaj coj nwg txiv Yakhauj moog qha rua Falaus. Yakhauj foom koob moov rua Falaus,
hab Falaus nug Yakhauj has tas, “Koj noobnyoog muaj pistsawg xyoo lawm?”
Yakhauj teb Falaus has tas, “Kuv ua lub neej ncig moog ncig lug tau ib puas peb caug xyoo. Kuv lub neej tuab lu hab ntxhuv sab kawg le, kuv noobnyoog tsi ntev le kuv tej yawmkoob thaus u lawm.”
Yakhauj txawm rov foom koob moov rua Falaus hab tawm lug lawm.

Ces Yauxej tu aav rua nwg txiv hab nwg cov tijlaug nyob huv tebchaws Iziv, muab thaaj aav zoo tshaaj plawg kws nyob ze lub nroog Lamexes rua puab nyob ua puab tug, lawv le Falaus tau has rua Yauxej lawm.
Yauxej muab zaub mov pub rua nwg txiv, nwg cov tijlaug, hab taagnrho puab tej quaspuj mivnyuas noj.
Kev tshaib nqhes luj kawg le ua rua txhua qhov chaw tsi muaj mov noj le lawm, ua rua cov tuabneeg Iziv hab cov tuabneeg Kana-aas qaug zug zig vim txujkev tshaib nqhes ntawd.
Yauxej muab tej nyaj kws cov tuabneeg Iziv hab cov tuabneeg Kana-aas coj tuaj yuav nplej ntawd nqaa taagnrho moog ca rua huv Falaus lub loog huv tuabsi.

Thaus cov tuabneeg Iziv hab cov tuabneeg Kana-aas siv puab tej nyaj taag lawm, cov tuabneeg Iziv tuaj cuag Yauxej hab has tas, “Thov muab mov rua peb noj, tsi xob ca peb tuag tshaib. Thov nrhav kev cawm peb, rua qhov peb tej nyaj taag lawm.”
Yauxej teb has tas, “Yog mej tej nyaj taag lawm, mej ca le coj mej tej tsaj tuaj, kuv yuav muab nplej pauv.”

Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj coj puab tej tsaj tuaj rua Yauxej, Yauxej txhaj muab nplej pauv puab tej neeg, tej yaaj, tej tshis, tej nyuj hab neeg luav. Xyoo ntawd cov pejxeem muab taagnrho puab tej tsaj txhu tuaj pauv Yauxej tej nplej huv tuabsi.

Xyoo tom qaab puab rov tuaj cuag nwg dlua hab has tas, “Tug tswv, peb has tseeb rua koj, peb tsi zais ib yaam dlaabtsi ca hlo le, peb tej nyaj txag los taag hab peb tej tsaj txhu los peb coj tuaj rua koj taag. Peb tsi tshuav ib yaam dlaabtsi yuav coj tuaj rua koj lawm, tsuas yog tshuav peb lub cev hab peb tej teb lawm xwb.

Thov koj tsi xob ca peb tuag, nrhav kev cawm peb! Tsi xob ca peb tej teb caj quavpoj. Peb muab peb tej teb lug pauv koj tej mov, peb txhaj tau mov noj. Peb zoo sab yuav moog ua Falaus qhev, hab yuav muab peb tej teb rua nwg. Thov pub mov rua peb noj peb txhaj tsi tuag tshaib, hab muab noob qoob rua peb cog, kuas peb tej teb txhaj tsi dlo dlus ca.”

Yauxej yuav taagnrho tej teb huv tebchaws Iziv rua Falaus. Txhua tug tuabneeg Iziv puavleej muab teb muag huv tuabsi, rua qhov muaj kev tshaib nqhes heev, hab Falaus tau taagnrho suavdlawg tej teb moog ua nwg tug.
Yauxej muab cov pejxeem kws nyob huv tebchaws Iziv ua Falaus qhev huv tuabsi.
Tsuas yog tshuav cov povthawj tej teb, Yauxej txhaj tsi tau yuav. Puab tsi tau muag puab tej teb, rua qhov puab tau noj tau haus tej kws Falaus muab pub rua puab.
Yauxej has rua cov pejxeem has tas, “Nwgnuav kuv tub yuav mej hab mej tej teb ua Falaus tug taag lawm. Ntawm nuav yog tej noob qoob kws muab rua mej, mej ca le nqaa moog tseb rua huv mej tej teb.
Thaus txug caij sau qoob mej yuavtsum muab ib feem tsib coj tuaj rua Falaus. Dlua le cov, mej muab khaws tseg ca ua noob hab tseg rua mej hab mej cov quaspuj mivnyuas tau noj.”
Puab teb has tas, “Tug tswv, koj tau ua zoo kawg nkaus rua peb, koj cawm peb txujsa, peb yuav zoo sab hlo moog ua Falaus qhev.”

Yog le ntawd, Yauxej txhaj sau ib txuj cai rua lub tebchaws Iziv kuas yuavtsum muab tej qoobloo kws sau tau, ib feem tsib tuaj rua Falaus. Txuj cai nuav cov tuabneeg Iziv tseem coj lug txug naj nub nua. Tsuas yog cov povthawj tej teb, txhaj tsi yog vaajntxwv tug xwb.
Cov tuabneeg Yixalayees kws nyob huv tebchaws Iziv ntawm cheebtsaam Nkausees, puab npluanuj hab muaj tubki fuamvaam coob kawg le.
Yakhauj nyob huv tebchaws Iziv tau kaum xyaa xyoo, nwg muaj noobnyoog ib puas hab plaub caug xyaa xyoo.

Thaus ze lub caij kws nwg yuav tuag, nwg txawm hu nwg tug tub Yauxej tuaj cuag nwg hab has tas, “Muab koj ob txhais teg tso rua huv kuv ceg puabtais  hab coglug tseg has tas, koj yuav tsi muab kuv log rua huv tebchaws Iziv nuav le.
Thaus kuv tuag, koj yuavtsum coj kuv lub cev tawm huv tebchaws Iziv nuav moog log nrug kuv cov yawmkoob ua ke.” Yauxej teb has tas, “Txiv, kuv yuav ua lawv le koj has ntaag.”
Yakhauj has tas, “Koj ca le coglug rua kuv has tas, koj yuav ua le kuv has.” Yauxej txawm coglug rua nwg, ces Yakhauj ca le ua Vaajtswv tsaug sau nwg txaaj.
Tom qaab ntawd muaj tuabneeg moog qha rua Yauxej has tas, nwg txiv mob nyaav heev. Yauxej txhaj coj nwg ob tug tub kws yog Manaxes hab Efalayees moog saib nwg txiv Yakhauj.
Thaus muaj tuabneeg moog qha rua Yakhauj paub has tas, nwg tug tub Yauxej tuaj saib nwg, nwg txhaj ua tag sawv sau txaaj lug nyob quastsawg.
Yakhauj has rua Yauxej has tas, “Vaajtswv tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus tau tshwm lug rua kuv pum peg lub nroog Luxes kws nyob huv tebchaws Kana-aas hab foom koob moov rua kuv.

Vaajtswv has rua kuv tas, ‘Kuv yuav pub rua koj muaj tubki coob, koj cov xeebntxwv yuav fuamvaam moog ua ntau tsaav tuabneeg, kuv yuav muab lub tebchaws nuav pub rua koj cov xeebntxwv nyob ua puab tug moog ibtxhis le.’ ”

Yakhauj rov has rua Yauxej has tas, “Koj ob tug tub kws yog Efalayees hab Manaxes kws yug ua ntej kuv lug nyob huv tebchaws Iziv nuav, obtug puavleej yog kuv tubki ib yaam le Lunpees hab Xime-oos obtug ntaag.
Yog koj tseem muaj tub ntxiv, puab yuav tsi yog kuv cov tub lawm. Tej qubtxeeg qubteg kws puab yuav tau txais yog lug ntawm Efalayees hab Manaxes obtug lawm xwb.

Thaus kuv rov peg tebchaws Mexuputamias lug, koj nam Laxees tau tuag rua huv tebchaws Kana-aas, tsi dleb ntawm Efalates, mas ua rua kuv tau kev quaj ntsuag, kuv txhaj muab nwg log rua ntawm ntug kev kws moog rua huv lub zog Efalates.” (Nwgnuav yog lub nroog Npelehees.)
Thaus Yakhauj pum Yauxej ob tug tub, nwg nug has tas, “Ob tug tub nuav yog leejtwg?”

Yauxej teb has tas, “Ob tug tub nuav yog kuv ob tug tub kws Vaajtswv muab pub rua kuv huv lub tebchaws Iziv nuav ntaag.” Yakhauj txawm has tas, “Coj obtug lug rua kuv saib, kuv yuav foom koob moov rua obtug.”
Rua qhov Yakhauj noobnyoog laug heev lawm, nwg ob lub qhovmuag plooj hab pum kev tsi tseeb pistsawg. Yauxej txhaj coj Yauxej ob tug tub lug rua Yakhauj saib, Yakhauj txhaj puag nkaus hab nwj obtug.
Yakhauj has rua Yauxej tas, “Kuv tsi xaav has tas, kuv yuav rov pum koj lub ntsejmuag ib zag ntxiv le, tabsis nwgnuav Vaajtswv tub pub kuv pum koj cov mivnyuas lawm hab.”
Ces Yauxej txhaj tsaws obtug ntawm Yakhauj xubndlag lug, Yauxej txhus caug ndlua nyo hau ua ntsejmuag ti nkaus huv aav pe Yakhauj.
Yauxej tuav nwg ob tug tub teg moog cuag nwg txiv. Yauxej saab teg xis tuav Efalayees teg moog rua Yakhauj saab teg txhumphem, hab nwg saab teg txhumphem tuav Manaxes teg rua Yakhauj saab teg xis.

Tabsis Yakhauj muab nwg ob txhais teg sis qhab, nwg cev nwg saab teg xis moog tuav Efalayees kws yog tug kwv lub taubhau, hab nwg cev nwg saab teg txhumphem moog tuav Manaxes kws yog tug tijlaug lub taubhau.

Ces Yakhauj txawm foom koob moov rua Yauxej le nuav. “Thov Vaajtswv tug kws kuv yawmkoob Anplahaas hab kuv txiv Ixaj pehawm, foom koob moov rua ob tug mivtub nuav! Thov Vaajtswv tug kws coj kuv txuj hauv kev lug txug naj nub nua, foom koob moov rua obtug!

Thov tug timtswv ceebtsheej kws nwg tau cawm kuv dlim ntawm tej kev ntxhuv sab, foom koob moov rua obtug! Thov kuas kuv lub npe, kuv yawm Anplahaas lub npe hab kuv txiv Ixaj lub npe nyob nrug ob tug tub nuav moog! Thov kuas obtug muaj tubki hab xeebntxwv fuamvaam ua ib tsaav tuabneeg coob.”

Yauxej ntxhuv sab heev thaus nwg pum nwg txiv muab nwg txiv saab teg xis tso rua sau Efalayees taubhau, yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tshem nwg txiv txhais teg sau Efalayees taubhau moog tso rua sau Manaxes taubhau.
Yauxej has rua Yakhauj has tas, “Txiv, ua le ko tsi yog lawm. Tug nuav yog tug tub hlub, tso koj txhais teg xis rua sau nwg taubhau.”

Yakhauj tsi kaam, nwg has tas, “Tub, kuv paub lawm, kuv paub zoo. Manaxes cov xeebntxwv yuav fuamvaam coob hab ua ib tsaav tuabneeg tseemceeb. Tabsis nwg tug kwv yuav tau ua tuabneeg tseemceeb dlua tug tijlaug, hab nwg tej xeebntxwv tseem yuav fuamvaam coob hab ua ntau tsaav tuabneeg.”

Yog le ntawd, nub ntawd Yakhauj txhaj foom koob moov rua obtug has tas, “Yog cov Yixalayees foom koob moov rua ib tug twg, puab yuavtsum tuav meb ob lub npe. Puab yuav has tas, ‘Thov Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua koj lawv le nwg tau foom rua Efalayees hab Manaxes obtug.’ ” Qhov kws Yakhauj ua le nuav tub yog nwg muab Efalayees tso ua Manaxes ntej.
Ces Yakhauj has rua Yauxej has tas, “Koj tub pum lawm has tas, kuv tub yuav tuag, tabsis Vaajtswv yuav nrug nraim koj nyob hab yuav coj koj rov qaab moog nyob peg koj tej yawmkoob lub tebchaws.

Kuv yuav muab lub nroog Sekhees, cheebtsaam kws zoo ua noj ua haus kws kuv nqaa ntaaj nqaa neev moog txeeb tau ntawm cov tuabneeg Amaules teg lug, pub rua koj ua koj tug, kuv tsi pub rua koj cov tijlaug.”

Yakhauj hu taagnrho nwg cov tub lug cuag nwg hab has rua puab tas, “Mej suavdlawg lug nyob ua ib pawg rua ntawm nuav, kuv yuav pav tej xwmtxheej kws yuav tshwm lug rua mej lub neej yaav tom ntej nuav rua mej noog:
“Yakhauj cov tub, mej sau zog lug ua ib pawg hab noog kuv has. Ca le noog mej txiv Yixalayees tej lug ntuag.
“Kuv tug tub hlub Lunpees, koj yog kuv lub zug hab yog kuv thawj cov roj ntshaa thaus kuv tseem hluas, yog tug kws muaj sab tawv hab muaj zug tshaaj plawg kuv cov tub huv tuabsi.
Koj nyob tsi tswm ib yaam nkaus le dlej ndlaas, hab koj tsi yog tug kws tseemceeb npaum cov, rua qhov koj tau nce txaaj moog nrug kuv tug nam yau pw, hab koj ua tsi huv rua koj txiv lub txaaj lawm.
“Xime-oos hab Levis yog ob tug kwvtij. Obtug siv ntaaj siv rag moog txob tau plaub tau ntug.
Kuv yuav tsi koom nrug obtug saablaaj, lossis tsi koom nrug obtug ua paab ua pawg, rua qhov obtug tua tuabneeg thaus obtug chim sab, hab obtug pheej muab tej nyuj txu leeg rawg ua si.

Obtug tej kev ua nruj ua tsiv yuav raug lug foom tsi zoo, rua qhov obtug tsi muaj kev hlub, hab obtug txujkev nruj tsiv txhaj raug foom tsi zoo. Kuv yuav ua kuas obtug tawg tsiv moog nyob thoob plawg lub tebchaws Yixalayees. Obtug yuav tawg tsiv moog nrug cov Yixalayees nyob sis xyaw ntsuav.
“Yudas, koj cov tijlaug yuav qhuas koj, Koj yuav tuav rawv koj cov yeebncuab cejdlaab. Koj cov kwvtij yuav qhau cev hlo pe koj ntawm koj xubndlag.
Yudas zoo nkaus le tug mivnyuas tsuv ntxhuav, Nwg tum tsaj noj hab rov qaab lug rua ntawm nwg lub qhov tsua, Qhau cev hlo pw xyaab leeg. Tsi muaj leeg twg muaj cuabkaav moog tsaa nwg.

Yudas yuav tuav rawv vaajntxwv tug cwj, hab nwg cov xeebntxwv yog cov tswj teb kaav chaw moog txug thaus tug muaj fwjchim lug kaav txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav nqaa khoom tuaj pub rua nwg, puab fwm nwg hab noog nwg lug.

Nwg muab nwg tug mivnyuas neeg luav khi kag rua ntawm tsob txiv maab, Yog tsob txiv maab kws zoo hab txi txiv ncw tshaaj plawg le, Nwg muab tej kua txiv maab kws lab cuag ntshaav lug ntxhua nwg tej khaub dluag.
Nwg ob lub qhovmuag nce ntshaav lab ploog tub yog vim haus cawv txiv maab, nwg tej nav dlawb paug tub yog nwg haus kua mig.
“Xenpuloos yuav nyob ntawm ntug havtxwv. Nwg saab ntug dlej yuav ua qhov chaw nreg nkoj, nwg nrim dlej nrim aav yuav dlaav moog ti nkaus lub nroog Xidoos.
“Ixakhas yog tug neeg luav kws muaj zug heev, nwg qhau cev cug nraa.
Tabsis nwg pum lub chaw su zoo nkauj kawg nkaus hab lub tebchaws kws nyob kaaj sab lug. Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj cug nrausqaum tog thauj nraa hab zoo sab hlo ua num nyaav ib yaam le tug qhev.
“Daas yuav tau ua tug thawj kaav nwg cov pejxeem. Puab yuav zoo ib yaam le lwm xeem Yixalayees hab.
Daas yog tug naab kws nyob rawv ntawm ntug kev, tug naab muaj taug kws zuv rawv ntawm ntug kev, tog rawv tum neeg laujtaws, kuas tug tuabneeg kws caij poob dlhau plawg rua tom qaab.
“Tug TSWV, kuv naj nub tog koj txujkev cawm dlim.
“Khas yuav raug tej tubsaab muab hlua nplawm, Tabsis nwg yuav tig tau rov qaab lug caum tubsaab.
“Aseles tej teb yuav zoo qoobloo heev, Nwg yuav npaaj tej zaub mov kws zoo rua vaajntxwv.
“Nathalis yog tug maum muaslwj kws dlha ywj sab ywj ntsws, Nwg yug tau tej tug mivnyuas muaslwj, zoo nkauj ntxim hlub heev.
“Yauxej yog tsob ntoo kws cog rua ntawm ntug dlej, Txi txiv ncw ceg nthuav dlauv nab dlhau tej ntsaa laajkaab rua saab nrau.
Nwg cov yeebncuab siv zug ntsog ntaus hab nqaa puab tej neevnti hab xub vug caum nwg qaab.

Tabsis nwg raab neevnti tseem nyob ruaj khov kho, Hab nwg ob txhais npaab muaj zug heev lug ntawm Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus, lug ntawm tug Tswv Yug Yaaj, hab tug tsomkwm cov Yixalayees.

Tub yog koj txiv tug Vaajtswv ua tug paab koj ntaag, Vaajtswv tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, nwg foom koob moov rua koj, tso koob moov nrug naag lug sau ntuj lug, hab muaj dlej puv huv nruab tivtxwv tuaj rua sau npoo aav nuav, tau koob moov lug ntawm nam plaab hab nam mig.

Koj txiv tej koob moov muaj nqes tshaaj tej hauv roob kws ibtxwm nyob thaus u lug lawm tej koob moov, zoo dlua tej kev kaaj sab lug kws lug ntawm tej hauv roob kws nyob moog ibtxhis. Thov kuas tej koob moov nuav nyob rawv sau Yauxej taubhau, Nyob rawv sau tug kws raug cais ntawm nwg cov tijlaug moog lawm lub hauvplaj.
“Npeenyamees zoo ib yaam le tug maa kws nyaum heev. Nwg naj taagkig hab naj mo tum tau tsaj lug noj.”

Cov tuabneeg kws has taag lug sau nuav, yog kaum ob xeem Yixalayees, hab yog tej lug kws puab txiv has rua puab thaus nwg foom koob moov tseg rua puab, nwg foom koob moov kuas tsimnyog rua nwg txhua tug tub.

Yakhauj has rua nwg cov tub has tas, “Nwgnuav kuv yuav tso mej tseg moog nrug kuv cov tuabneeg kws tuag ua ntej lawm nyob. Thaus kuv tuag lawm, mej yuavtsum kwv kuv moog log nrug kuv cov yawmkoob huv lub qhov tsua kws nyob huv Efaloos kws yog tug tuabneeg Hitis thaaj teb
kws nyob huv Makhepelas ze rua ntawm Maales saab nubtuaj huv tebchaws Kana-aas. Anplahaas yuav lub qhov tsua hab thaaj teb nuav ntawm Efaloos lug ua chaw log tuag.

Qhov chaw nuav yog qhov kws puab log Anplahaas hab Xalas kws yog nwg tug quaspuj; Qhov chaw nuav yog qhov chaw kws puab log Ixaj hab Lenpekas kws yog nwg tug quaspuj hab yog qhov chaw kws kuv log Le-as rua huv lawm.
Thaaj teb hab lub qhov tsua nuav yog yuav ntawm cov tuabneeg Hitis lug. Mej coj kuv moog log rua huv.”
Thaus Yakhauj qha txhua yaam rua nwg cov tub taag lawm, nwg rov qhau cev pw hab tu sav nrho lawm.
Yauxej puag nkaus nwg txiv quaj hab nwj kag nwg txiv lub ntsejmuag.
Ces Yauxej txhaj has rua cov kws tshuaj lug tu hab muab tshuaj pleev nwg txiv lub cev.
Puab txhaj muab tshuaj pleev hab tu ntshis nwg txiv lub cev tau plaub caug nub kuas tsi xob lwj. Cov tuabneeg Iziv tuaj nrug paam hab quaj nyav Yakhauj tau xyaa caum nub.
Thaus dlhau xyaa caum nub ntawd lawm, Yauxej has rua Falaus cov numtswv has tas, “Thov mej paab coj kuv cov lug nuav moog has rua Falaus has tas,

‘Thaus kws kuv txiv yuav tuag, nwg kuas kuv coglug rua nwg has tas, kuv yuavtsum coj nwg moog log rua huv lub qhov ntxaa kws nwg tub npaaj tseg rua nwg nyob peg tebchaws Kana-aas lawm. Mas thov Falaus ca kuv coj kuv txiv moog log taag kuv maam rov qaab lug.’ ”
Falaus teb has tas, “Koj ca le coj koj txiv moog log lawv le koj tau coglug tseg rua nwg lawm.”
Ces Yauxej txhaj coj nwg txiv moog log. Taagnrho Falaus cov numtswv, cov kev txwj quas laug kws tu plaub ntug, hab cov thawjcoj huv tebchaws Iziv puavleej nrug Yauxej moog.

Yauxej tsev tuabneeg, nwg cov tijlaug tsev tuabneeg, hab nwg txiv tsev tuabneeg puavleej nrug nwg coj nwg txiv lub cev moog log, tsuas tseg puab tej mivnyuas, tej yaaj, tej tshis hab tej nyuj nyob huv cheebtsaam Nkausees xwb.
Cov tuabneeg kws caij tsheb neeg hab cov tubrog caij neeg nrug Yauxej puab moog coob kawg le.
Thaus puab moog txug ntawm lub tshaav ntaus nplej Athas kws nyob saab nubtuaj ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees, puab suavdlawg quaj nyav hab paam Yauxej txiv lawv le kevcai tau xyaa nub.

Thaus cov tuabneeg Kana-aas pum cov tuabneeg nuav tuaj quaj nyav ntawm lub tshaav ntaus nplej Athas puab has tas, “Cov tuabneeg Iziv lub nteeg tuag nuav yog lub nam nteeg kws luj kawg le.!” Tub yog vim le nuav txhaj tis npe rua thaaj chaw ntawd hu ua Anpees Mixalayees.
Yakhauj cov tub tau ua lawv le kws Yakhauj tau has tseg rua puab lawm,

Puab txhaj kwv puab txiv moog peg tebchaws Kana-aas, hab muab log rua huv lub qhov tsua kws nyob huv Makhepelas thaaj teb kws nyob ntawm Maales saab nubtuaj kws Anplahaas yuav ntawm Efaloos kws yog tug tuabneeg Hitis lug ca ua chaw log tuag.
Tom qaab kws Yauxej muab nwg txiv log taag lawm, nwg nrug nwg cov tijlaug hab cov tuabneeg kws nrug nwg moog ntawd, rov qaab lug rua nraag tebchaws Iziv lawm.
Tom qaab kws puab txiv tuag lawm, Yauxej cov tijlaug has tas, “Peb yuav ua le caag, yog Yauxej tseem ntxub peb hab ua phem pauj tej kev phem kws peb tau ua rua nwg lawm?”
Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj tso tuabneeg moog has rua Yauxej le nuav tas, “Ua ntej kws peb txiv tuag,

nwg has kuas peb tuaj has rua koj tas, ‘Thov koj zaam koj cov tijlaug tej kev txhum kws puab tau ua rua koj lawm.’ Mas nwgnuav thov koj zaam txim rua peb cov kws yog koj txiv tug Vaajtswv cov tubkhai hab tej kws peb tau ua taag lug lawm.” Yauxej quaj heev thaus nwg nov dlheev tej lug nuav.
Ces Yauxej cov tijlaug txawm ua ke tuaj cuag Yauxej hab qhau cev hlo ntawm nwg xubndlag pe nwg. Puab has tas, “Peb suavdlawg yog koj cov tubqhe.”
Yauxej has rua puab tas, “Mej tsi xob ntshai, kuv tsi muaj cuabkaav tsaav kuv lub fwjchim kuas luj dlua Vaajtswv?
Mej tau tuavhuv ua phem rua kuv lawm tag, tabsis Vaajtswv tau muab qhov phem ntawd hloov ua qhov zoo, ua le ntawd txhaj cawm tau coob leej txujsa, ib yaam le mej pum nub nua ntaag.
Mej cov ua tij tsi xob ntshai. Kuv yuav ua tug saib mej hab mej tej mivnyuas.” Yog le ntawd, Yauxej txhaj ntuag puab ntawm lub sab dlawb paug hab ua rua puab kaaj sab ua neej.
Yauxej ua neej nrug nwg txiv tsev tuabneeg nyob huv tebchaws Iziv, Yauxej muaj noobnyoog ib puas kaum xyoo nwg maam le tuag.
Nwg ua neej nyob txug thaus nwg pum Efalayees cov mivnyuas hab cov xeebntxwv huv tuabsi. Hab nwg tseem nyob moog txug thaus kws nwg pum Manaxes tug tub Makhis cov mivnyuas lawm hab.

Nwg has rua nwg cov kwvtij has tas, “Tshuav tsi ntev kuv tub yuav tuag, tabsis Vaajtswv yuav ua tug tsomkwm mej hab coj mej tawm huv lub tebchaws nuav moog rua peg lub tebchaws kws nwg tau coglug tseg has tas, nwg yuav muab pub rua Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj puab.”
Ces Yauxej has kuas cov Yixalayees coglug rua nwg has tas, “Mej coglug tseg rua kuv, yog thaus twg Vaajtswv coj mej moog peg tebchaws Kana-aas, mej yuavtsum nqaa kuv cov pobtxhaa nrug mej moog hab.”
Yauxej tuag huv tebchaws Iziv thaus nwg muaj noobnyoog ib puas kaum xyoo. Puab muab tshuaj pleev nwg lub cev hab muab tso rua huv hleb tseg.
